String.Source: What did you do? Wait...let me guess. You've turned me into a woman. No, an Orc! A goat? Funny, I don't feel like chewing cud.
String.Dest: 你干什么了？等等……让我猜猜看。你把我变成了一个女人。不，一个兽人！难不成是一只山羊吗？真有趣，不过我不喜欢咀嚼反刍的食物。

String.Source: Invisible at last. Think of all the things we can do, and all the things we can get away with. This is permanent, right?
String.Dest: 总算是隐形了。试想一下我们现在能做的事，再想想我们能逃脱的那些处罚！这个效果是永久的，对吧？

String.Source: Suddenly I don't feel like fighting. But I do feel like taking a nap. I think I'll do that.
String.Dest: 我突然就不想干架了。我想睡午觉。我觉得我会这么做的。

String.Source: Wow, look at me! Did I always have these muscles? Ask me for directions so I can show them to you.
String.Dest: 喔，看着我！我是不是很强壮？快这样问我，我就能把我的肌肉展示给你看了。

String.Source: Wow, a healing spell. Is there anything you can't do? If there is, it's probably something stupid anyway.
String.Dest: 喔哦，治愈魔法。难道没有什么你不擅长的么？如果有的话，反正是什么微不足道的傻事。

String.Source: Ah, that feels good.
String.Dest: 啊，那感觉真不错。

String.Source: All right, I'm not sure whose turn it is to pay the bandit toll, but I'd rather not be squished by boulders. I suppose we could just go around.
String.Dest: 好吧，我不确定轮到谁来付强盗们的买路财了，不过我可不想被那些大石头砸成泥。我觉得我们应该走别的地方。

String.Source: Bandits ahead. Please resist the temptation to start mining the ore around us.
String.Dest: 前方有贼。请勿采矿。

String.Source: Huh. I smell mead. I must be going crazy.
String.Dest: 哈。我闻到蜜酒的味道了。我一定快疯了。

String.Source: Okay, I know it's kind of late to be bringing this up now, but do you really think we should save Fjola? Her husband didn't exactly seem...sane.
String.Dest: 好吧，我知道现在有点儿晚了，但你真的认为我们应该救下菲欧拉吗？她的丈夫看起来完全没有……理智。

String.Source: Seems like it'd be trading one prison for another. Only this one's more of an asylum.
String.Dest: 感觉像是从一个监牢被带到了另一个监牢.只是这个监牢更像一个庇护所。

String.Source: Spider webs! Wait, spiders are coordinating the caravan attacks? Wow. I'm trying really hard not to admire them but it's not as easy as you'd think.
String.Dest: 蜘蛛网！等等，蜘蛛与马车遭袭有关？哇哦，我一直努力地不去吸引蜘蛛的注意力但要做到这点比你想象得要难啊。

String.Source: So did they just run out of bones when making those chimes? Because there seems to be a huge gap in the middle where we can walk right through.
String.Dest: 这么说他们做那些编钟的时候把骨头都用完了吗？因为那边看起来中间有个畅通无阻的大缺口。

String.Source: I'm sure whatever's beyond that fence is extremely dangerous. You know, just once I'd like to look behind one of them and find a basket of kittens.
String.Dest: 我敢说围墙外面的东西肯定都极端地危险。你知道，有一次我看出去居然看见了一篮子小猫哎。

String.Source: Ooh, Jazbay grapes. It used to be illegal to pick those, back when they had more flavor. But now that they're bland nobody cares.
String.Dest: 哦，架子湾葡萄。在过去，采摘它们是违法的，因为那时的味道无比香醇。但现在，那味道平淡的无人问津。

String.Source: How can that pressure plate be connected to anything? It's smack dab in the middle of nowhere. I say we just walk across. It's a bluff.
String.Dest: 哪儿有什么机关链接到那个踏板啊？它附近什么东西也没有。要我说咱就走过去算了，完全是虚张声势。

String.Source: Danger ahead. This is the part where we both conjure up some courage. If only I knew the spell.
String.Dest: 前方有危险！到了这儿咱俩都得鼓起勇气才行。我要是会那个法术就好了。

String.Source: Look at the size of that spider! Funny thing is, it's huge, but I bet it's the worst mage out of all of them.
String.Dest: 看看那些庞大的蜘蛛！虽然他们长得那么大，我打赌一个最糟糕的法师也能从他们那里逃出来。

String.Source: Let's reunite a talking dog with its master by killing a cult of vampires! Just another sentence that has never been uttered by anyone ever.
String.Dest: 让我们把这窖吸血鬼全杀了，好让一个会说话的狗和他的主人团聚吧。我只是有啥说啥罢了。

String.Source: I wonder what we'll find in this cave. Vampires? Trolls? Spiders? With our luck it'll probably be vampire trolls mounted on spiders.
String.Dest: 我不知道我们会在这个洞穴里发现什么。吸血鬼？巨魔？蜘蛛？或许我们运气很好的是吸血鬼、巨魔加蜘蛛。

String.Source: Uh oh, another puzzle. Wasn't the first trial proof enough that you're Dragonborn? Or does Ulfric know "Whirlwind Sprint" as well?
String.Dest: Uh oh, another puzzle. Wasn't the first trial proof enough that you're Dragonborn? Or does Ulfric know "Whirlwind Sprint" as well?

String.Source: There's a witch. Just one though. How many heads did we need to get, anyway? I'm asking because they'll probably start to smell after a day or two.
String.Dest: 这儿有个女巫，尽管只有一个。话说回来我们需要多少个脑袋来着？[我的意思是说她们的脑袋在一两天之后大概就发臭了]。

String.Source: So given where we are and the sentries posted outside, I think this might be a smuggling operation. I hope I don't run into anyone I know.
String.Dest: 从我们所处的位置以及外面这一大堆站岗的哨兵来看，我觉着这大概是个走私行为吧。但愿我不会撞见熟人。

String.Source: A tunnel of blades and a room full of coffins. So a vivisection followed by a burial! Wonderful.
String.Dest: 啊，一条充满刀片的隧道，一个都是棺材的房间！太好了，他们可以解剖了什么人以后立刻把它埋起来！

String.Source: So something killed that deer but didn't bother to eat it. Maybe it found something tastier further down.
String.Dest: 也就是说有东西杀掉了那头鹿却没吃它。也许是因为它在远处看到了更好吃的东西。

String.Source: A vampire thrall. Aw...it looks so peaceful sitting there, with its wine and its bowl of bloody skulls.
String.Dest: 一个吸血鬼奴仆。哦......它坐在那儿时看起来真是“人畜无害”，瞧瞧它那酒和那一碗盛满鲜血的头骨。

String.Source: Oh good, more mages. I'm rather enjoying killing them. Damn conjurers are always looking down on us bladebinders.
String.Dest: 哦，太好了，一堆法师。我就是喜欢干掉他们。该死的施法者老是瞧不起我们武士。

String.Source: I think I see danger ahead. And wouldn't you know it, I think my back just went out on me. Really.
String.Dest: 我想前面会有危险等着我。你难道不相信我说的？我想此去是凶多吉少了，真的！

String.Source: Oh good, a river! I'm so tired of drinking wine and snow.
String.Dest: 哦太好了，一条河！我已经厌倦用雪和葡萄酒解渴了。

String.Source: Oh wow, look at this place. I think it's illegal for anywhere in Skyrim to have this much color.
String.Dest: Oh wow, look at this place. I think it's illegal for anywhere in Skyrim to have this much color.

String.Source: This view would be a lot more amazing if I wasn't terrified at the prospect of a bandit creeping up behind us.
String.Dest: 要是我之前没有被身后埋伏的强盗吓着的话现在的场面应该更壮观。

String.Source: Oh, I thought I recognized this place. This is Pinewatch. They know me here. Although they don't really like me, either.
String.Dest: 啊，我想我认识这个地方。这是松木哨塔。这的人认识我，尽管他们不怎么喜欢我。

String.Source: Oh Gods, I can actually breathe again! Well, I could breathe back in that ruin, but it was rather unpleasant to do so. Oh, and look, a nice view!
String.Dest: 哦天哪，我终于又能呼吸了！呃，其实我在遗迹也能呼吸，但那么做感觉挺恶心的。噢，看哪，这风景太美了！

String.Source: Oh look, a Dwarven ruin! And Falmer huts! Those are like the barnacles of the underground sea.
String.Dest: 哦，看，一个矮人废墟！还有那些雪精灵小屋！这些小屋看起来就像是附着在海底的藤壶一样。

String.Source: Oh Gods, something's coming out of the water! Griffins! Run for your life! Run for..oh. They're just statues. My mistake.
String.Dest: 哦神啊，水里有东西出来了！Grffins！快逃命！快逃。。。哦。只是雕像。不好意思。

String.Source: There are more guards here than at the Emperor's wedding. Calcelmo must really love his research.
String.Dest: There are more guards here than at the Emperor's wedding. Calcelmo must really love his research.

String.Source: This is an impressive little cave. Although not as impressive as moving that boulder away from the entrance. I still don't know how Karliah did that.
String.Dest: 这真是个不错的小洞窟。不过不比卡莉亚清开入口那些巨石那样令人震惊。我一直不知道她是如何做到的。

String.Source: Wow, another giant orb. This one's even bigger than the one in Winterhold. Maybe it's the other one's armor.
String.Dest: 哇哦，另一个巨大的球体。甚至比冬堡的那个更大，也许这是某个巨人的盔甲.

String.Source: Look at all this construction. Maybe these vampires are tunneling their way to Akavir. Maybe someone told them their rivers flow with blood.
String.Dest: 瞧瞧这儿的建筑。也许这些吸血鬼在搞一条通往Akavir的隧道。难道说有人告诉他们那些河里流淌的都是血吗？

String.Source: Wow, look at this place. I wonder who it was that was buried here before the Gauldur boy.
String.Dest: 哇哦，看看这地方。我挺想知道是谁在高尔多那家伙之前就被埋到这儿的。

String.Source: Brittleshin Pass. Last time I was here, there was an icicle sticking out of the Nord sculpture's nose. Oh, it's still there. How embarrassing.
String.Dest: 脆胫关。我上次来这的时候，那个诺德塑像鼻子下面挂着个冰柱。啊欧，冰柱还在。真是无法直视...

String.Source: Wow, it's like another world inside this cavern. Waterfalls, trees...and yes, bloodthirsty Spriggans and corpses too, but that's just being finicky.
String.Dest: Wow, it's like another world inside this cavern. Waterfalls, trees...and yes, bloodthirsty Spriggans and corpses too, but that's just being finicky.

String.Source: The Dwemer Museum. Are there Dwarven sphere jousts and taffy treats made by Centurions? Huh? Of course I've been to a museum before.
String.Dest: 矮人博物馆。这些矮人球和太妃糖条是由百夫长制造的么？呵呵？我之前当然去过博物馆了。

String.Source: Will you look at that? That's amazing! And...and is that wall talking? Tell me you hear it too.
String.Dest: Will you look at that? That's amazing! And...and is that wall talking? Tell me you hear it too.

String.Source: Excuse me, I think I dropped my jaw somewhere.
String.Dest: 抱歉，我惊呆了。

String.Source: You found a Nord ruin. You're so good at adventuring it scares me. I'm the same way with procrastination.
String.Dest: 你找到了个诺德遗迹。你在探险方面的天赋真让我吃惊。虽然我觉得我在拖延症上的天赋足够和你找寻遗迹的天赋媲美。

String.Source: A cave! What a surprise! said the idiot companion.
String.Dest: A cave! What a surprise! said the idiot companion.

String.Source: Whenever I come across one of these Dwarven ruins, I always pray I won't see an actual Dwarf. That would mean I've disappeared too.
String.Dest: 任何时候我来这些矮人遗迹时，我总是祈祷不要让我遇上真正的矮人。 那意味着我将从去另外一个世界了。

String.Source: A cave. What will we find, trouble or treasure?
String.Dest: 有个洞穴。里面会有什么呢，危险还是宝藏？

String.Source: Cave up ahead. Tread carefully.
String.Dest: 你先进洞。小心脚下。

String.Source: Look. A cave. Plenty of gold inside, I hope.
String.Dest: 看，一个山洞。希望里面有很多财宝。

String.Source: There's a cave here. Maybe we should check it out.
String.Dest: 这有个洞穴，咱们进去看看？

String.Source: Hey, there's a cave here. Animals, bandits, or maybe both.
String.Dest: 嘿，这儿有个洞穴。野兽，强盗，说不定都有。

String.Source: Old ruins. Nordic, by the looks of it.
String.Dest: 从外观上能看出来，这是座古代的诺德遗迹。

String.Source: Nord ruins. How long do you think they've stood here?
String.Dest: 诺德遗迹。你认为它矗立于此多久了？

String.Source: A Nord ruin. Thousands of years old.
String.Dest: 一座诺德遗迹。它有数千年之久了吧。

String.Source: Old stonework. Gold, traps, and bones.
String.Dest: 古老石雕制品，金币、陷阱和骨头。

String.Source: A Dwarven city. Remarkable.
String.Dest: 一座矮人城市。真是不同寻常。

String.Source: Dwarven ruins. Old cities, old ghosts.
String.Dest: 矮人遗迹。古老的城市，古老的幽灵。

String.Source: By the Divines, look. A Dwarven city.
String.Dest: 圣灵在上。看，一座矮人城市。

String.Source: Legend says Dwarven ruins are haunted. I'd rather not find out.
String.Dest: 传说矮人废墟闹鬼。我情愿没找到这里。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Great, I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 太好了，我在那儿等你。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Great, I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 太好了，我在那儿等你。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Great, I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 太好了，我在那儿等你。

String.Source: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 让我们住在我在独孤城的房子里吧。

String.Source: Great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 很好。我会在那儿等你。

String.Source: How about my house in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 我在风盔城的房子怎么样？

String.Source: Great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 好的。我会在那儿跟你汇合。

String.Source: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
String.Dest: 我在马卡斯城的房子将会很完美。

String.Source: Great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 好的。我会在那儿跟你汇合。

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
String.Dest: 我在裂谷城有栋房子。

String.Source: Great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 好的。我会在那儿跟你汇合。

String.Source: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我们可以住在我在雪漫城的房子里。

String.Source: Great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 好的。我会在那儿跟你汇合。

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: We're married! All that's left is deciding on a place to live. Just don't say my place. Because that's technically Ulundil's.
String.Dest: 我们结婚啦！现在商量下我们住哪儿吧。但可别说住去我那儿。因为那其实是属于阿伦迪尔的。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
String.Dest: 我想我们得移动到别的地方。

String.Source: Oh? Where should we move to?
String.Dest: 哦？现在我们该去哪？

String.Source: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅，我在独孤城的家。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 霜宅，我在风盔城的房子。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂，我在马卡斯城的房子。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 风宅，我在雪漫城的房子。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Your old place would suit us just fine.
String.Dest: 你的老地方会很适合我们的。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: I cooked this and I'm quite proud of it. I think you might have married a culinary genius.
String.Dest: 这是我煮的，我为此而自豪。我想你可能嫁给了一名天才厨师。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: These masterpieces take time. Ask me again later.
String.Dest: 杰作当然要花费时间制作。改天再问我吧。

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
String.Dest: 商店有赚钱吗？

String.Source: Business has been...okay. We're making profits, I think. Here, have some.
String.Dest: 生意已经……搞定了。我想我们赚了些钱。给，拿着这些。

String.Source: Goodbye, my love.
String.Dest: 再见，我的宝贝。

String.Source: Goodbye, my love.
String.Dest: 再见，我的宝贝。

String.Source: Farewell, my love.
String.Dest: 再见了，亲爱的。

String.Source: The home is great. Although we probably have to pay a lot of taxes. Maybe I'll start a store...
String.Dest: 虽然我们可能要付很多的税。但是。。这房子真棒，也许我该开一间商店......

String.Source: Oh! You're back! I just want you to know that those rumors are untrue. I did not lose our fortune playing iron hearts.
String.Dest: 哦！你回来了！我只是想让你知道那些传言是不真的。我们没有丢失那些铁艺的技巧。

String.Source: Hello, my love. Back from some adventure I bet.
String.Dest: 你好啊，亲爱的。我猜你刚经历了一场冒险回来的吧。

String.Source: Need your husband's blade? I might go mad if I keep staring at the walls.
String.Dest: 需要你丈夫跟你一起冒险吗？让我一直在家盯着墙无所事事我可真要疯了。

String.Source: Greetings, my love.
String.Dest: 你好，亲爱的。

String.Source: You really know how to let an Elf down gently, don't you? How about a hint next time, like you think the farmer's handsome or something?
String.Dest: 你真的知道如何让一个精灵变得礼貌吗？打个比方吧，你在讨论一个农民的英俊潇洒或者别的什么类似的东西。

String.Source: It's probably best we stay friends.
String.Dest: 我们最好还是保持朋友关系。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: Wow, you're not exactly what we modest folk call "subtle," are you? Yes, I'm interested. What of it?
String.Dest: 哇哦，你不正是我们这些谦虚的人称为“狡猾的家伙”的家伙吗？是啊，我挺感兴趣的。这有什么关系呢？

String.Source: Question. Are you by chance interested in me?
String.Dest: 请问，你可能对我感兴趣吗？

String.Source: So that's it then. Rings, babies, balls, and chains. Works for me!
String.Dest: So that's it then. Rings, babies, balls, and chains. Works for me!

String.Source: Oh, just thinking maybe you and I should get hitched.
String.Dest: 哦，只是想，也许你和我应该选择结婚。

String.Source: That amulet...is that what I think it is? Are you? Are we? I should just shut up right now and let you speak.
String.Dest: 那个护符...是我想的那样吗？你？我们？我想我该直接闭嘴，该你说了。

String.Source: So...have you spoken to a Priest of Mara yet? No pressure.
String.Dest: 所以...你跟玛拉的祭司讲了吗？我没催你的意思。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 哈啰。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Here. I got this for you. Just a small token of my gratitude.
String.Dest: 来，这个送给你，只是个表达我心意的小礼物。

String.Source: Watch your face! Keep your hands up!
String.Dest: Watch your face! Keep your hands up!

String.Source: Drive that snowback to the ground!
String.Dest: 揍翻那个北方佬！

String.Source: Twelve septims on the one who's winning!
String.Dest: 12个金币赌谁赢！

String.Source: Fight! Fight!
String.Dest: 上啊！上啊！

String.Source: Punch 'em like they stole your dinner!
String.Dest: 扁他们！把他们当成偷了你晚餐的贼那样痛扁他们！

String.Source: Stick and move! Stick and move!
String.Dest: 坚持住，动起来 ！坚持住，动起来 ！

String.Source: Alright, I'll just stand right here, and you start hitting the ground with spells and such.
String.Dest: 好吧，我就站在这儿，然后你就开始用法术之类的撞击地面吧。

String.Source: Wait...hold on. Maybe you don't have to actually use a spell. What if...what if I just imagined you were casting them.
String.Dest: 等等，稍等一下。你可能并不需要真正吟唱一个咒语。我可以假装你在吟唱他们

String.Source: Like I close my eyes and picture the fireball coming at me...it's almost here, and now I'm casting my ward and...
String.Dest: 就像我闭上眼睛然后想象火球冲我飞来……它就快到了，现在我就得释放结界然后……

String.Source: Yes, I've deflected it, with so much force it seems, the fireball is now shooting off into the sky. It is literally burning a hole in Aetherius.
String.Dest: 是的，我躲过了它，但它太强力了，那火球径直冲向了天空，简直像是要把艾瑟瑞斯烧出一个大洞。

String.Source: Oh, now it's actually circling around Masser and hurtling back toward...it looks like that's Rorikstead...oh that poor goat...so much carnage...
String.Dest: 哦，它正围着玛撒尔转圈……然后飞向……看起来像是洛里斯泰德……可怜的羊……好可怕的大屠杀……

String.Source: So you're saying I need to work hard and study to achieve my goals...but what if that goes against everything I stand for?
String.Dest: 所以你说我需要努力工作好好学习达到我的目标……但倘若这些违背了我所坚信的一切我该怎么办？

String.Source: Come on, let's go. This is obviously not the sort of mage, and I use the term loosely, that can help me.
String.Dest: 来吧，我们走。这显然不是那种法术，我很熟悉他们，我对付他们有经验。

String.Source: Absolutely not!
String.Dest: 绝不！

String.Source: Well, that doesn't sound too bad. Wait a minute...what kind of rodent?
String.Dest: 呃，听起来不是太糟糕。等一下儿……什么样儿的耗子？

String.Source: I think you have the wrong person. I'm just here to learn a spell.
String.Dest: 我想你认错人了。我只是来这儿学魔法的。

String.Source: Excuse me...Yes, you, Orc. Do you have any spell tomes available for..."special" mages?
String.Dest: 对不起……是的，就是你，兽人。你有魔法书籍可供……"特别的" 法师吗？

String.Source: I think it's time we had a word with the librarian regarding "quality control."
String.Dest: 我想是时候我们得和图书管理员讨论关于“品质控制”的事情了。

String.Source: Ooh, this book has pictures! It seems easy enough and...it's a children's story on mudcrabs. What sort of library is this?
String.Dest: 哦~这本书有图片！这似乎很简单，嗯......这是一本有关泥蟹的儿童读物。这到底是什么样的图书馆呢？

String.Source: To use fire, one must ignite the ethereal flint through the synchronistic channeling of...oh rubbish! This won't do at all!
String.Dest: 要使用火焰的话，首先要通过灵界的渠道同步点燃空灵的燧石…噢去他的，这根本行不通！

String.Source: Alright, let's see what we can find here.
String.Dest: 好吧，看看我们能从这儿找到些什么。

String.Source: You're not thinking of jumping down that hole, are you? Oh Gods, you are.
String.Dest: You're not thinking of jumping down that hole, are you? Oh Gods, you are.

String.Source: This is good place to live. Great views, clean air, and free gold, so long as you can get over the whole "ethics of robbing people" thing.
String.Dest: 这是个居住良所。漂亮的风景，干净的空气，还有些黑钱，只要你能忍受那些抢劫者的道德。

String.Source: These bandits didn't seem to have a problem with it, so why should we? Unless you're implying they're better than us.
String.Dest: 这些强盗都能适应，为什么我们不能呢？除非你在暗示他们比我们强。

String.Source: I always make sure to look up and wave at the windows when I pass the Blue Palace. Eventually they might start thinking I'm someone important.
String.Dest: 每当我路过蓝色宫殿的时候我都不忘抬头看看窗户并奋力地在窗前挥舞着我的手。这样总有一天他们会开始把我当成一个重要人物的。

String.Source: This place is called Soljund's Sinkhole, right? Well, here's your sinkhole. And that corpse at the bottom must be Soljund.
String.Dest: 这地方叫索云德的阴沟，对吧？好啦，这儿就是阴沟，而底下那具尸体肯定就是索云德了。

String.Source: So I'm really curious about this bowl of blood. Did the vampire scoop his goblet in there to drink while he reads?
String.Dest: 所以我真的对这碗血很好奇。吸血鬼还会边读书边晃荡着高脚酒杯浅啜啥的吗？

String.Source: Or does he dip his finger in there and use it to turn pages? I like to imagine vampires use blood in place of every liquid we normally use.
String.Dest: 还是他把手指往那里蘸蘸好用来翻书？我想吸血鬼们的习惯也许跟我们差不多，只不过他们用的是血。

String.Source: These towers are impressive, although a bit crooked. Actually, I'm not sure if they are, but try getting that idea out of your head. You can't.
String.Dest: 这些塔真令人印象深刻,尽管有点儿歪。事实上，我不确定它们是不是真的歪了, 但最好忘了我这个想法，你别也这么想啊。

String.Source: You know what would make these traps more effective? If there were sweetrolls waiting for us at the end of it.
String.Dest: 你知道怎样让陷阱更有效？比如。。放一个甜甜圈在陷阱的另一侧。

String.Source: Did I hear that adventurer right? Did he say talking spiders? Oh...magic spiders. That's much worse.
String.Dest: 我没听错吧？他刚刚说的是会讲话的蜘蛛？哦……会魔法的蜘蛛。比那个更糟。

String.Source: I love how he just leaves the spider on the shelf with his other things. Middle shelf, gloves. Top shelf, eggs. On top of that, magic spider monster.
String.Dest: 我喜欢他把蜘蛛和其他自己的东西摆放在架子上的做法。中层的架子上，放手套。顶层架子上，放蜘蛛蛋。最上面，一只蜘蛛魔怪。

String.Source: Will you look at that. I've always said human skulls make for excellent candle holders, and there's your proof right there.
String.Dest: 看那边。我总是说人类的头骨是制作蜡烛台的绝佳材料，那正好就是个证明。

String.Source: So I have to ask, as there were a ton of them outside and even more in here. What's with the sheets of leather? Are Forsworn big on tanning racks?
String.Dest: 看着外面这一群甚至更多的弃誓者，我有个问题不得不问。那些和皮革一起穿在身上的是什么东西？弃誓者自身就是个大号制皮架吗？

String.Source: Is it just me, or is this place incredibly dark and scary? Maybe if the air wasn't as black as soot, I wouldn't judge it so harshly.
String.Dest: 到底是我的错觉，还是这个地方真的黑乎乎的很可怕？也许如果这里的空气没像烟尘那么黑，我就不会如此苛刻的评价了。

String.Source: Ooh, a bright light to ward off the danger and attract moths. On second thought, maybe we should turn it off. I like my clothes without holes.
String.Dest: Ooh, a bright light to ward off the danger and attract moths. On second thought, maybe we should turn it off. I like my clothes without holes.

String.Source: I see what they're doing here. They're making opening that chest so tedious that you won't even bother. I say we leave the blasted thing.
String.Dest: I see what they're doing here. They're making opening that chest so tedious that you won't even bother. I say we leave the blasted thing.

String.Source: Alright, we're here. If Malkoran kills me and turns me into a shade, tell him I don't want to wear a helmet like the others.
String.Dest: 好吧，我们到了。如果我不幸栽在了莫克然手上而且被变成了一个影鬼， 告诉他我不想像其他影鬼那样戴头盔。

String.Source: Look at that! So the farmer was telling the truth about the strange lights! But I don't hear any strange noises. He's obviously hiding something.
String.Dest: 看那边！这么说那农夫说有奇怪的光是真的！不过我没听见什么奇怪的噪音。他肯定还隐瞒了什么。

String.Source: Steepfall Burrow. I like places that have literal names. Imagine how much more motivated we'd be to raid "Lots of Treasure Cave."
String.Dest: 坠崖洞穴。我喜欢这个地方形象的名字。想象一下，如果我们要去劫夺一个叫“宝藏超多洞穴”，那我们该多有干劲儿啊。

String.Source: Oh wow, that's a lot of Orichalcum. You're not thinking of mining it all, are you? Oh Gods, you are.
String.Dest: 哦哇哦，这么多的金刚砂。你不会想要全部挖走吧？哦神啊，你还真的有这种打算。

String.Source: Oh wow, it almost looks like some sort of arena. The crowd looks pretty dead though.
String.Dest: 哇奥，这看上去简直像是个什么竞技场了，不过观众们都是死地挺透的。

String.Source: Ha! Get it? Because they're skeletons. Yeah, I know, worst joke ever.
String.Dest: 哈！明白了吗？因为他们是骨头架子。这是我听过的最糟糕的笑话。

String.Source: If I were a bandit, I think I'd like a job like this.
String.Dest: 如果我是个强盗，我想我会喜欢这样的工作。

String.Source: Not only are you in charge of the food, you can position the barrels so no one can see you sleeping on the job.
String.Dest: 你不仅仅偷吃食物，你还可以把桶子摆的风骚一点，这样就没有人会看见你上班睡觉了。

String.Source: And here I was going to compliment these bandits on how normal they seem, when we come across a table with somebody's severed hands. Lovely.
String.Dest: 当我们无意发现桌子上的有着某人的断肢时，我不禁想称赞这些强盗，看上去多标准啊。真令人愉快。

String.Source: This must have been some show back in ancient times. Set up an elaborate trap, slaughter a few slaves...fun for the whole family!
String.Dest: This must have been some show back in ancient times. Set up an elaborate trap, slaughter a few slaves...fun for the whole family!

String.Source: Where do you think the axe is?
String.Dest: 你觉得斧头会在哪？

String.Source: Troll's blood! Look at this place!
String.Dest: 巨魔之血！看看这里！

String.Source: You keep saying that but people at the Four Shields tend to just mope around, drink, and feel miserable. That's not my idea of adventure.
String.Dest: 你只是不停的说“冒险”，然后四面盾牌客栈的人们浑浑噩噩的酗酒，哀叹悲惨的命运。我可不觉得这是我向往的冒险。

String.Source: Well, I was going to follow you, but not if you're going to spend all day staring at fires and curvy wenches. I could do that at home. Conceivably.
String.Dest: 呃，我得跟紧你，但如果你打算整天盯着身材火辣的妹子，那我宁愿呆在家里。

String.Source: Do the three of you hear something? I thought I heard a woman calling to me...
String.Dest: 你们三个有听到什么吗？我似乎听到一个女人在冲我吼叫...

String.Source: Okay, maybe it's a little less ordinary than I thought.
String.Dest: 好吧，跟我所想的比起来这或许有点儿奇怪。

String.Source: Well this looks like an ordinary cave if I ever saw one. And I've seen at least five.
String.Dest: 呃，这看起来就像是我曾见过的普通山洞。我已经看到过至少五个了。

String.Source: You mean, besides the fact that they're all wearing matching outfits?
String.Dest: 你是说，除了他们都穿着相配的衣服这事以外还有别的什么？

String.Source: You're not jealous of him are you?
String.Dest: 你难道是嫉妒他了吗？

String.Source: Well, I fancy myself a fairly decent chef, maybe Falatild can help you with the rest.
String.Dest: 好吧，我想象自己是个得体而又美丽的厨师，或许会帮你完成剩下的。

String.Source: So Skjarn, if you end up getting your skull split by a Draugr, I'll just try to remember all the women who were spared from meeting you.
String.Dest: 好吧史卡盎, 如果你最后落得个脑袋被尸鬼捣得稀巴烂的下场，我会记得有多少女人因此而免于被糟蹋。

String.Source: Oh, I know. I'm just trying to find things I don't like about everyone to lessen the impact if they die.
String.Dest: 哦，我知道。我只是试着在找些我不喜欢的事情，是关于如果人们濒死时他们是如何与世界脱离联系的。

String.Source: Wow, that's impressive.
String.Dest: 哇，太好了。

String.Source: Right, because the last thing we want to do is walk into a haunted Nord ruin at night.
String.Dest: 对，因为我们要做的最后一件事就是在今晚走进那个闹鬼的诺德遗迹。

String.Source: Seems to me that's the best way to avoid ghosts. Well, the imaginary ones anyway. The real ones don't really care what time it is.
String.Dest: 对我而言那是避免见鬼最好的办法。当然，不管怎么说我曾经这么想过。我曾经并不是那么在意时间。

String.Source: There's my loving spouse! I bet you didn't expect to see your husband here, you know, outdoors instead of loafing around the house.
String.Dest: 看哪，这是我至爱的妻子！我打赌你一定以为我在外面，而从未想到我会在屋子里晃悠。

String.Source: But I assure you, I am acting strictly in the best interests of the family. So what if Thane Larsdon wants to overthrow everything.
String.Dest: 不过我向你保证。我做的一切都是为了家族的利益着想。可要是劳斯登领主想要把一切推倒重来怎么办。

String.Source: I mean, it's not like the Thalmor gave us a better offer.
String.Dest: 我是说，这可不比梭莫给我们出的好价。

String.Source: Hey, I was wondering when you would show up. I bet you didn't expect to see me here, given how much I loathe politics.
String.Dest: Hey, I was wondering when you would show up. I bet you didn't expect to see me here, given how much I loathe politics.

String.Source: But I assure you, I am acting strictly in my own interests. So what if Thane Larsdon wants to overthrow everything.
String.Dest: 但我向你保证，我之所以这么做完全是为了自己的利益。所以要是劳斯登领主想推翻一切该怎么办。

String.Source: I mean, it's not like the Thalmor gave me a better offer.
String.Dest: 我的意思是，梭默并不能给我更好的机会。

String.Source: How should I know? They all look the same to me. And by that I mean "extremely heavy."
String.Dest: 我为什么该知道？而且对我来说他们看起来都一样。我的意思是“非常非常相似“

String.Source: Exactly! And a bound sword is so much more comfortable in your palm. It's like holding a cloud, if clouds were sharp and made to cut people.
String.Dest: 很好！一把约束之剑在你手中更加合适，就如闪电般杀人于无形之中。

String.Source: Skjarn, think about it for a second. You're a bard, right? What's more precious to a bard than his hands?
String.Dest: 史卡盎，再好好考虑一下吧。你是一个吟游诗人, 不对吗? 还有什么比吟游诗人的双手更加珍贵呢?

String.Source: So Skjarn, I have to ask. Exactly how many women have you bedded? Approximately. I mean, I don't expect you to have a count.
String.Dest: 那么史卡盎，我认真的问你，你到底睡了多少女人？我不指望你还真做了统计，给我个大概数字就行了。

String.Source: Do you think our party is balanced enough? I mean Falatild is a ranger but it would've been nice to take Valgus along.
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的队伍配置好了吗？我是说 Falatild 是不错的射手不过要是有 Valgus 一起就更好了。

String.Source: It doesn't matter how many of us there are. He's the boss. We have to follow his orders.
String.Dest: 不管我们在这里有多少人，他是老板，我们要听他的指令

String.Source: With three beers down, the Orc did frown, and bid the Elf goodbye! For none could know, twas not for show, and someone had to die!
String.Dest: With three beers down, the Orc did frown, and bid the Elf goodbye! For none could know, twas not for show, and someone had to die!

String.Source: You're not thinking of jumping down that hole, are you? Oh Gods, you are.
String.Dest: You're not thinking of jumping down that hole, are you? Oh Gods, you are.

String.Source: The dead do seem particular about their treasure.
String.Dest: 这具死尸似乎详细说明了他们的宝藏。

String.Source: Yes, it's almost rather adorable the way they think they can still spend it. And even if they could, what would they spend it on?
String.Dest: 是啊，他们到了这个地步仍然认为他们能花掉那笔钱还真是令人尊敬。。也许他们能，他们又能花到哪里呢？

String.Source: The dead do seem particular about their treasure.
String.Dest: 这具死尸似乎详细说明了他们的宝藏。

String.Source: Traps, probably. I imagine the only thing a skeleton fears are mangy dogs who'd like nothing more than to chew on their bones.
String.Dest: 陷阱，大概吧。我想最让骷髅恐惧的东西是那些最喜欢啃骨头的癞皮狗。

String.Source: Ha! Well I'm sure wherever Madanach is, he'll be glad to know you didn't put much thought into his death.
String.Dest: 哈！我确定无论迈德纳奇在哪儿，他都会很高兴知道你没把太多心思花在他的死上的。

String.Source: I needed to escape Cidhna Mine. I didn't real care who lived or died.
String.Dest: I needed to escape Cidhna Mine. I didn't real care who lived or died.

String.Source: Ha! Well I'm sure wherever Thonar is, he'll be glad to know you didn't put much thought into his death.
String.Dest: 哈！好吧我很清楚托纳尔在哪,他一定很乐意听说你对他的死不以为意。

String.Source: I needed to escape Cidhna Mine. I didn't real care who lived or died.
String.Dest: 我只是想逃离希讷矿坑. 我才不在乎谁活着还是死了。

String.Source: Really? You mean to tell me you didn't enjoy it just a little? Well, you're a better mortal than I am.
String.Dest: Really? You mean to tell me you didn't enjoy it just a little? Well, you're a better mortal than I am.

String.Source: This was never about Ancano or revenge. It was about saving the College.
String.Dest: 这根本不是安卡诺或复仇的问题，而是为了拯救学院。

String.Source: Although I suppose I do hold a special kind of loathing for Elves like him.
String.Dest: 尽管我承认我确实对像他这样的精灵有一种特殊的厌恶感。

String.Source: This was never about Ancano or revenge. It was about saving the College.
String.Dest: 这根本不是安卡诺或复仇的问题，而是为了拯救学院。

String.Source: Not every High Elf is destined to become a wizard. Granted, I'm partly to blame for the way people see me.
String.Dest: 不是所有高精灵都一定是巫师。老实说，我对于其他人这么看我有点不爽。

String.Source: This was never about Ancano or revenge. It was about saving the College.
String.Dest: 这根本不是安卡诺或复仇的问题，而是为了拯救学院。

String.Source: So you admit I'm funny. I was starting to wonder if my jokes had any impact. I was just about to dig deep in my arsenal too.
String.Dest: 那么，你承认我还有点儿意思。我在想，如果我的笑话能够产生什么影响，我也差不多该在我的军械库挖个洞了。

String.Source: You're deflecting your fears with humor. Don't worry, I got this.
String.Dest: 你正在用幽默掩饰你的恐惧，别担心，我已经明白了。

String.Source: For instance, have I told you the one about the Dragonborn, Alduin, and the High Elf?
String.Dest: 例如，我告诉过你那个关于龙裔，奥杜因，和高精灵的故事吗？

String.Source: You're deflecting your fears with humor. Don't worry, I got this.
String.Dest: 你正在用幽默掩饰你的恐惧，别担心，我已经明白了。

String.Source: The Dragonborn and Alduin walk into a tavern. The Dragonborn orders a drink, while Alduin orders a High Elf.
String.Dest: 龙裔和奥杜因走进一家客栈，龙裔点了一杯酒，然而奥杜因点了一个高精灵。

String.Source: You're deflecting your fears with humor. Don't worry, I got this.
String.Dest: 你正在用幽默掩饰你的恐惧，别担心，我已经明白了。

String.Source: The wench brings over their orders. The Dragonborn takes a sip. Alduin, however, grabs the Elf by the tail and presses him against his bottom.
String.Dest: 村姑带来他们的消息。龙裔抿了一口酒。然而，奥杜因用它的尾巴抓起精灵把他压碎

String.Source: You're deflecting your fears with humor. Don't worry, I got this.
String.Dest: 你正在用幽默掩饰你的恐惧，别担心，我已经明白了。

String.Source: The wench, disgusted, asks the Dragonborn what in Oblivion he's doing.
String.Dest: 那年轻的女孩，露出厌恶的神色，责问龙裔在湮灭里都干了些什么。

String.Source: You're deflecting your fears with humor. Don't worry, I got this.
String.Dest: 你正在用幽默掩饰你的恐惧，别担心，我已经明白了。

String.Source: The Dragonborn says, "Well, Alduin will eat just about anything, but ever since he ate the world, he likes to measure things first."
String.Dest: 龙裔说， "是啊，奥杜因什么都吃。但自从他吃了个世界之后，他就开始喜欢在吃之前先测量东西的大小了。"

String.Source: You're deflecting your fears with humor. Don't worry, I got this.
String.Dest: 你正在用幽默掩饰你的恐惧，别担心，我已经明白了。

String.Source: That's the joke. And since I know you're going to kill that hungry son of a bitch, I might as well tell it now while it's still relevant. Good luck.
String.Dest: 开玩笑而已。从我知道你打算去杀了那个饥饿的狗崽子的时候起，我就想说这其中或许有千丝万缕的关系。祝你好运。

String.Source: You're deflecting your fears with humor. Don't worry, I got this.
String.Dest: 你正在用幽默掩饰你的恐惧，别担心，我已经明白了。

String.Source: Good. I'm glad we're on the same page. The problem is getting the others to comply.
String.Dest: 很好。这样我们就说到一块儿了。问题是要把其他人也拉拢才行。

String.Source: You're right. I could do with a more balanced diet.
String.Dest: 你是对的。我需要更均衡的饮食。.

String.Source: We'll need to split up and work on each Companion individually. I'll talk to Ria, and you talk to everyone else.
String.Dest: 我们得分头行动跟战友团的人合作。我去找Ria，你负责其他人。

String.Source: You're right. I could do with a more balanced diet.
String.Dest: 你是对的。我需要更均衡的饮食。.

String.Source: That may seem unfair, but there's no other way. The rest of them scare me.
String.Dest: 这并不公平，但是也别无选择。剩下的那些选择都不怎么样。

String.Source: You're right. I could do with a more balanced diet.
String.Dest: 你是对的。我需要更均衡的饮食。.

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: I hate it. Well, I would, if I was the sort of person who abhorred being happy. There are really people like that, you know.
String.Dest: 我讨厌它。如果我是痛恨幸福的那类人，我会那样做。真的有这样的人，你知道的。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: No, this Breezehome is aptly named. Everything is just that. Relaxed. Easy. A breeze, so to speak.
String.Dest: 不，风宅这个名字取得很好。一切都是那样。又轻松，又自在。如同微风一般。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: Why, it's absolutely dreadful! I say that because I want to be the first Elf to ever complain about living in a castle.
String.Dest: 为什么？那太可怕了！我这么说是因为我就要成为第一个抱怨自己城堡生活的精灵了。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: No, really, what is there to say? We live in a thousand story house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 不，说真的，这简直难以用语言形容！我们住在独孤城。住在一栋充满历史和传奇的房子里！

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: My clothes feel nicer, the air feels fresher, and I have a sudden urge to call people "peasants."
String.Dest: My clothes feel nicer, the air feels fresher, and I have a sudden urge to call people "peasants."

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: Good, it just needs more room for display cases. Just not enough places to display your weapon here. Well, all except *that* weapon.
String.Dest: 好，我需要给展示柜准备更多空间。这里的地方连装你放在这儿的武器都不够了。好吧，除了“那件”兵器。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: No, I kid. We're adventurers, right? We need to show people all our spoils lest they think we're lazy!
String.Dest: 不，我的孩子。我们是冒险者，对吗？我们得给人们看看我们的战利品，免得他们以为我们很懒！

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: Can't have people coming over and the only thing we have to show them is a tuft of Werewolf hair, Mehrunes' drawstring and a slice of moldy cheese.
String.Dest: 别让人们过来，我们能给他们看的东西只有一簇狼人毛，一条梅鲁涅斯的裤带和一片发霉的奶酪。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: I like the fact that this home has a balcony and a fishing boat. Not that I have any inkling as to how to use either, but I can pretend to.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这个有着阳台和渔船的家。虽然我完全不会使用，但是我会自认为我会用的。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: When I lived with the traveling artists, I once played an Argonian fishmonger with surprising accuracy.
String.Dest: 当我跟一帮在旅行的艺术家住在一起的时候, 我还曾经扮演过亚龙鱼贩子呢，而且演得很像。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: He was dead, of course, but you'd be surprised how many people mistake me for a corpse.
String.Dest: 他死了，当然，但你会惊奇地发现很多人误以为我也是一具尸体。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: A Dwemer home, how delightful! I hope you're open to listening to my decorating ideas.
String.Dest: A Dwemer home, how delightful! I hope you're open to listening to my decorating ideas.

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: I was thinking we could have a couple Dwarven spheres in the corner, and roll them at guests from time to time whenever they annoyed us.
String.Dest: 我在想我们可以在那个角落上放两只矮人球，一旦有来访者打扰了我们，我们就把矮人球扔向他们。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: The spheres wouldn't be functioning, of course, unless you wanted them to be. That's entirely up to you, but don't look at me to clean up the blood.
String.Dest: 除非你想要让那些球体运作，不然它们是不会动的。这完全取决于你，不过别指望我来帮你清理你的血迹。

String.Source: Actually, I would love to hear your horrible store names.
String.Dest: 事实上，我倒想听听你那糟糕的商店名字。

String.Source: Good, because I wasn't giving you a choice in the matter. The first name I used a bit of alliteration. It was "Rumarin's Relics."
String.Dest: Good, because I wasn't giving you a choice in the matter. The first name I used a bit of alliteration. It was "Rumarin's Relics."

String.Source: Actually, I would love to hear your horrible store names.
String.Dest: 事实上，我倒想听听你那糟糕的商店名字。

String.Source: A good name if you're running a museum, a bad name for newly crafted goods and dinnerware.
String.Dest: 要是你开的是博物馆就是个好名字，要是卖的是工艺品和餐具那就不怎么样。

String.Source: Actually, I would love to hear your horrible store names.
String.Dest: 事实上，我倒想听听你那糟糕的商店名字。

String.Source: Then I tried using a pun. I set up my goods on benches split by a single walkway. "The Summerset Aisle," I called it. As in A-I-S-L-E.
String.Dest: 然后我试着用了个双关语。我把放在长凳上的货物分在两遍，搞出一个单行道出来。我把它叫作“夏暮道。”注意是“道”，不是“岛”。

String.Source: Actually, I would love to hear your horrible store names.
String.Dest: 事实上，我倒想听听你那糟糕的商店名字。

String.Source: Welcome to the Summerset Aisle! I'd say. People thought I was a bloody Thalmor, claiming this land for the Elves.
String.Dest: Welcome to the Summerset Aisle! I'd say. People thought I was a bloody Thalmor, claiming this land for the Elves.

String.Source: What do you mean by "Sleeping" Giant?
String.Dest: 你说"睡着的"巨人是什么意思？

String.Source: The say a hagraven cast a spell on it long ago, and it only wakes when an adventurer comes to plunder the treasure it guards.
String.Dest: 据说有一个乌鸦鬼婆很久以前给它施加了一个咒语，只有当冒险者来夺取它所守护的财宝时，它才会苏醒过来。

String.Source: What do you mean by "Sleeping" Giant?
String.Dest: 你说"睡着的"巨人是什么意思？

String.Source: Now, the person I spoke with said he already slew the Giant, but later on I realized he was making the whole thing up. The slaying part.
String.Dest: Now, the person I spoke with said he already slew the Giant, but later on I realized he was making the whole thing up. The slaying part.

String.Source: What do you mean by "Sleeping" Giant?
String.Dest: 你说"睡着的"巨人是什么意思？

String.Source: The Giant and the treasure may very well exist.
String.Dest: 宝藏和守护巨人很可能是存在的。

String.Source: Giants go to sleep just like the rest of us. How is this one different?
String.Dest: 巨人也是跟我们一样要睡觉的吧。为嘛这只不睡？

String.Source: The say a hagraven cast a spell on it long ago, and it only wakes when an adventurer comes to plunder the treasure it guards.
String.Dest: 据说有一个乌鸦鬼婆很久以前给它施加了一个咒语，只有当冒险者来夺取它所守护的财宝时，它才会苏醒过来。

String.Source: Giants go to sleep just like the rest of us. How is this one different?
String.Dest: 巨人也是跟我们一样要睡觉的吧。为嘛这只不睡？

String.Source: Now, the person I spoke with said he already slew the Giant, but later on I realized he was making the whole thing up. The slaying part.
String.Dest: Now, the person I spoke with said he already slew the Giant, but later on I realized he was making the whole thing up. The slaying part.

String.Source: Giants go to sleep just like the rest of us. How is this one different?
String.Dest: 巨人也是跟我们一样要睡觉的吧。为嘛这只不睡？

String.Source: The Giant and the treasure may very well exist.
String.Dest: 宝藏和守护巨人很可能是存在的。

String.Source: Something tells me this will go horribly wrong.
String.Dest: 我感觉到这件事正在被搞砸。

String.Source: It inevitably will, which is why I propose we bring along some muscle, just in case the whole lullaby thing doesn't work.
String.Dest: 喔，我料到了这点，这也是我坚持带上一名战士的原因，就是为了防着给它唱催眠曲这招不管用。

String.Source: Something tells me this will go horribly wrong.
String.Dest: 我感觉到这件事正在被搞砸。

String.Source: I have some friends in Morthal who told me there's some legendary hero who lives in the marsh and rides a Chaurus.
String.Dest: 我有一些朋友住在墨索尔城，他们告诉我哪里有一些传说中的英雄骑着泥螃蟹生活在沼泽里.

String.Source: Something tells me this will go horribly wrong.
String.Dest: 我感觉到这件事正在被搞砸。

String.Source: If we can recruit him and the bard, I'd feel a lot more comfortable about our chances.
String.Dest: 如果我们能招募他和那个诗人，我感觉我们承担的风险会更小点儿。

String.Source: Then we have to find ourselves a bard.
String.Dest: 这么说咱们得找个吟游诗人入伙。

String.Source: Well yes, but to be honest, I would rather not stake my life on the words of this halfwit, regardless of how smart he seems standing next to me.
String.Dest: 好吧，但是老实说，我不会因为这个蠢货说的东西就用生命冒险，不管站在我身边的他看起来有多聪明。

String.Source: Then we have to find ourselves a bard.
String.Dest: 这么说咱们得找个吟游诗人入伙。

String.Source: I was thinking we should also recruit a strong warrior, in the event the giant refuses to take its nap.
String.Dest: 我想我们也应该招募一个强大的战士，如果这个巨人一直不去睡午觉的话。

String.Source: Then we have to find ourselves a bard.
String.Dest: 这么说咱们得找个吟游诗人入伙。

String.Source: I have some friends in Morthal who told me there's some legendary hero who lives in the marsh and rides a Chaurus.
String.Dest: 我有一些朋友住在墨索尔城，他们告诉我哪里有一些传说中的英雄骑着泥螃蟹生活在沼泽里.

String.Source: Then we have to find ourselves a bard.
String.Dest: 这么说咱们得找个吟游诗人入伙。

String.Source: If we can recruit him and the bard, I'd feel a lot more comfortable about our chances.
String.Dest: 如果我们能招募他和那个诗人，我感觉我们承担的风险会更小点儿。

String.Source: If I listen to your advice, I'm the lowest wit of all.
String.Dest: 若是我听了你的建议，我就是最不风趣的人了。

String.Source: Yes, but if we were smart, we wouldn't be adventurers. We would be scholars or librarians or some other horrifyingly dull occupation.
String.Dest: 是啊，如果我们够聪明的话，我们就不会是冒险者啦。我们可以是学者或是图书馆员或其他听起来高端却无趣的职业。

String.Source: If I listen to your advice, I'm the lowest wit of all.
String.Dest: 若是我听了你的建议，我就是最不风趣的人了。

String.Source: Besides, this will be as easy as taking meat from a mudcrab. You see, there's a trick to this spell that the hagraven uses to get to her treasure.
String.Dest: 而且，这会像从泥沼蟹身上得到蟹肉一样容易。你瞧，使用这个魔法有个窍门儿，乌鸦鬼婆就常用它来获取她的宝藏。

String.Source: If I listen to your advice, I'm the lowest wit of all.
String.Dest: 若是我听了你的建议，我就是最不风趣的人了。

String.Source: According to the halfwit, all we need to do is play it a lullaby and we'll be able to rock the angry giant back to sleep.
String.Dest: 根据那个白痴所说，我们只要哼首摇篮曲就能把愤怒的巨人哄睡着。

String.Source: How do you propose we get past the Giant?
String.Dest: 你打算怎么让我们从那些巨人身边穿过？

String.Source: I am glad you asked. It means we think on the same level, as that is precisely what I asked our halfwit friend.
String.Dest: 很高兴你这样问了。这意味着我们的智商好歹是在同一个水平面上，我就是这样问我们那个蠢货朋友的。

String.Source: How do you propose we get past the Giant?
String.Dest: 你打算怎么让我们从那些巨人身边穿过？

String.Source: Supposedly the sleep spell has a weakness which allows the Hagraven to access her treasure.
String.Dest: 很可能那个睡眠魔法什么弱点让乌鸦鬼婆有机可乘以便取用她的宝藏。

String.Source: How do you propose we get past the Giant?
String.Dest: 你打算怎么让我们从那些巨人身边穿过？

String.Source: According to him, all we need to do is play it a lullaby and we'll be able to rock the angry giant back to sleep.
String.Dest: 照他的说法，我们只需要对着一个狂怒的巨人演奏摇篮曲就能让他安然入睡。

String.Source: Sleeping or not, slaying a Giant doesn't sound too difficult.
String.Dest: 不管睡觉与否，杀一个巨人都不会太难。

String.Source: Maybe for you, but I'd feel better if I didn't get squashed in the process. And besides, there may be a better way.
String.Dest: 对你来说是容易，但对于我来说，我可不想被巨人给踩瘪了。以及，应该会有更好的办法来解决吧。

String.Source: Sleeping or not, slaying a Giant doesn't sound too difficult.
String.Dest: 不管睡觉与否，杀一个巨人都不会太难。

String.Source: The halfwit told me there's a trick to the spell that lets the hagraven get to her treasure.
String.Dest: 那个傻瓜告诉我这个咒语有个窍门能让乌鸦鬼婆得到她的宝贝。

String.Source: Sleeping or not, slaying a Giant doesn't sound too difficult.
String.Dest: 不管睡觉与否，杀一个巨人都不会太难。

String.Source: According to him, all we need to do is play it a lullaby and we'll be able to rock the angry giant back to sleep.
String.Dest: 照他的说法，我们只需要对着一个狂怒的巨人演奏摇篮曲就能让他安然入睡。

String.Source: In other words, this could be a complete waste of time.
String.Dest: 换句话说这完全就是在浪费时间。

String.Source: Well, nothing in life is guaranteed, save the end of it. I should note however that this halfwit was very detailed in his description of the Giant.
String.Dest: 好吧，生命里没有什么是有保证的，让我们试试做到最好。我再怎么也该注意到这个笨蛋对巨人的描述太过详细了。

String.Source: In other words, this could be a complete waste of time.
String.Dest: 换句话说这完全就是在浪费时间。

String.Source: For instance, supposedly the spell has a weakness which allows the Hagraven to access her treasure.
String.Dest: 比如说，那个法术很可能有某种弱点会被乌鸦鬼婆利用来存取她自己的宝藏。

String.Source: In other words, this could be a complete waste of time.
String.Dest: 换句话说这完全就是在浪费时间。

String.Source: According to him, all we need to do is play it a lullaby and we'll be able to rock the angry giant back to sleep.
String.Dest: 照他的说法，我们只需要对着一个狂怒的巨人演奏摇篮曲就能让他安然入睡。

String.Source: As am I. I do prefer being alive as opposed to that other thing.
String.Dest: As am I. I do prefer being alive as opposed to that other thing.

String.Source: In any case, if there's a way to make you better in combat, I'm all for it.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，只要有办法提高你的战斗力，我都完全赞成。

String.Source: I say we scour the halls of the Arcanaeum in Winterhold. There must be a book there somewhere I can understand.
String.Dest: 我们我们要仔细找找冬堡的秘藏馆，我想一定有一本书，我可以或多或少看懂一点。

String.Source: In any case, if there's a way to make you better in combat, I'm all for it.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，只要有办法提高你的战斗力，我都完全赞成。

String.Source: Ha-ha, have your fun. But in all honesty, I do think I might be able to learn a spell or two. I mean, I learned bladebinding easily enough.
String.Dest: 哈哈,有你的.不过说真心话，我觉得我有能力学那么一两个魔法.我是说,我学武器召唤术很轻松.

String.Source: So what do you think is the best way to tap your limitless potential?
String.Dest: 你觉得什么是最好的方法来发掘你无限的潜力？

String.Source: I say we scour the halls of the Arcanaeum in Winterhold. There must be a book there somewhere I can understand.
String.Dest: 我们我们要仔细找找冬堡的秘藏馆，我想一定有一本书，我可以或多或少看懂一点。

String.Source: So what do you think is the best way to tap your limitless potential?
String.Dest: 你觉得什么是最好的方法来发掘你无限的潜力？

String.Source: So we've reached a consensus then. I'm not a hapless idiot after all. Just hapless.
String.Dest: 所以我们已经达成共识了。我不是个倒霉的白痴，只是单纯的倒霉罢了。

String.Source: I agree with Olivia. The tomes failed you.
String.Dest: 我跟奥莉薇雅想的一样。那些书辜负了你的期望。

String.Source: Well, I used to think so, but now that I'm thinking about learning more spells, I probably should describe them with a few less expletives.
String.Dest: 嗯，我以前也是这样，但现在我我在考虑多学些魔法的事儿，我形容它们应该少些脏话。

String.Source: It's always some wizard's fault. They're just bad people in general.
String.Dest: 都是法师们的错。他们大部分都是坏人。

String.Source: I'll still hate them of course. I think I'll always be a bladebinder at heart. But maybe a bladebinder who's one by choice, not by skill.
String.Dest: 我当然还是恨他。我觉得自己会永远发自内心地做一个 bladebinder 。不过这 bladebinder 是一个选择，而不是技能。

String.Source: It's always some wizard's fault. They're just bad people in general.
String.Dest: 都是法师们的错。他们大部分都是坏人。

String.Source: If that were true, wouldn't every child from here to Valenwood be casting invisibility spells on our clothes?
String.Dest: 如果这是真的，难道每一个从威木省来这里的孩子都能在我们的衣服上施展无形的法术吗？

String.Source: Stop making excuses. Spell tomes are so easy a child could figure them out.
String.Dest: 别找理由了，法术书简单的连个小孩都能弄明白。.

String.Source: Unless the children of this generation are far more respectful of their elders than mine. Such a shame.
String.Dest: 现在的孩子对于长辈的态度远不如我小的时候恭敬，真丢人。

String.Source: Stop making excuses. Spell tomes are so easy a child could figure them out.
String.Dest: 别找理由了，法术书简单的连个小孩都能弄明白。.

String.Source: Oh, I never miss an opportunity to attribute my failings to others.
String.Dest: 哦，我不会错过任何一个把自己的失败归咎于他人的机会。

String.Source: Way to pass the blame onto somebody else.
String.Dest: 这样的责任推给别人。

String.Source: Just the other day I was questioning my ability to lead when I realized how much easier it is to follow you instead. See? All your fault.
String.Dest: 前两天我还挣扎着怀疑我的领导能力，现在我觉得跟着你来得简单多了。。你看，都是你的错。

String.Source: Way to pass the blame onto somebody else.
String.Dest: 这样的责任推给别人。

String.Source: Any questions now that we have time to relax?
String.Dest: 我们现在有时间休息吗？

String.Source: Yes, I have one. This Olivia Meronin character you met in Winterhold. Is it true what she says?
String.Dest: 对，我想起来了。那位你在冬堡见到的奥莉薇雅·梅洛妮，她说的是不是真的？

String.Source: Any questions now that we have time to relax?
String.Dest: 我们现在有时间休息吗？

String.Source: You know, the bit about students not failing so much as instructors failing to teach them.
String.Dest: 就是那所谓的防止教育者教育失败同时受教者归于堕落的事儿啦，你懂的。.

String.Source: Any questions now that we have time to relax?
String.Dest: 我们现在有时间休息吗？

String.Source: I mean, maybe it isn't my fault I can't cast a spell. Maybe it's the fault of the wizards who write those blasted spell tomes!
String.Dest: 我的意思是, 有可能不是我的原因导致这个法术出错. 有可能是写这些混账法术书的巫师弄错了!

String.Source: Where do you think we should go next?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们接下来该去哪?

String.Source: So it's Rumarin's turn to make a decision. Bold move on your part, seeing as I'm half a halfwit.
String.Dest: 现在轮到罗美勒决定了. Bold 挪到你的位置上去, 看看你有没有我一半精明.

String.Source: Where do you think we should go next?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们接下来该去哪?

String.Source: Just remember to point the finger elsewhere when things go wrong, otherwise I'm likely to pull it and make some sort of crude noise.
String.Dest: 只需记住，当事情出错了的时候，要责怪别的人，否则我可能会逃走，还会发出些粗杂的噪音。

String.Source: Where do you think we should go next?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们接下来该去哪?

String.Source: But I digress. I was in Riverwood listening to this halfwit tell me about the story behind the Sleeping Giant Inn.
String.Dest: 可是我开小差了，当时正在河木镇 听着这个弱智跟我讲沉睡巨人旅店的背景故事。

String.Source: Where do you think we should go next?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们接下来该去哪?

String.Source: Naturally, as he was twice as smart as I am, I was intrigued. Supposedly there's an actual Sleeping Giant living somewhere in Falkreath.
String.Dest: 毫无疑问，他比我要聪明两倍，我被耍了。或许在佛克瑞斯还真住着个沉睡巨人呢。

String.Source: Where are you headed now?
String.Dest: 你现在要前往何处?

String.Source: Oh, I have a friend who works the stables at Windhelm which serves as my unofficial home when I'm not wandering Tamriel.
String.Dest: Oh, 我有个朋友在风舵城的马厩工作在我不在泰姆瑞尔大陆的时候那就算是我临时的家.

String.Source: However, if you by chance need a companion to share stories with, and occasionally a back to talk behind, you have mine.
String.Dest: 如果你正好需要一个能与你分享你故事的人，或是想时不时转过身来聊两句，那么我就是那个人。

String.Source: Where are you headed now?
String.Dest: 你现在要前往何处?

String.Source: Unless you have some questions you want to ask me first. You know, to find out if this vessel's seaworthy, so to speak.
String.Dest: 除非你想先问我一些问题。打个比方，问问这艘船的适航能力。

String.Source: Where are you headed now?
String.Dest: 你现在要前往何处?

String.Source: You must not be a very good adventurer then, but you'd make an excellent priest.
String.Dest: 你不会是个很好的冒险家，但你会成为一个好牧师。

String.Source: I honor the dead, and would never steal from them.
String.Dest: 我尊重死者，从不偷他们的东西。

String.Source: Which reminds me of an excellent con man I once knew. All he did was dress in a monk's attire and people simply handed him their money.
String.Dest: 这让我想起了我曾经认识的一个优秀的骗子。只要他一穿上修道士的衣服，人们就会不假思索的给他捐钱。

String.Source: I honor the dead, and would never steal from them.
String.Dest: 我尊重死者，从不偷他们的东西。

String.Source: No, priests don't steal from the dead. They do, however, steal from the living.
String.Dest: 不，牧师才不会从死人那里偷东西。无论如何，他们要偷也是从活人身上偷。

String.Source: I honor the dead, and would never steal from them.
String.Dest: 我尊重死者，从不偷他们的东西。

String.Source: Terrible. Whose idea was it for me to open a store? Mine? Well, that's the last time I'm listening to that fool!
String.Dest: 糟透了。当初到底是谁提出说要我开店的？我吗？哦好吧，这辈子我再也不自己拿主意了。

String.Source: How's the business faring?
String.Dest: 生意还好吗？

String.Source: I can't even come up with a decent name. I was tossing around a few ideas earlier, and they were all horrible.
String.Dest: 我甚至想不出一个体面的名字。我之前扔掉了一些想法，因为它们都太糟糕了。

String.Source: How's the business faring?
String.Dest: 生意还好吗？

String.Source: And I mean horrible as in literally inducing "horror." Would you like to hear them? No? Well too bad.
String.Dest: 我的意思是horrible这个词差不多是从"horror" 这个词里诞生的。你想听听吗？不想？真可惜。

String.Source: How's the business faring?
String.Dest: 生意还好吗？

String.Source: Let's see...I counted the amount of lint in my belly button...ten pieces today.
String.Dest: 看看……我数了数肚脐眼里的线头儿……今天有10根。

String.Source: How was your day?
String.Dest: 你今天过得怎么样？

String.Source: I organized everything in our home alphabetically, then put it all back.
String.Dest: 我把我们家里的所有东西都按字母排列收拾整理了一通，然后把它们恢复一样一样摆放回去。

String.Source: How was your day?
String.Dest: 你今天过得怎么样？

String.Source: I read a book from cover to cover, which is to say I read the front one twice.
String.Dest: I read a book from cover to cover, which is to say I read the front one twice.

String.Source: How was your day?
String.Dest: 你今天过得怎么样？

String.Source: I picked up a broom and handed it to our housecarl. Or maybe it was the mannequin.
String.Dest: 我捡起一把扫帚递给我们的侍卫。或者别的装饰人偶啥的。

String.Source: How was your day?
String.Dest: 你今天过得怎么样？

String.Source: I thought a learned how to conjure a new sword today, but it turned out it was the same one everyone else is using.
String.Dest: 我正在思考今天刚学的召唤一把新的长剑的魔法，但是事实证明召唤出来的长剑和别人用的没啥区别。

String.Source: How was your day?
String.Dest: 你今天过得怎么样？

String.Source: Then I took a nap and counted my lint again. I even gave them names. The big one is "Belly-marco." How was your day?
String.Dest: 然后我打了个盹然后又数了数我身上的线头，我甚至给它们起了名字。大点的这个叫“肚子上的马可”。话说回来你今天过得如何？

String.Source: How was your day?
String.Dest: 你今天过得怎么样？

String.Source: For dinner? You mean you want me to cook? Well, that's a fantastic idea, because I happen to be an excellent one.
String.Dest: 做晚餐？你的意思是要我去烧菜吗？哦好吧，这是个绝妙的主意，因为我恰好是个超级棒的厨师。

String.Source: What's for dinner?
String.Dest: 晚餐是什么?

String.Source: Tonight I think I'm going to make seared slaughterfish with a side of steamed carrots and fried cabbage.
String.Dest: 今晚我打算做以蒸胡萝卜及油炸卷心菜为配菜的碳烤食人鱼。

String.Source: What's for dinner?
String.Dest: 晚餐是什么?

String.Source: Or we can cook whatever you brought home. You know, chewy, four-day old mystery meat.
String.Dest: 或者我们能用你带回家的东西做顿饭。像是陈了四天根本嚼不烂的肉什么的。

String.Source: What's for dinner?
String.Dest: 晚餐是什么?

String.Source: Why yes. Earlier today I almost stepped on a spider, and when I opened the door to let it out some dust in the corner of there moved a bit.
String.Dest: 是的，怎么啦？今天早些时候我差点踩到一只蜘蛛，当我打开门让它出去的时候那边角落的灰尘又挪动了一点。

String.Source: Any interesting things happen while I was gone?
String.Dest: 我离开的时候发生了什么有趣的事吗？

String.Source: Why yes. While you were out there slaying dragons and such, I was here agonizing over how to eat in bed without staining the sheets.
String.Dest: 为什么是呢。当你出门去做屠龙之类事情的时候，我只是在这为如何在床上吃东西同时又不弄脏床单而苦恼。

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 你有什么心事吗？

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 有什么想法？

String.Source: So what I'm saying is, this marriage is perfect and I wouldn't change a thing.
String.Dest: So what I'm saying is, this marriage is perfect and I wouldn't change a thing.

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 你有什么心事吗？

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 有什么想法？

String.Source: Why, a homecooked meal of course! What's in it? Would you believe me if I said magic?
String.Dest: 为什么，当然是一顿家常菜！里面有什么？如果我说有魔法你信不信？

String.Source: What's for dinner?
String.Dest: 晚餐是什么?

String.Source: Okay, okay, it's a loaf of bread and a bowl of cabbage stew. Sometimes even I get too lazy to cook, and by sometimes I mean six days a week.
String.Dest: 行吧，行吧，就是一条面包和一碗卷心菜汤。有时候连我都懒得下厨，我说“有时”的意思是一个星期有六天都这样。

String.Source: What's for dinner?
String.Dest: 晚餐是什么?

String.Source: Better than the last.
String.Dest: 比最后一名好点儿。

String.Source: A fine day is it not?
String.Dest: 很棒的一天，不是吗？

String.Source: Exactly.
String.Dest: 就是这样。

String.Source: Sentences?
String.Dest: 宣判？

String.Source: That's rather perceptive of you. I'm actually an inch shorter than the average High Elf. Wait, that came out wrong. Well, you know what I mean.
String.Dest: 你还真是颇有洞察力啊。我的确是比普通的高精灵矮上那么一英寸。等等，那么说貌似有点儿不对。呃，你懂我的意思吗。

String.Source: I guess that means you're not a Thalmor.
String.Dest: 我猜那意味着是你不是个梭默.

String.Source: You mean do two things at the same time? And fashion a ward? Hmm...it's almost like juggling. And I'm only half terrible at that. Let's do this.
String.Dest: 你的意思是在同时做两件事吗？还得制造一个结界？嗯……这几乎像是在玩儿杂耍。我对你的建议感觉不错。让我们来干吧。

String.Source: Just concentrate and breathe deeply.
String.Dest: 请集中精力并深呼吸。

String.Source: Oh I get it. You're trying to stir my survival instinct. Yes, right in the face. But not really. You know what I mean.
String.Dest: 哦我明白了。你试着挑起我的求生本能。是啊，全写在脸上了。但不怎么成功，你懂得。

String.Source: Don't worry, I got it. Just shoot you in the face, er, feet.
String.Dest: 别担心，我懂的。只要击中你的脸，er，脚。

String.Source: Wait, I don't like your tone. You do realize I want you to aim at my feet, right? Suddenly I'm wondering if you got that part.
String.Dest: 等会,我不喜欢你说话的语气。你明白我是想让你瞄着我的脚，对吧？ 这让我开始好奇你是否有脚。

String.Source: Sure, why not. Sounds like it could be some fun.
String.Dest: 好啊好啊，听起来还真有点意思。

String.Source: Well, I don't want you to actually hit me. I just want you to aim near my feet. You can do that, right?
String.Dest: 好吧，我不是想让你真的对着我打，我只希望你能瞄准我的脚附近。你能做到的，对吧？

String.Source: That sounds incredibly dangerous. I could kill you.
String.Dest: 这听起来非常危险。我可以杀了你。

String.Source: Oh? Who is it? It's not General Tullius is it? That would be a shocker.
String.Dest: 哎呦?这是谁啊?这不是图留斯将军吗?这太令人震惊了。

String.Source: Alright. I think I know someone who can help teach you a spell.
String.Dest: 好吧，我想我知道一个可以教你法术的人。

String.Source: You know what they say, second time's the charm. Or was it the third time? Does that mean this next one will be a failure too?
String.Dest: 你知道他们是怎么说，两次。或者，第三次？这是不是意味着下次也会失败？

String.Source: Okay, there might be another mage that can help you.
String.Dest: 好吧，或许别的法师能帮上你的忙。

String.Source: This mage has to be the one. I mean, it's not as if I'm some one trick bladebinder wearing imitation robes. That would be a shocking twist.
String.Dest: 这个法师可能就是那个人了。我是说，他不像我，穿着法袍却用召唤剑肉搏。这样的剧本会是一个神转折。

String.Source: I know one more mage that is a bit unorthodox.
String.Dest: 据我所知，可不止一个法师踏上了异端的道路。

String.Source: No...it's almost as if I don't have the talent to be anything more than a bladebinder...but that would mean I'm not perfect.
String.Dest: 不……貌似我没有任何超过武器召唤者的天赋……而这意味着我不是完美的。

String.Source: It doesn't appear as if our strategy is working.
String.Dest: 看样子不像是我们的计划生效的节奏。

String.Source: A stunning revelation. I never saw it coming.
String.Dest: 一个惊人的发现。我真没想过这种事。

String.Source: It doesn't appear as if our strategy is working.
String.Dest: 看样子不像是我们的计划生效的节奏。

String.Source: Of course, we could try one last thing. Otero once said if you want to learn to juggle swords, it does no good to practice with wooden ones.
String.Dest: 当然，我们可以最后试试。奥特罗曾说过如果你想要学会如何驾驭剑，那就不该用木剑来练习。

String.Source: It doesn't appear as if our strategy is working.
String.Dest: 看样子不像是我们的计划生效的节奏。

String.Source: This is going to sound crazy, but maybe if you pummeled me with a spell, my survival instinct will kick in and I'll fashion a ward.
String.Dest: 听起来真疯狂，但如果你往我身上扔魔法，我的生存本能就会启动，我会立即躲开。

String.Source: It doesn't appear as if our strategy is working.
String.Dest: 看样子不像是我们的计划生效的节奏。

String.Source: Oh know, I'm not falling for that. You heard what Arngeir said. I talk to one of them and I'll probably die.
String.Dest: 哦，知道了，我不会上当的。你听到arngeir说。我和其中的任一个交谈就会死。

String.Source: How should I know? Ask one of the Greybeards.
String.Dest: 要我怎么知道？你得去问灰胡子。

String.Source: Still, food for thought, in case this horn turns out to be, you know, the kind dremora have on their heads.
String.Dest: 这值得慎重考虑，万一这号角最终被查明是，你知道的，dremora头上的那种。

String.Source: How should I know? Ask one of the Greybeards.
String.Dest: 要我怎么知道？你得去问灰胡子。

String.Source: And it's good to see you haven't lost that splendid body of yours, my love.
String.Dest: And it's good to see you haven't lost that splendid body of yours, my love.

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor, my husband.
String.Dest: 看到你没丧失幽默感这很好，我的丈夫。

String.Source: I don't know if we could find a housecarl willing to take care of two cripples.
String.Dest: I don't know if we could find a housecarl willing to take care of two cripples.

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor, my husband.
String.Dest: 看到你没丧失幽默感这很好，我的丈夫。

String.Source: Not that I wouldn't be willing to make it work. Or that I only care about your body. Did I mention how much I love you and that I'm glad your home?
String.Dest: 我并不是不希望它能够顺利运作起来，我只是更担心你的身体。我有表达过我对你的爱有多深以及对你平安回来有多么地喜悦么？

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor, my husband.
String.Dest: 看到你没丧失幽默感这很好，我的丈夫。

String.Source: And it's good to see you haven't lost your voice, with all that shouting you were asked to do.
String.Dest: 在你吼完之后你居然还没哑，挺不错的。

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor.
String.Dest: 见你还没丧失你那幽默感，真好。

String.Source: Did you plug your ears when you shouted Alduin down? I have to say there were plenty of times out on the road I wish I had.
String.Dest: 在你把奥杜因吼下来的时候塞上自己的耳朵了吗？我得说在路上有很多次我都希望自己捂上耳朵了。

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor.
String.Dest: 见你还没丧失你那幽默感，真好。

String.Source: It took days to get rid of the ringing. I would've used a potion, but I lost it in a game of iron hearts. Plus I didn't want to offend you.
String.Dest: 我没有冒犯你的意思。我花了好几天才从耳鸣里解脱出来。我本来想用些药水治疗的，但是我在铁心赌博里把它们都输掉了。

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor.
String.Dest: 见你还没丧失你那幽默感，真好。

String.Source: Anyways, good to have you back. I imagine you'll want to rest for a bit, but I'll be here if you need someone for your adventures.
String.Dest: Anyways, good to have you back. I imagine you'll want to rest for a bit, but I'll be here if you need someone for your adventures.

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor.
String.Dest: 见你还没丧失你那幽默感，真好。

String.Source: True, there isn't any downside to taking the guard at his word. Other than maybe building a deep-seeded mistrust of all Nord guards.
String.Dest: 确实用他的话说服守卫再好不过了。 除了可能会使所有的诺德守卫产生不信任.

String.Source: You could be right, but we can't take that chance.
String.Dest: 你也许是对的，但是我们不能冒这个险。

String.Source: Which I already have! So no harm, no foul.
String.Dest: 我已经有了！所以不算犯规。

String.Source: You could be right, but we can't take that chance.
String.Dest: 你也许是对的，但是我们不能冒这个险。

String.Source: Okay, you've convinced me. There's a dragon out there. And coincidentally, something warm running down my leg.
String.Dest: 好吧，我说服我了。外头有头龙，而且更巧的是，我的腿还在流血。

String.Source: You could be right, but we can't take that chance.
String.Dest: 你也许是对的，但是我们不能冒这个险。

String.Source: I am? I mean, of course I am! It all comes from having a wealth of experience and an extremely finicky stomach.
String.Dest: 我么？没错,正是本人！这一切都是源于丰富的各类经验还有一副挑剔至极的唇舌。.

String.Source: That's a wonderful idea. You are full of great suggestions.
String.Dest: 妙得一逼！你满是好点子啊。

String.Source: You should solicit me for advice more often. I have all sorts of opinions on all kinds of topics.
String.Dest: 你应该多问问我的观点。对于任何话题我都有很多要说的。

String.Source: That's a wonderful idea. You are full of great suggestions.
String.Dest: 妙得一逼！你满是好点子啊。

String.Source: Sure, they've all been altered to mimic whatever you want to hear, but that doesn't make me a lap dog. It just means I'm attentive.
String.Dest: 的确，他们都受训来模仿任何你想听到的声音，不过这并不意味着我是个爱奉承的家伙。这恰恰说明我比较体贴。

String.Source: That's a wonderful idea. You are full of great suggestions.
String.Dest: 妙得一逼！你满是好点子啊。

String.Source: And they have you to thank. Not me of course, I wasn't there, but while you were in that mine chipping ore, I was somewhere rooting you on in spirit.
String.Dest: And they have you to thank. Not me of course, I wasn't there, but while you were in that mine chipping ore, I was somewhere rooting you on in spirit.

String.Source: Madanach's dead. Markarth is free of the Forsworn.
String.Dest: 迈德纳奇死了，马卡斯城脱离了弃誓者掌控之下。

String.Source: And you did just what I would have done. It's good to have friends in high places, and the Silver-Bloods sit awfully high.
String.Dest: 你只是做了我应该做的。有朋友在高层是很好的，而且银血家族的地位十分的高。

String.Source: Madanach's dead. Markarth is free of the Forsworn.
String.Dest: 迈德纳奇死了，马卡斯城脱离了弃誓者掌控之下。

String.Source: Sure, Madanach was a King, but a King in Rags. That's like being the Prince of Poverty or something. I'm sure that's why you chose Thonar, right?
String.Dest: 肯定， Madanach是一位国王，但是一位褴褛国王。或者是贫穷王子或者别的什么。我很肯定这就是你为什么选择了托纳尔，是这样么？

String.Source: Madanach's dead. Markarth is free of the Forsworn.
String.Dest: 迈德纳奇死了，马卡斯城脱离了弃誓者掌控之下。

String.Source: Which is a good thing right? It's not like that army of Forsworn you just unleashed is much of a threat, is it?
String.Dest: 你刚解放的那股弃誓者军队没有那么有威胁，不是吗？是个好事呢，不是吗？

String.Source: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.
String.Dest: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.

String.Source: Oh, don't get me wrong. I'm not questioning your decision. I'm sure you have it all figured out. I mean, I can't see more than half a step ahead.
String.Dest: Oh, don't get me wrong. I'm not questioning your decision. I'm sure you have it all figured out. I mean, I can't see more than half a step ahead.

String.Source: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.
String.Dest: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.

String.Source: It would just help if you could explain it to me, me being dumber than a snowberry and all.
String.Dest: 我想我需要你和我解释一下。我可比雪浆果之类的笨多啦。

String.Source: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.
String.Dest: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.

String.Source: The first part being more enjoyable than the last part, I bet. Not that saving the College isn't important to somebody.
String.Dest: 我打赌，第一部分比最后一部分更为愉快。对某些人来说，拯救学院并非无关紧要。

String.Source: Ancano is dead, and Winterhold is safe.
String.Dest: 安卡诺死了，冬堡安全了。

String.Source: But there's something about mages like Ancano that really pestles my mortar. They're always looking down on us bladebinders.
String.Dest: 但是有些像安卡诺那样的巫师真烦。他们总是看不起我们召唤武器的法师。

String.Source: Ancano is dead, and Winterhold is safe.
String.Dest: 安卡诺死了，冬堡安全了。

String.Source: So I'm not a real mage. So what? At least I'm still alive.
String.Dest: 我不是一个真正的法师，那又怎样？至少我还活着。

String.Source: Ancano is dead, and Winterhold is safe.
String.Dest: 安卡诺死了，冬堡安全了。

String.Source: Relieved probably isn't the right word. More like ecstatic. You see, we're married, and as my spouse, I'd be obliged to follow you wherever.
String.Dest: 如释重负可能不是个合适的形容，这更像是欣喜若狂。你瞧，我和我的爱人终于结婚了，我会心怀感激的跟着你到任何地方的。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (龙临堡) 这趟旅程只有一个名额了。但你看起来好像松了一口气。

String.Source: But here I am, escaping on a technicality. Now what am I going to do with all these excuses?
String.Dest: 我通过一些手段逃脱了那里，但是我该怎么解释这一切呢?

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (龙临堡) 这趟旅程只有一个名额了。但你看起来好像松了一口气。

String.Source: I'd probably just get in your way. And you're strong enough to do this on your own. See? That was two of my better ones. But I've got more.
String.Dest: 我快要赶上你了。而你足够强壮去自己做这事儿。明白了吗？这是两个我最好的人了，但我现在要多有一个了。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (龙临堡) 这趟旅程只有一个名额了。但你看起来好像松了一口气。

String.Source: But really, you don't need me. I hear Alduin only eats worlds. You're not a world, are you? Then you'll be fine.
String.Dest: 但说真的，你用不着我的。我听说奥杜因只会吞噬世界。你又不是”世界“，你会没事的。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (龙临堡) 这趟旅程只有一个名额了。但你看起来好像松了一口气。

String.Source: Relieved probably isn't the right word. More like ecstatic. You see, I consider us friends, and as friends, I'd be obliged to follow you wherever.
String.Dest: 用解脱这个词也许不合适，更像是狂喜。你看，我认为我们是朋友了，作为朋友，你让我跟你去哪我都乐意之至。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (龙临堡) 这趟旅程只有一个名额了。但你看起来好像松了一口气。

String.Source: But here I am, escaping on a technicality. Now what am I going to do with all these excuses?
String.Dest: 我通过一些手段逃脱了那里，但是我该怎么解释这一切呢?

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (龙临堡) 这趟旅程只有一个名额了。但你看起来好像松了一口气。

String.Source: I'd probably just get in your way. And you're strong enough to do this on your own. See? That was two of my better ones. But I've got more.
String.Dest: 我快要赶上你了。而你足够强壮去自己做这事儿。明白了吗？这是两个我最好的人了，但我现在要多有一个了。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (龙临堡) 这趟旅程只有一个名额了。但你看起来好像松了一口气。

String.Source: But really, you don't need me. I hear Alduin only eats worlds. You're not a world, are you? Then you'll be fine.
String.Dest: 但说真的，你用不着我的。我听说奥杜因只会吞噬世界。你又不是”世界“，你会没事的。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (龙临堡) 这趟旅程只有一个名额了。但你看起来好像松了一口气。

String.Source: She's charming enough, I suppose. Although I think she's mad at me.
String.Dest: 她对于我来说已经够迷人的了。尽管我觉得她还在生我的气。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Zora?
String.Dest: 你对佐拉有什么看法？

String.Source: There was a bug the size of finger crawling on her shoulder and I cringed. She might've thought I was cringing at her.
String.Dest: There was a bug the size of finger crawling on her shoulder and I cringed. She might've thought I was cringing at her.

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Zora?
String.Dest: 你对佐拉有什么看法？

String.Source: Which is preposterous. I'm very good at hiding my disgust. Just not with this bug. It was hideous.
String.Dest: 哪个荒唐. 我善于隐藏我的情感. 但对这虫子受不了. 太恶心了.

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Zora?
String.Dest: 你对佐拉有什么看法？

String.Source: Wow, did you read my mind? Or was it my facial expression? I call this one, "Bemused."
String.Dest: 喔，你能读懂我的思想? 或者我的面部表情？我把这个叫做”发呆。“

String.Source: (Companions Quest) You look like something's troubling you.
String.Dest: （战友团任务）你看起来有点困扰。

String.Source: In any case, I do have a quarrel. It's just that since you've joined the Companions, I feel like you'll be spending more time here.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，我确实有些恼怒。这仅仅是因为你已经加入了战友团，我觉得你会在这里花更多的时间。

String.Source: (Companions Quest) You look like something's troubling you.
String.Dest: （战友团任务）你看起来有点困扰。

String.Source: That means sleeping, frolicking, and eating. Now, I don't mind doing the same, but I'm wondering if we can do something about the menu.
String.Dest: 那意味着吃喝玩乐睡。我现在不介意做同样的事情，但我在想是否能在菜单上做点儿什么。

String.Source: (Companions Quest) You look like something's troubling you.
String.Dest: （战友团任务）你看起来有点困扰。

String.Source: It's a bit heavy on the meat, don't you think? Last time I checked, the Companions didn't sign a Green Pact.
String.Dest: 硬骨头啊，你不觉得么？上次我检查的时候，战友团还没有签署绿色条约。

String.Source: (Companions Quest) You look like something's troubling you.
String.Dest: （战友团任务）你看起来有点困扰。

String.Source: None whatsoever, although someone once told me a dash under the eyes blocks the glare from the sun. So does a hood.
String.Dest: 完全不是，虽然有人曾经告诉我，在眼睛下面画道线可以阻挡太阳的光线。兜帽也是一样。

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: In some parts of Tamriel, war paint is seen as a tribal mark for warriors.
String.Dest: 在泰姆瑞尔的一些地方，战纹被视作战士们所属部族的标记。

String.Source: What about in general? Do you know if there's any significance to war paint?
String.Dest: 那一般而言呢？你知道关于战痕的意义吗？

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: In the Summerset Isle, paint can serve as a family crest or be worn as a form of art, which I believe led to the development of rouge and blush.
String.Dest: 在夏景群岛省，涂料可以充当一个家徽，或者作为一种行为艺术来穿戴，因此我相信这就是导致口红和腮红发展蒸蒸日上的原因。

String.Source: What about in general? Do you know if there's any significance to war paint?
String.Dest: 那一般而言呢？你知道关于战痕的意义吗？

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: Of course, in many parts of the world, excessive makeup is nothing more than an indicator that you will service genitalia for gold.
String.Dest: 当然了，在很多其他地方，浓妆艳抹不过是表示你愿意提供性交易来的暗示。

String.Source: What about in general? Do you know if there's any significance to war paint?
String.Dest: 那一般而言呢？你知道关于战痕的意义吗？

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: And before you ask, my price is 100 septims and no kissing on the mouth. Okay, maybe once or twice. But no tongue.
String.Dest: And before you ask, my price is 100 septims and no kissing on the mouth. Okay, maybe once or twice. But no tongue.

String.Source: What about in general? Do you know if there's any significance to war paint?
String.Dest: 那一般而言呢？你知道关于战痕的意义吗？

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: Hey, I didn't study war paint application for 10 years at the Lythandus school in Cheydinhal to be mocked by an amateur! Good day!
String.Dest: 嘿，我在香丁赫尔的Lythandus学院学了十年战斗迷彩的应用可不是为了被一个外行嘲笑的！日安！

String.Source: Maybe with a better design it would look fierce. Yours look like whiskers.
String.Dest: 也许一个更好的设计会让它看起来更凶残。你这看起来就跟胡子似的。

String.Source: At least, that's what I'd say if I didn't think whiskers were a compliment. Which they are.
String.Dest: 至少，如果我不认为“刮胡人”是一种恭维我就会这么说。不过它们其实是一种恭维。

String.Source: Maybe with a better design it would look fierce. Yours look like whiskers.
String.Dest: 也许一个更好的设计会让它看起来更凶残。你这看起来就跟胡子似的。

String.Source: Oh, I'm fine. Don't worry, that's not blood on my face, it's makeup. No, I'm sorry, "war paint."
String.Dest: 哦，我没事。不要担心,我脸上没血，这只是化妆，不，我很抱歉，“战痕”.

String.Source: Are you okay? The skeletons must have surprised you.
String.Dest: 你没事吧？那些骷髅是不是吓了你一跳。

String.Source: I was going to go for something more subtle like a wyvern mounting a cliff racer, but I thought that people might misinterpret the analogy.
String.Dest: I was going to go for something more subtle like a wyvern mounting a cliff racer, but I thought that people might misinterpret the analogy.

String.Source: Are you okay? The skeletons must have surprised you.
String.Dest: 你没事吧？那些骷髅是不是吓了你一跳。

String.Source: And besides, there wasn't enough room on my skin purse to begin with. So I decided to paint my face instead.
String.Dest: 更何况，我的皮包上实在是没有足够地方来绘画。所以我决定还是画花我的脸吧。

String.Source: Are you okay? The skeletons must have surprised you.
String.Dest: 你没事吧？那些骷髅是不是吓了你一跳。

String.Source: In any case, the name's Rumarin. Professional adventurer, bladebinder, and grave robber.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，我叫罗米勒。专业冒险家，召唤武器家，盗墓专家。

String.Source: Are you okay? The skeletons must have surprised you.
String.Dest: 你没事吧？那些骷髅是不是吓了你一跳。

String.Source: You're in denial. You're trying to cope with your fear.
String.Dest: 你在抗拒。你正在努力掩饰你的恐惧。

String.Source: What are you, my priest? Because if you are, then who was the lady who cured my witbane?
String.Dest: 你是什么人，我的祭祀吗？如果你是，那治好我脑残的那位女士又是谁啊？

String.Source: You're in denial. You're trying to cope with your fear.
String.Dest: 你在抗拒。你正在努力掩饰你的恐惧。

String.Source: Maybe she was just some crazy person. Maybe I still have witbane.
String.Dest: 或许她只是疯了而已，又或许只是我的魔障症还没治好。

String.Source: You're in denial. You're trying to cope with your fear.
String.Dest: 你在抗拒。你正在努力掩饰你的恐惧。

String.Source: Okay, you've convinced me. There's a dragon out there. And coincidentally, something warm running down my leg.
String.Dest: 好吧，你说服我了。外面有一条龙。巧合的是，有一股温热的液体顺着我的腿流下来了。

String.Source: Except Maven hates Honningbrew Mead. I believe she called it "bile."
String.Dest: 只是玛雯讨厌蜂蜜酒。我确信她叫它 "胆汁"。

String.Source: I'm sure that was the jealousy talking. It's like adopting someone else's child. They're only a brat until they you're own.
String.Dest: 我敢肯定那是出于嫉妒才说的话。就行就像要收养别人的孩子，在孩子成为你自己的之前，他们在你看来只是个乳臭未干的熊孩子一样。

String.Source: Except Maven hates Honningbrew Mead. I believe she called it "bile."
String.Dest: 只是玛雯讨厌蜂蜜酒。我确信她叫它 "胆汁"。

String.Source: You can suggest she bargain with Sabjorn now that he has no leverage. Just remind her how popular Honningbrew is with the Elves.
String.Dest: 你可以建议她和撒布乔恩讨价还价，既然他现在已经没有利用价值了。记得提醒她蜜酿酒是多么受到精灵的欢迎。

String.Source: Except Maven hates Honningbrew Mead. I believe she called it "bile."
String.Dest: 只是玛雯讨厌蜂蜜酒。我确信她叫它 "胆汁"。

String.Source: I don't know if that's true, by the way, but it sounds like it would be.
String.Dest: 我不知道这是不是真的，但是它听起来跟真的一样。

String.Source: Thonar locked me up. This was about revenge.
String.Dest: Thonar locked me up. This was about revenge.

String.Source: And the bloodthirsty murderers and savages we unleashed on The Reach? Just a means to an end.
String.Dest: 在瑞驰把嗜血的凶手跟未开化的野人放了出来？只是达到目的一种手段而已。

String.Source: Thonar locked me up. This was about revenge.
String.Dest: Thonar locked me up. This was about revenge.

String.Source: Oh, I'm not disagreeing with you. I totally get it. I'd kill all of the townsfolk for personal satisfaction. That's just the way the Gods made me.
String.Dest: 哦，我并不是在反对你。我很理解。我也会为了个人欲望的满足而把镇子里的人杀个干干净净的。我就是为此而生。

String.Source: Thonar locked me up. But revenge wasn't worth letting Madanach free.
String.Dest: 托纳尔害我进了监狱。不过就为报仇也不值得放迈德纳奇出去。

String.Source: True, and we can always kill Thonar later. That's the best part about loose ends. They can always be tied.
String.Dest: True, and we can always kill Thonar later. That's the best part about loose ends. They can always be tied.

String.Source: They may not have signed the Green Pact, but I have.
String.Dest: 他们可能还没签署绿色条约，但是我已经签了。

String.Source: Oh right. Religion. One of three topics I love to not discuss, next to politics and Ulundil's unfortunate haircut.
String.Dest: 哦,对了。宗教。我不喜欢讨论的话题之一，就像政治和阿伦迪尔的倒霉发型一样。

String.Source: They may not have signed the Green Pact, but I have.
String.Dest: 他们可能还没签署绿色条约，但是我已经签了。

String.Source: Well, I may not be able to discuss it, but I can still give you a look of disapproval. See if you can read this one.
String.Dest: 嗯，虽然我能给你意见，不过可以给你一个不赞成的表示。看你能否读得懂我的表情。

String.Source: I cringe at Zora all the time. Have you seen her face? It's horrifying.
String.Dest: 我一直害怕佐拉。你见过他的脸吗？真是太可怕了。

String.Source: Keep your voice down! You do realize she's standing right there, don't you? Although I'm not sure she can hear us. Too many blows to the head.
