String.Dest: 你小点声儿！你明明知道她就站在那儿，不是吗？虽然我不确定她能听见我们。脑袋被打傻了吧。

String.Source: I cringe at Zora all the time. Have you seen her face? It's horrifying.
String.Dest: 我一直害怕佐拉。你见过他的脸吗？真是太可怕了。

String.Source: But if we're being completely honest, I'm inclined to agree. I try and stare at the space between her eyebrows. That helps.
String.Dest: 坦白说，我比较同意你的说法。我试过，盯着她的眉心看。真的起作用了。

String.Source: Don't worry about it. Zora's tougher than she looks.
String.Dest: 不用担心。佐拉比她的外表厉害得多。

String.Source: Are you sure? Although I suppose that doesn't make her tough. Ants are tougher than they look, but I can still squish them easily enough.
String.Dest: 你确定？虽然我不认为那会使她变得粗暴。蚂蚁也比外表看起来要更粗暴，可我要捏死它们还是很轻松。

String.Source: Don't worry about it. Zora's tougher than she looks.
String.Dest: 不用担心。佐拉比她的外表厉害得多。

String.Source: But I guess I'm being too literal. You're saying she can handle a cringe or two. Which is precisely the answer I wanted to hear. No harm done.
String.Dest: 我想我太认真了，你说她会表演滑稽戏剧。我爱听这个。

String.Source: You don't look too concerned about the dragon.
String.Dest: 你好像对龙什么的毫不在意。

String.Source: You're assuming there's a dragon to be concerned about. I'm not so sure there is.
String.Dest: You're assuming there's a dragon to be concerned about. I'm not so sure there is.

String.Source: You don't look too concerned about the dragon.
String.Dest: 你好像对龙什么的毫不在意。

String.Source: I mean, do we really take this guard at his word? Maybe he wants an excuse to get off his shift.
String.Dest: 我是说，我们真的要怪这个守卫说错话了吗？也许他是想找个接口翘班呢。

String.Source: You don't look too concerned about the dragon.
String.Dest: 你好像对龙什么的毫不在意。

String.Source: If I had a septim for every time a guard lied to get off work, I'd have like, a hundred septims.
String.Dest: 如果一枚金币每次都能骗到一个守卫让他下班，我想要一百个金币。

String.Source: You don't look too concerned about the dragon.
String.Dest: 你好像对龙什么的毫不在意。

String.Source: Maybe that's not a lot of gold, but it's a lot of lies.
String.Dest: 或许这并不是很大一笔钱，但这是用一大堆谎言换来的。

String.Source: Are you sad to see Honningbrew out of business?
String.Dest: 你看到蜂蜜酒地破产难过吗?

String.Source: I am. I'm a very picky person, and it's very hard to find a Nord beverage that suits my palate.
String.Dest: 是的。我是一个非常挑剔的人，能找到一瓶合乎我口味的诺德饮料真是太难了。

String.Source: Are you sad to see Honningbrew out of business?
String.Dest: 你看到蜂蜜酒地破产难过吗?

String.Source: Honningbrew was that drink. I just don't get why Maven couldn't keep Sabjorn on her payroll and just re-brand his mead as "Black-Briar Golden."
String.Dest: 那种饮品叫做蜂蜜酒。我只是不明白为什么玛雯不直接雇佣撒布乔恩，而是把他的蜜酒重新打上”黑荆棘极品酒“的商标。

String.Source: Are you sad to see Honningbrew out of business?
String.Dest: 你看到蜂蜜酒地破产难过吗?

String.Source: Maybe it's not too late. I can see it now. Maven says "Sorry I ruined your business Sabjorn, but your mead was just too tasty!"
String.Dest: 也许还为时不晚。现在我明白了。玛雯说 “抱歉我毁了你的生意撒布乔恩，但你的蜜酒实在是太美味了！”

String.Source: Are you sad to see Honningbrew out of business?
String.Dest: 你看到蜂蜜酒地破产难过吗?

String.Source: And Sabjorn would say, "Is that the reason? I thought you just didn't like me. Why didn't you say so sooner!"
String.Dest: 然后撒布乔恩就会说，“这就是一切的原因？我还以为你仅仅是不喜欢我。你怎么不早说！”

String.Source: Are you sad to see Honningbrew out of business?
String.Dest: 你看到蜂蜜酒地破产难过吗?

String.Source: And Maven would be like "I don't know! No hard feelings, then?" Then they would have a laugh and share a sweetroll.
String.Dest: And Maven would be like "I don't know! No hard feelings, then?" Then they would have a laugh and share a sweetroll.

String.Source: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.
String.Dest: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.

String.Source: Yes, and it's quite clear who wins there. Thonar has all that silver, and Madanach had rags.
String.Dest: Yes, and it's quite clear who wins there. Thonar has all that silver, and Madanach had rags.

String.Source: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.
String.Dest: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.

String.Source: Although maybe rags are like coin for savages. They'll certainly keep you warmer at night.
String.Dest: 虽然说破布头之于我们就像赛普汀于之蛮族一样无价值，但在漫漫寒夜之中它们还是能驱走你的寒意的.

String.Source: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.
String.Dest: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.

String.Source: See, and that's where I'm confused. Thonar had all that silver, and Madanach has...well, rags.
String.Dest: See, and that's where I'm confused. Thonar had all that silver, and Madanach has...well, rags.

String.Source: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.
String.Dest: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.

String.Source: Are they magical rags? Well, in that case, I suppose they might be worth something. Although I still would be cautious in wearing it.
String.Dest: 他们是附魔的麻衫吗？呃，在这种情况下，我想他们可能有些价值。虽然对我来说，穿还是不穿，这是个问题。

String.Source: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.
String.Dest: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.

String.Source: It doesn't come with quite the same prestige as say, a robe from the College of Winterhold.
String.Dest: 冬堡学院来的法师像传闻中那样有威望的嘛。

String.Source: I didn't realize you were so sensitive.
String.Dest: 我不理解你为什么如此敏感。

String.Source: Yes, especially when it comes to my gangly figure and my nirnroot collection. Mock that and I'm a liable to end up in tears.
String.Dest: 没错，特别是谈到我修长的身材和我收集的奈恩根时。别人嘲笑我这些方面的时候，我的小泪腺实在是把持不住。

String.Source: I didn't realize you were so sensitive.
String.Dest: 我不理解你为什么如此敏感。

String.Source: But no, I suppose I get a bit defensive when someone asks me whether "I know magic."
String.Dest: 不是，当有人问我是否懂得魔法的时候，我会变得有一些抗拒。

String.Source: I didn't realize you were so sensitive.
String.Dest: 我不理解你为什么如此敏感。

String.Source: You know, not every High Elf is a wizard, and not every spell is designed for sorcery. Of course, it's kind of my fault for playing along.
String.Dest: 你知道吗，并不是每个高精灵都是巫师，也并不是每个法术都是为魔法师设计的，当然，好像是我的错，因为我一直执着于此。

String.Source: I'm not a world, but people think the world of me.
String.Dest: 这不是我的世界，但人们认为这是我的世界。

String.Source: True, but I don't think Alduin eats metaphors. If he did, nobody would give two septims about his diet.
String.Dest: 是的，但我不认为奥杜因会食言。如果他真的破坏了预言，也没人会愿意奖励他的节食的。

String.Source: I'm not a world, but people think the world of me.
String.Dest: 这不是我的世界，但人们认为这是我的世界。

String.Source: I guess you've noticed, I'm not so great at goodbyes. Otero told me it was like the end of a story. Like closing a book.
String.Dest: 你应该注意到了，我不是那么喜欢分离，奥特罗告诉我分手就好像故事的结尾，好像合上一本书。

String.Source: I'm not a world, but people think the world of me.
String.Dest: 这不是我的世界，但人们认为这是我的世界。

String.Source: Well, I hope this one still has some pages to read.
String.Dest: 好吧，我还没看够呢。

String.Source: I'm not a world, but people think the world of me.
String.Dest: 这不是我的世界，但人们认为这是我的世界。

String.Source: In any case, I'll be with you in spirit, which is another way of saying I'll be at the tavern drinking. Good luck.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我的精神与你同在，这其实是”我会在酒馆儿喝酒“的另一种说法。祝你好运。

String.Source: As a matter of fact, we did. It was when your back was turned.
String.Dest: 事实上，我们做了。那是在你转过身去的时候。

String.Source: Oh right. I suppose you couldn't have just tapped me on the shoulder?
String.Dest: 好吧。但你就能不只拍拍我的肩膀吗？

String.Source: As a matter of fact, we did. It was when your back was turned.
String.Dest: 事实上，我们做了。那是在你转过身去的时候。

String.Source: You know, just to say something like, "Look Rumarin, one of the Gods of all creation, Jephre, has come to Jorrvaskr for lunch and tea."
String.Dest: 比如，你只要说说"看看罗米勒, 创世诸神之一： 杰佛瑞, 来到了月瓦斯卡用餐喝茶。“

String.Source: As a matter of fact, we did. It was when your back was turned.
String.Dest: 事实上，我们做了。那是在你转过身去的时候。

String.Source: Leave it to me to miss out on everything.
String.Dest: 我为了他错过了一切。

String.Source: If you know it's a gimmick, why buy them yourself?
String.Dest: 你要是知道里面有问题，为什么还要自己买下来？

String.Source: Well consider the fact that bandits are twice as naive as the average customer looks. Thus one ruse leads to another.
String.Dest: 考虑到事实上那些强盗比一般顾客看上去还要蠢上一倍。要用另一种法子来。

String.Source: If you know it's a gimmick, why buy them yourself?
String.Dest: 你要是知道里面有问题，为什么还要自己买下来？

String.Source: Not that these robes are only good for conjuring a story. The enchantment is far from spectacular, but on occasion it does help me conserve magicka.
String.Dest: 这些法袍并不只在编造故事的时候好用。在关键时刻，它们能帮我节省法力值。

String.Source: If you know it's a gimmick, why buy them yourself?
String.Dest: 你要是知道里面有问题，为什么还要自己买下来？

String.Source: Unfortunately I'm not familiar with bound armor spells, and I've yet to find a book on the subject in my travels across Skyrim.
String.Dest: 不幸的是我不会束缚铠甲咒语，并且游遍整个天际我也没能找到记载它的法术书。

String.Source: Okay. My plan is to kill every bandit we see until we find him.
String.Dest: 好吧. 我的计划是干掉每一个强盗 直到我们找到他。

String.Source: We could do that. Or we could go to Knifepoint Ridge. The bandits he was dealing with kind of live there. Your choice though.
String.Dest: 我们能行。或者我们可以去刀尖山脊。强盗们会解决掉所有活着的东西。总之这是你的选择。

String.Source: Do you have an idea where these bandits took him?
String.Dest: 强盗们把他带到哪儿去，你有线索吗？

String.Source: More than an idea. I know the exact location of their hideout. I was pretending to be his bodyguard when he made the deal.
String.Dest: 不只是个点子而已。我知道他们藏身之处的准确位置。以前他做生意的时候我是扮作保镖的。

String.Source: Do you have an idea where these bandits took him?
String.Dest: 强盗们把他带到哪儿去，你有线索吗？

String.Source: Knifepoint Ridge, was the name, over in Falkreath. If he's alive, we'll find him there.
String.Dest: 如果他还活着，我们能在佛克瑞斯的刀剑山脉中找到他。

String.Source: So we're basically going to have to rescue a pile of bones.
String.Dest: 所以我们基本上是去救一堆骨头。

String.Source: No, I'm sure there will be plenty of guts, blood, flesh...and what's the other thing? Oh right, scales! I almost forgot about the scales.
String.Dest: 不，我敢肯定会有很多的内脏，鲜血，生肉……其他还有什么？哦，该死，鳞片。我总是会忘记那些鳞片。

String.Source: Excellent. The bandits will soften him up, and he'll do whatever we ask.
String.Dest: 很好，那些土匪会让他服软的，到时候我们说什么他都得听。

String.Source: Good idea, although he really is only good at forgery. I mean, we could ask him to tell us bad jokes, but then I'd be out of a job.
String.Dest: 好主意, 尽管他只擅长造假. 我是指, 我们能叫他给咱们讲烂笑话, 但那时我或许失业了.

String.Source: He's all but skeever bait now. Any other ideas?
String.Dest: 他现在差不多成了雪鼠的食料了。还有别的主意吗？

String.Source: Well, I could try forging whatever it is you need myself. I can do a perfect forgery of an Elven bladebinder. Anything else, we'll need his help.
String.Dest: 好吧，我能试着给你锻造一些你想要自己用的东西。我能伪造一个完美的精灵剑鞘。至于别的什么的，我们就得找他帮忙了。

String.Source: It wouldn't hurt to look for him.
String.Dest: 它找到他不会伤害他。

String.Source: No, I imagine it's going to hurt either way. At least, for him. Bandits aren't the gentlest of forest creatures.
String.Dest: 不，我觉得两条路线都会受伤，至少就他而言如此。强盗可不是森林里最绅士的生物。

String.Source: This mad dark Elf. Is his name Raynes?
String.Dest: 这个发疯的黑暗精灵。他的名字是不是瑞纳斯？

String.Source: Oh, don't say his name out loud. If you say it three times, he'll visit you in your nightmares and stick a dagger up your nose or something.
String.Dest: 哦，别那么大声说他的名字。如果你说了三遍，他就会进到你的噩梦里，再用匕首割掉你的鼻子啥的。

String.Source: Given how often we break the law, let's hope we don't run into this zealot.
String.Dest: 想象我们是怎样轻松平常地违反法律, 还是希望我们不要遇到这样的狂热者吧.

String.Source: Yes, although there might be a significant bounty in it for us. Do bandits put out bounties? Like on guards they don't like? It would only be fair.
String.Dest: 强盗知道城里在通缉他们，但是强盗不会因为惧怕赏金就不惹事，就如同守卫不会因为盗贼不惹事就不会贴悬赏，这样才公平。

String.Source: You wear the robes of a college mage.
String.Dest: 你穿着一所魔法学院的衣服。

String.Source: Not quite. These are actually a cheap imitation, woven and enchanted to look like their more esteemed counterpart.
String.Dest: 不完全正确。这些实际上是廉价的仿造品和编织物，被人施加了魔法所以看上去很像真品。

String.Source: You wear the robes of a college mage.
String.Dest: 你穿着一所魔法学院的衣服。

String.Source: The point is to convince naive patrons the enchantments were performed by a master. They are not.
String.Dest: 关键是要说服那帮天真的老主顾们，那附魔是来自于一位大师。而事实上根本不是。

String.Source: Can the Nord who made your robes do handwritten forgeries?
String.Dest: 那个给你做袍子的诺德人能伪造签名吗？

String.Source: Him? Oh no, he's a bit daft when it comes to writing. Besides, he's too busy making curved swords.
String.Dest: 他？哦不，在谈及写作的时候，他是有那么一丁点儿蠢。此外，他太忙于打造弧形的剑了。

String.Source: Can the Nord who made your robes do handwritten forgeries?
String.Dest: 那个给你做袍子的诺德人能伪造签名吗？

String.Source: I do know an Argonian who does excellent forgeries. I once asked him to make a Jarl's decree that pies were a type of vegetable.
String.Dest: 我倒是认识一个擅长偷龙换凤的亚龙人。有一回我还让他给我弄了一张领主令呢，上面说的是“馅饼是一种蔬菜”。

String.Source: Can the Nord who made your robes do handwritten forgeries?
String.Dest: 那个给你做袍子的诺德人能伪造签名吗？

String.Source: He also does a bit of crafting. Of course, I heard he ran into a bit of trouble stitching together guard uniforms for a group of bandits.
String.Dest: 他也做一点手艺的。当然，我听说他在为一群强盗裁缝守卫制服时遇到了一点麻烦。

String.Source: Can the Nord who made your robes do handwritten forgeries?
String.Dest: 那个给你做袍子的诺德人能伪造签名吗？

String.Source: Apparently they weren't good enough to trick some mad Dark Elf who hunts lawbreakers.
String.Dest: 显然他们还不足以哄骗那些疯狂的黑暗精灵偷猎者。

String.Source: Can the Nord who made your robes do handwritten forgeries?
String.Dest: 那个给你做袍子的诺德人能伪造签名吗？

String.Source: So the bandits decided to take it out on my poor friend. Chances are he isn't alive, or in one piece, but we could try and rescue what's left of him.
String.Dest: So the bandits decided to take it out on my poor friend. Chances are he isn't alive, or in one piece, but we could try and rescue what's left of him.

String.Source: You should do your duty and clear an area of bandit scum.
String.Dest: 尽你的责任，做掉一片区域的强盗人渣吧。

String.Source: The only duty I have is to myself, and he would rather be healthy and alive.
String.Dest: 我只对自己负有责任，他也许会健康地活下去的。

String.Source: You should do your duty and clear an area of bandit scum.
String.Dest: 尽你的责任，做掉一片区域的强盗人渣吧。

String.Source: And while some see bandits as walking trunks of loot, the loot they carry is heavy, and goes against my personal code.
String.Dest: 人们把强盗看成是会走路的赃物口袋，那些赃物重得很，而且跟我的个人品味差太远了。

String.Source: You should do your duty and clear an area of bandit scum.
String.Dest: 尽你的责任，做掉一片区域的强盗人渣吧。

String.Source: Never pick up anything that isn't worth at least 10 times its weight. It's a rule all good adventurers should live by.
String.Dest: 永远不要捡起任何价值低于它重量十倍的物品。这是每个优秀的冒险家的座右铭。

String.Source: You're not exactly a serious Elf, are you.
String.Dest: 你不真的是个严肃的精灵吧，不是么。

String.Source: Oh, I'm serious about a lot of things. In fact, I'm absolutely dedicated to not taking life seriously.
String.Dest: Oh, I'm serious about a lot of things. In fact, I'm absolutely dedicated to not taking life seriously.

String.Source: That's a shame. I enjoy tongue jousting.
String.Dest: 真丢人。我喜欢君子之战。

String.Source: Not that it doesn't form an appealing visual, but if we actually did joust with our tongues, we'd likely crack our skulls.
String.Dest: 这一点也不有趣，如果我们真的用舌头来决斗的话，我们的脑袋估计得碎掉。

String.Source: That's a shame. I enjoy tongue jousting.
String.Dest: 真丢人。我喜欢君子之战。

String.Source: And I don't even own a horse, so there's that.
String.Dest: 我甚至没有自己的马，所以就是这样了。

String.Source: It's a musical horn. It makes music.
String.Dest: 这是一个角笛，可以吹出曲子。

String.Source: So he was a bard of some sort? That's a dangerous profession for someone who can shout you to death.
String.Dest: 那他是个吟游诗人啥的喽？让一个唱歌唱得听众哭爹喊娘的人当吟游诗人还真是难为他啊！

String.Source: It's a musical horn. It makes music.
String.Dest: 这是一个角笛，可以吹出曲子。

String.Source: What if he got carried away during a rendition of Ragnar the Red? I've seen it happen before.
String.Dest: 如果他在演奏红衣拉格纳的时候被带走怎么办？我见过这种事发生。

String.Source: It's a musical horn. It makes music.
String.Dest: 这是一个角笛，可以吹出曲子。

String.Source: My theory is the horn isn't the kind you blow, but you know, the kind a dremora wears on his head. Just some food for thought.
String.Dest: 我的理解是那个号角不是你吹的那种，应该是，你见过的魔人头上顶的那种角吗，像那样的。这是个耐人寻味的事情。

String.Source: My dear, I think you're more of a snowberry than a banana.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我觉得你比起香蕉来更像个雪浆果。

String.Source: See, you can say that because we're married. And because you're the Dragonborn. And because I have a sense of humor about myself.
String.Dest: 看吧，你可以说这是因为我们结婚了。或者因为你是龙裔。或者是因为我有一种自嘲的幽默感。

String.Source: My dear, I think you're more of a snowberry than a banana.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我觉得你比起香蕉来更像个雪浆果。

String.Source: But truth is, I'm never comfortable staying in one place, and I'd rather conjure up a good blade than a broom.
String.Dest: But truth is, I'm never comfortable staying in one place, and I'd rather conjure up a good blade than a broom.

String.Source: My dear, I think you're more of a snowberry than a banana.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我觉得你比起香蕉来更像个雪浆果。

String.Source: Not that I don't mind cleaning for you. Did I mention how much I love you and that I'm glad your home?
String.Dest: 不，我不介意帮你打扫屋子。我有没有提到过我是多么的爱你。。。还有我多么很高兴你终于回家了？

String.Source: I think you're more of a snowberry than a banana.
String.Dest: 我觉得比起香蕉来，你更像个雪浆果。

String.Source: See, you can say that because we're friends. And because you're the Dragonborn. And because I have a sense of humor about myself.
String.Dest: 瞧,你可以说那是因为我们是朋友，还可以说因为你是龙裔，还能说因为我很有幽默感。

String.Source: I think you're more of a snowberry than a banana.
String.Dest: 我觉得比起香蕉来，你更像个雪浆果。

String.Source: But truth is, I'm never comfortable staying in one place, and I'd rather conjure up a good blade than a broom.
String.Dest: But truth is, I'm never comfortable staying in one place, and I'd rather conjure up a good blade than a broom.

String.Source: I think you're more of a snowberry than a banana.
String.Dest: 我觉得比起香蕉来，你更像个雪浆果。

String.Source: Anyway, good to have you back. I imagine you'll want to rest for a bit, but I'll be here if you need someone for your adventures.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，你能回来真是太好了。我想你可能需要休息一段时间，不过如果你需要一个一同冒险的人的话，我随时在这等着。

String.Source: And you were his understudy? Remind me never to hand you an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: 以及你是他的候补？哦我不会把上古卷轴交给你的。

String.Source: Well, I didn't adopt everything Otero taught me.
String.Dest: 那么，看来我没能吸纳奥特罗教给我的所有东西。

String.Source: And you were his understudy? Remind me never to hand you an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: 以及你是他的候补？哦我不会把上古卷轴交给你的。

String.Source: For instance, if it were me who found the Elder Scroll, the first thing I would do make copies.
String.Dest: For instance, if it were me who found the Elder Scroll, the first thing I would do make copies.

String.Source: And you were his understudy? Remind me never to hand you an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: 以及你是他的候补？哦我不会把上古卷轴交给你的。

String.Source: Then I would visit the apothecary to treat my blindness.
String.Dest: 我想我会去请药剂师医治我的失明。

String.Source: I wonder if his waste was sent to another time.
String.Dest: 我想知道下次他的垃圾会被送到哪。

String.Source: Wouldn't that be something. It's like "Hey, there's Ysgramor! And wow, is that a Snow Elf? And look over there, it's Otero's droppings!"
String.Dest: 真是不可思议。这就像是 "嘿，伊斯格拉谟！哇哦，那是只雪精灵吗？看那边，奥特罗拉出的粑粑！"

String.Source: There must have been leaves. You always have to have a plan.
String.Dest: 那里面一定有叶子。你总是必须有一个计划。

String.Source: Not Otero. He was the type to scamper off into the woods and figure things out later.
String.Dest: 不是奥特罗。他是那种先逃进森林然后再想到底是怎么回事儿的人。

String.Source: There must have been leaves. You always have to have a plan.
String.Dest: 那里面一定有叶子。你总是必须有一个计划。

String.Source: Besides, regardless of where you are, you can always find something to wipe your unmentionables. And he did. It just happened to be an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: 另外，不管你在哪儿，你永远都能找到方法弄干你的内衣。他也那么做了。只不过这次弄干的是一个上古卷轴。

String.Source: That story couldn't possibly be true.
String.Dest: 那个故事不可能是真的。

String.Source: You know what? It does sound suspiciously like a lie.
String.Dest: 你知道么？那听起来很可疑就跟个瞎话一样。

String.Source: That story couldn't possibly be true.
String.Dest: 那个故事不可能是真的。

String.Source: I wonder if he also lied about the night he bedded seven wenches and a Countess because they were fond of his cartwheels.
String.Dest: 我很怀疑他是否在他那个和七个女孩还有伯爵夫人上床的故事里面也说谎了。他说她们为了他的优雅炫目而着迷。

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) Looks like we have some fetching to do.
String.Dest: (约根唤风者的号角) 看样子我们得取些东西了。

String.Source: Alright, here's a question. If Jurgen Windcaller was the first Greybeard, that means he had a pretty powerful voice, right?
String.Dest: 好吧，现在有个问题：如果唤风者约根是史上首位灰胡子，那也就是说他的龙吼应该很强，对吧？

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) Looks like we have some fetching to do.
String.Dest: (约根唤风者的号角) 看样子我们得取些东西了。

String.Source: If that's the case, why does he need a horn?
String.Dest: 如果是这样的话，他为什么需要一个号角？

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: 我打败了奥杜因。松加德安全了，全世界得救了。

String.Source: As is Alduin's stomach. My love, you did him a favor as far as I'm concerned, because from what I hear this world is rotten to the core.
String.Dest: 奥杜因的胃啊，亲爱的，你实在帮了他一个大忙，因为据我所知这世界已经烂到根子上了。。

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: 我打败了奥杜因。松加德安全了，全世界得救了。

String.Source: But would that make the world a fruit? People always say the world can be eaten but I'm not so sure.
String.Dest: 但是那会使世界变成水果吗？人们总是说世界可以被吃掉但是我不怎么确定。

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: 我打败了奥杜因。松加德安全了，全世界得救了。

String.Source: I mean, my skin is a golden yellow, and I'm fairly skinny. I could tell you I'm a banana, but that doesn't mean it's true. I could just be insane.
String.Dest: 我是说，我的皮肤是耀眼的金黄，我的身材也一级棒。告诉你其实我是根香蕉，那也不一定是真的。也许只是我疯了。

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: 我打败了奥杜因。松加德安全了，全世界得救了。

String.Source: Which makes you the spouse of a crazy person. Now you'll think twice before scolding me for sticking gold coins up my nose.
String.Dest: 是什么让你如此疯狂？ 在你把金币朝我鼻子扔前，你应再三考虑。

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: 我打败了奥杜因。松加德安全了，全世界得救了。

String.Source: As is Alduin's stomach. You did him a favor as far as I'm concerned, because from what I hear this world is rotten to the core.
String.Dest: 奥杜因的胃啊，你实在帮了他一个大忙，因为据我所知这世界已经烂到根子上了。

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: 我打败了奥杜因。松加德安全了，全世界得救了。

String.Source: But would that make the world a fruit? People always say the world can be eaten but I'm not so sure.
String.Dest: 但是那会使世界变成水果吗？人们总是说世界可以被吃掉但是我不怎么确定。

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: 我打败了奥杜因。松加德安全了，全世界得救了。

String.Source: I mean, my skin is a golden yellow, and I'm fairly skinny. I could tell you I'm a banana, but that doesn't mean it's true. I could just be insane.
String.Dest: 我是说，我的皮肤是耀眼的金黄，我的身材也一级棒。告诉你其实我是根香蕉，那也不一定是真的。也许只是我疯了。

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: 我打败了奥杜因。松加德安全了，全世界得救了。

String.Source: Which makes you the friend of a crazy person. Now you'll think twice before scolding me for sticking gold coins up my nose.
String.Dest: 是什么让你如此疯狂？下次你骂我财迷之前我希望你可以多考虑一下。

String.Source: (Elder Knowledge) It looks as if we have to retrieve an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: （上古知识）看来我们得拿回上古卷轴。

String.Source: Wow. An Elder Scroll. Otero used to tell me a story about how he found one while out in the woods.
String.Dest: 哇噢，上古卷轴。奥特罗经常跟我讲他是怎么在野外发现这么个玩意的故事。

String.Source: (Elder Knowledge) It looks as if we have to retrieve an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: （上古知识）看来我们得拿回上古卷轴。

String.Source: What did he do with it? Well, he used it to wipe his arse. There really wasn't any other choice, being so far away from the stream.
String.Dest: 他拿这干什么? 嗯~, 他拿它擦屁股. 还真没那么多其他可能, 在离河流那么远的地方.

String.Source: The Forsworn are a blight on the Reach. Madanach got what he deserved.
String.Dest: 弃誓者是边塞领的毒瘤。迈德纳奇得到了他应得的。

String.Source: Oh I agree. The Forsworn are a wicked bunch. All that murdering and pillaging and stuff. And having a Silver-Blood on your side is never a bad thing.
String.Dest: 噢，我同意。弃誓者是一群邪恶的人。他们烧杀抢掠无恶不作。另外，和银血家族站在一边准没错。

String.Source: The Forsworn are a blight on the Reach. Madanach got what he deserved.
String.Dest: 弃誓者是边塞领的毒瘤。迈德纳奇得到了他应得的。

String.Source: That's why we work well together. We think on the same level. Always finishing each other's...finishing each other's...
String.Dest: 这就是我们为什么一起工作。我们总是想到一起。总是互帮互助…总能互帮互助…

String.Source: This is the rightful land of the Forsworn. I did what I did on principle.
String.Dest: 这是弃誓者的合法土地，我只会按自己的规则办事。

String.Source: Oh, I totally agree. An Elf is nothing without his scruples. Although having a purse full of rubies would be nice too.
String.Dest: 哦，我完全同意。虽然一个精灵总能够无所顾虑。但是有一个装满红宝石的钱包总比口袋空空好。

String.Source: This is the rightful land of the Forsworn. I did what I did on principle.
String.Dest: 这是弃誓者的合法土地，我只会按自己的规则办事。

String.Source: That's why I leave the tough moral quandaries to you. It saves me from all the thinking and absolves me of all the blame.
String.Dest: 所以我把难缠的道德难题留给了你解决，那样我才摆脱了一切思考和责任。

String.Source: Yes, that's more than we can say for Ancano.
String.Dest: 是的，那不仅仅我们可以为安卡诺说话.

String.Source: I wonder if the body's lying around somewhere. I wouldn't mind raising him from the dead and having him fetch our flagons.
String.Dest: 我在想，那尸体就该躺在附近吧。我不介意复活他然后得到他的酒壶。

String.Source: Yes, that's more than we can say for Ancano.
String.Dest: 是的，那不仅仅我们可以为安卡诺说话.

String.Source: Needless to say I never liked him. He reminds me of every mage who ever looked down on me for being a bladebinder.
String.Dest: 不用说，我从没喜欢过他。他让我想起了一个因为我是个束刃者就瞧不起我的法师。

String.Source: Yes, that's more than we can say for Ancano.
String.Dest: 是的，那不仅仅我们可以为安卡诺说话.

String.Source: Not every High Elf is destined to become a wizard. Granted, I'm partly to blame for that perception.
String.Dest: Not every High Elf is destined to become a wizard. Granted, I'm partly to blame for that perception.

String.Source: I'd like to hear these excuses.
String.Dest: 我倒想听听这些借口。

String.Source: Alright, here's a few more. "I'll be with you in spirit." "Bound weapons don't work in Sovngarde." "I slept with Odahviing's sister."
String.Dest: 好吧，这里还有几句：“我的心与你同在。”“召唤武器在松加德用不了。”“我跟奥达威英的妹妹睡过。”

String.Source: I'd like to hear these excuses.
String.Dest: 我倒想听听这些借口。

String.Source: Okay, so I made some of those up. Maybe all of them, but the point is, you didn't give me any time to make up some good ones.
String.Dest: 好，我搞定了一部分，或者全部。但重点是，你没给我足够的时间。

String.Source: I'd like to hear these excuses.
String.Dest: 我倒想听听这些借口。

String.Source: Look, I think it's obvious I want you to succeed. And if it came down to it, I'd be willing to fight by your side. No, I'd be honored to.
String.Dest: 听着，很显然我是想让你成功的。如果你有需要，我很愿意成为你的左膀右臂。说真的，我很渴望。

String.Source: I'd like to hear these excuses.
String.Dest: 我倒想听听这些借口。

String.Source: But I'll have to settle for having been with you until now. That alone should fetch me a free drink or two at the tavern. Good luck.
String.Dest: 但一直跟你到现在，已经令我满足了。这件事情本身就值得在酒馆换取一杯，两杯免费的酒水。祝你好运。

String.Source: Oh stop complaining you bloody thumb-drinker.
String.Dest: 噢，别抱怨你的伤了，你这吮指头的货。

String.Source: Well, it's not just a preference. There's a practical aspect to it. Meat makes me feel sluggish.
String.Dest: 其实，那不只是一种偏好。而是有原因的。吃肉让我感觉反应迟钝。

String.Source: Oh stop complaining you bloody thumb-drinker.
String.Dest: 噢，别抱怨你的伤了，你这吮指头的货。

String.Source: Remember, I'm a bladebinder. I conjure weapons because I don't want to carry them. The same is true for a bulging stomach.
String.Dest: 记住，我是束刃者。我之所以召唤武器是因为我不想带着他们。对于鼓起来的肚子来说也同样正确。

String.Source: Oh stop complaining you bloody thumb-drinker.
String.Dest: 噢，别抱怨你的伤了，你这吮指头的货。

String.Source: Just throw in a word with the cook if you can. Blame it on the "stupid Elf," and then point at me and I'll wave or something.
String.Dest: 可以的话你去和厨师唠两句。把事情怪罪给“蠢货精灵”，然后指指我，我会挥挥手什么的。

String.Source: Yes, and once your friends are there to hold you back, you charge ahead.
String.Dest: 是的，并且一旦你的朋友让你回去，你会义无反顾地回去。

String.Source: That's always been my strategy for brawls. Although it doesn't work too well when you travel alone.
String.Dest: 这一直是我打架的策略，尽管当你独自旅行时它不是那么顶用。

String.Source: Yes, and once your friends are there to hold you back, you charge ahead.
String.Dest: 是的，并且一旦你的朋友让你回去，你会义无反顾地回去。

String.Source: Which is as good as reason as any for me to accompany you. We can take turns angering the locals and holding each other back.
String.Dest: 我们可以轮流惹恼当地人然后互相掩护，对我来说这才是我与你作伴的真正原因呢。

String.Source: You picked up conjuring weapons just like that?
String.Dest: 你就是这样拿魔法武器的？

String.Source: That's where the knife ears come in handy. Or was it crocodile lips? Toadskin? I can never forget these infernal nicknames the humans give us.
String.Dest: That's where the knife ears come in handy. Or was it crocodile lips? Toadskin? I can never forget these infernal nicknames the humans give us.

String.Source: You picked up conjuring weapons just like that?
String.Dest: 你就是这样拿魔法武器的？

String.Source: What I'm trying to say is that High Elves are born with an affinity for magic. A head start, if you will, in the skill of hand waggling.
String.Dest: 我要说到的是高精灵生来就具有对魔法的亲和力。比其他种族在操纵手指的技巧方面出色一些。

String.Source: Bandits are an excellent form of exercise. You should be luring them.
String.Dest: 强盗们是多好的陪练呐。你应该主动勾引他们。

String.Source: So that explains your getup, I suppose? Or rather, it doesn't. Unless that's how wealthy nobles dress in this part of Tamriel.
String.Dest: 我想这就解释了你的装束？然而确切的说，这是不行的。除非是有钱的贵族在泰姆瑞尔大陆穿着它们。

String.Source: Bandits are an excellent form of exercise. You should be luring them.
String.Dest: 强盗们是多好的陪练呐。你应该主动勾引他们。

String.Source: Oh wait, is it? I don't even know when I'm being sarcastic anymore. I forget which dead animals exemplify status in this province.
String.Dest: 哦，等等，是吗？我都不知道什么时候我说话又带上了嘲讽的语气。我差点忘了那些死去的动物就是这个省现状的例证。

String.Source: Bandits are an excellent form of exercise. You should be luring them.
String.Dest: 强盗们是多好的陪练呐。你应该主动勾引他们。

String.Source: As a result, the other day I was caught in the embarrassing predicament of confusing a hunter with a noble, and vice versa.
String.Dest: 结果，在不久前的某天我陷入了分不清猎人和贵族或是贵族和猎人的令人尴尬的窘境。

String.Source: Bandits are an excellent form of exercise. You should be luring them.
String.Dest: 强盗们是多好的陪练呐。你应该主动勾引他们。

String.Source: The folks here really ought to carry signs so I know who to be courteous to.
String.Dest: 这里的人们真该带着标识好让我知道我该对谁表示礼貌。

String.Source: Is that a jest? Or do you fancy other males?
String.Dest: 是个玩笑吗？还是你真的喜欢男人？

String.Source: Males, females, beasts, goats, the list goes on and on. I'm not a particularly picky Elf.
String.Dest: 雄的，雌的，野兽，山羊，清单没完没了。我可不是个特别挑剔的精灵。

String.Source: Is that a jest? Or do you fancy other males?
String.Dest: 是个玩笑吗？还是你真的喜欢男人？

String.Source: Although I confess I don't like billies. You're not a billie, are you? Well, if you are, I'll still do it, but it's going to cost extra.
String.Dest: 虽然我承认我不喜欢守卫。你不会是守卫吧？你是么？算了，如果你是我照样会做，但那就不止这点钱了。

String.Source: And here I thought you were the type who fancies males.
String.Dest: 而在这儿我曾认为你是那种中意男性的人。

String.Source: Oh, but I do. Males, females, beasts, goats, the list goes on and on. I'm not a particularly picky Elf.
String.Dest: 哦不，我是认真的。男性，女性，野兽，山羊，还有很多其他的。我不是一个挑剔的精灵。

String.Source: And here I thought you were the type who fancies males.
String.Dest: 而在这儿我曾认为你是那种中意男性的人。

String.Source: Although I confess I don't like billies. You're not a billie, are you? Well, if you are, I'll still do it, but it's going to cost extra.
String.Dest: 虽然我承认我不喜欢守卫。你不会是守卫吧？你是么？算了，如果你是我照样会做，但那就不止这点钱了。

String.Source: If you had any strength, your weapons would never be a burden.
String.Dest: 如果你有力量，你的武器永远不会成为你的负担。

String.Source: Well, there's the problem. I have skill, not strength. I have speed, but no stamina.
String.Dest: 好吧，问题就在这儿。我有技巧，但缺少力量。我有速度，但是缺乏耐力。

String.Source: If you had any strength, your weapons would never be a burden.
String.Dest: 如果你有力量，你的武器永远不会成为你的负担。

String.Source: I mean look at me. Do I look like a mule to you? No wait, don't answer that. I'm rather sensitive about my figure.
String.Dest: 我说你好好看着我，我长得像驮行李用的骡子吗？哦别说，不用回答啦。我对自己身材的问题可是很敏感的。

String.Source: Sabjorn's in prison. If he got out, he'd just start making more mead.
String.Dest: 撒布乔恩在牢里。如果他出去的话，肯定已经着手酿更多的蜜酒了。

String.Source: Yes, but suppose Maven decided to strike a bargain with him. She could pin the crime on Mallus and free Sabjorn in exchange for his service.
String.Dest: 是的，假如玛雯想和他计较。她会把罪名栽赃给马鲁斯，然后把萨布乔恩放出来作为他为她跑腿的回报。

String.Source: Sabjorn's in prison. If he got out, he'd just start making more mead.
String.Dest: 撒布乔恩在牢里。如果他出去的话，肯定已经着手酿更多的蜜酒了。

String.Source: Having saved his life, he'd be eternally grateful to Maven, and would offer to brew his mead for her. It's a win-win-win, the third winner being me.
String.Dest: Having saved his life, he'd be eternally grateful to Maven, and would offer to brew his mead for her. It's a win-win-win, the third winner being me.

String.Source: Sabjorn's in prison. If he got out, he'd just start making more mead.
String.Dest: 撒布乔恩在牢里。如果他出去的话，肯定已经着手酿更多的蜜酒了。

String.Source: The only loser would be Mallus, but he creeps me out anyway.
String.Dest: 唯一的失败者只会是莫鲁斯，但是他依然让我毛骨悚然。

String.Source: Conjured weapons are noisy, take too long to draw, and can't be enchanted.
String.Dest: 召唤武器的声音很刺耳，准备的时间又长，又不能附魔。

String.Source: You forgot impermanent, magicka draining, and the fact that they only come in one color. Still, you don't have to carry them.
String.Dest: 你还漏了它们是非永久的，消耗魔法的，而且只有一种颜色。不过好处是你不需要携带它们。

String.Source: Conjured weapons are noisy, take too long to draw, and can't be enchanted.
String.Dest: 召唤武器的声音很刺耳，准备的时间又长，又不能附魔。

String.Source: I don't know about you, but the idea of slogging from town to town with a weapon rack strapped to my back is not my idea of an adventure.
String.Dest: 我不了解你，但这种把武器架绑到我的背上，苦哈哈的从一个城镇走到另一个城镇的主意，可不符合我对冒险家的美好印象。

String.Source: Do you know any other magic besides conjuring weapons?
String.Dest: 除了召唤出武器你还会什么魔法？

String.Source: Ever seen an Elf juggle three axes while conjuring a fourth? Tie a cherry stem into a knot with their tongue? Now that's magic.
String.Dest: 见过一个精灵在耍着三把斧头的同时还召唤了第四把吗？见过他们会把一根樱桃木跟舌头打个结吗？那就是魔法。

String.Source: Do you know any other magic besides conjuring weapons?
String.Dest: 除了召唤出武器你还会什么魔法？

String.Source: Yet I assume you are referring to the schools of magic traditionally taught in places like the College of Winterhold.
String.Dest: 然而，我认为你是指传统上的魔法学校，就像冬堡学院这样的地方。

String.Source: Do you know any other magic besides conjuring weapons?
String.Dest: 除了召唤出武器你还会什么魔法？

String.Source: That, I'm afraid, requires more than being born with your ears pointed skyward. That requires...ugh...studying.
String.Dest: 这个，我恐怕，需要的不仅是天赋。这个需要的是....额.....学习。

String.Source: A High Elf with a sense of humor. I like you.
String.Dest: 有着幽默感的高精灵。我喜欢你。

String.Source: Good. Skyrim could use more of it. Humor, and sense.
String.Dest: Good. Skyrim could use more of it. Humor, and sense.

String.Source: I hope not. I would love the chance to gut a dragon.
String.Dest: 但愿不是这样，我更乐意得到摧毁一条龙的机会。

String.Source: Really? You don't want to slay it, or just chase it away, but gut its belly? That's a rather visceral description.
String.Dest: 是吗？你不想杀掉它，或是仅仅把它赶走，却还能把它的内脏挖出来？这真是一个发自肺腑的想法。

String.Source: I hope not. I would love the chance to gut a dragon.
String.Dest: 但愿不是这样，我更乐意得到摧毁一条龙的机会。

String.Source: It's kind of scary. I'm not really into that sort of blood and guts stuff, but maybe if I vomit constantly you'll see that I'm trying to do my part.
String.Dest: 这太可怕了。 我并没有真的沉浸到那些血液和内脏中去，但也许如果我经常呕吐话，那就是你发现我在做我份内之事的时候.

String.Source: We're on Maven's good side. Now's not the time to start making demands.
String.Dest: 我们都收了玛雯的好处，现在不是向她提要求的时候。

String.Source: Oh, I wasn't suggesting we demand it. I like not having the Dark Brotherhood on my back.
String.Dest: 哦，我希望我们不用那样做。我可没有黑暗兄弟会来做后盾。

String.Source: We're on Maven's good side. Now's not the time to start making demands.
String.Dest: 我们都收了玛雯的好处，现在不是向她提要求的时候。

String.Source: No, I was thinking you could float it out there. Like "I can't believe there's actually wealthy nobles who swear by Honningbrew. What fools!"
String.Dest: 不，我在想其实你现在就可以说出来。比如说“我才不相信那些权贵会以酒起誓。太蠢了！”

String.Source: We're on Maven's good side. Now's not the time to start making demands.
String.Dest: 我们都收了玛雯的好处，现在不是向她提要求的时候。

String.Source: But only if you think it's a good plan. That's why I'm running it by you first. I wouldn't know a good idea if it urinated on my leg.
String.Dest: 但是除非你认为那是个好计划。这就是为什么我让你先从头捋一遍，如果这货尿到我腿上我可没什么好点子。

String.Source: Good. It isn't healthy for adventurers to get too close to each other.
String.Dest: 好的。冒险者之间靠得太近的话不利于健康。

String.Source: Because...we're all going to die? That doesn't really motivate us, now does it?
String.Dest: 因为……我们都会死？那可没激励我们，是吧？

String.Source: Good. It isn't healthy for adventurers to get too close to each other.
String.Dest: 好的。冒险者之间靠得太近的话不利于健康。

String.Source: I'm following you in order to increase my chances of survival. I'm perfectly capable of dying on my own.
String.Dest: 我现在跟着你来增加我活下去的可能。如果我是独自一人的话肯定已经死了。

String.Source: That's not what I meant.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。

String.Source: Oh I know, but I learned that discussing politics and religion is an exercise in futility.
String.Dest: 噢，我知道的，但据我所知，讨论政治和宗教是件很没意义的事儿。

String.Source: That's not what I meant.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。

String.Source: I'll just evade the question thank you and focus on more agreeable questions, like the weather, the temperature, and the local food.
String.Dest: 多谢你我刚刚回避了那个问题以讨论更让人惬意的话题，比如天气，冷暖，以及本地小吃。

String.Source: That's not what I meant.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。

String.Source: See, we can't disagree on the weather, and unlike politics, when it comes to cuisine nobody is forcing anything down each other's mouth.
String.Dest: 看见了吗，我们不能就天气问题达成一致，但说到美食，这可不同于政治，谁也不能强人所好呢。

String.Source: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.
String.Dest: 别傻了。诺德人的卫兵都是正直诚实的模范。

String.Source: I guess you have a point. Admittedly, I am sort of biased by all the inane banter they make.
String.Dest: 我想你是对的.对于他们那些无聊空洞的玩笑，我并不感冒.

String.Source: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.
String.Dest: 别傻了。诺德人的卫兵都是正直诚实的模范。

String.Source: No, I do not fancy myself a conjurer, I fancy myself a bladebinder.
String.Dest: 不，我一点都不喜欢自己是个巫师。我更喜欢幻想自己是一名束刃武士。

String.Source: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.
String.Dest: 别傻了。诺德人的卫兵都是正直诚实的模范。

String.Source: Ooh, that came out wrong. Saying "I fancy myself" sounds like I want to be alone in a room with nothing but a mirror.
String.Dest: 哦……不是这样的。说什么”我为自己代言“，弄得好像我想在一间只有镜子的房间里顾影自怜一样。

String.Source: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.
String.Dest: 别傻了。诺德人的卫兵都是正直诚实的模范。

String.Source: In any case, you've convinced me. There's a dragon out there. And coincidentally, something warm running down my leg.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，你说服我了。外面有条龙，巧合的是，我觉得我尿裤子。

String.Source: An excellent idea. Well, except for the fact Sabjorn would die first.
String.Dest: 好主意。好吧，除了Sabjorn会先死的那部分事实以外。

String.Source: Maybe now, while the wound is fresh. But give him some time behind bars, and he'll come around.
String.Dest: 或许是现在，在那创伤尚未平复的时候。不过还是给他一点时间吧，他会自己过来的。

String.Source: An excellent idea. Well, except for the fact Sabjorn would die first.
String.Dest: 好主意。好吧，除了Sabjorn会先死的那部分事实以外。

String.Source: For now, you can suggest to Maven that she's in a good position to bargain with Sabjorn. And remind her how popular Honningbrew is with the Elves.
String.Dest: For now, you can suggest to Maven that she's in a good position to bargain with Sabjorn. And remind her how popular Honningbrew is with the Elves.

String.Source: An excellent idea. Well, except for the fact Sabjorn would die first.
String.Dest: 好主意。好吧，除了Sabjorn会先死的那部分事实以外。

String.Source: I don't know if that's true, by the way, but it sounds like it would be.
String.Dest: 我不知道这是不是真的，但是它听起来跟真的一样。

String.Source: Yes, Thalmor invasions are always on time.
String.Dest: 是的，梭默入侵总是很准时。

String.Source: Yes, but so is the Empire. The Stormcloaks are the only ones who come late to the party.
String.Dest: 是的，但是帝国也是如此。风暴斗篷是聚会上唯一迟到的。

String.Source: Yes, Thalmor invasions are always on time.
String.Dest: 是的，梭默入侵总是很准时。

String.Source: But what they lack in punctuality they make up for with surliness.
String.Dest: 但他们用粗暴弥补了他们的不守时。

String.Source: Excellent. Hopefully you will last longer in battle now.
String.Dest: 好极了，希望你在战斗中能坚持更久。

String.Source: Look, two minutes is a perfectly acceptable amount of time for someone of my age and stature. Besides, I was distracted the last time.
String.Dest: 喂，两分钟的时间对于我这样的年龄和身份而言可是完全合理的。另外，上次我被分神了。

String.Source: Excellent. Hopefully you will last longer in battle now.
String.Dest: 好极了，希望你在战斗中能坚持更久。

String.Source: Wait, what were we talking about again?
String.Dest: 等下。刚才我们说什么来着？

String.Source: Congratulations. You are officially a mage.
String.Dest: 恭喜恭喜，你正式成为一个法师了。

String.Source: Oh, let's not get carried away. I'm still a bladebinder first. I'm just a wardbinder on my days off.
String.Dest: 噢，我还是别得意忘形了。我首先是个武器召唤师。至于防护召唤我只是个业余的。

String.Source: Good. Now you don't have to pretend bladebinders actually exist.
String.Dest: 很好，你现在不用再假装束刃真的存在了。

String.Source: Oh no, I'm going to stay in my fantasy land with the other delusional folk. You should come over. It's much warmer and there's mermaid and unicorns.
String.Dest: 哦不，我要和其他妄想之人生活在我幻想的国度。你应该过来。这儿很温暖，还有人鱼和独角兽。

String.Source: Size isn't everything. A lesser than lesser ward is good enough.
String.Dest: 大小不能决定一切。越小的结界防御力越强。

String.Source: Oh yes, it's perfect for an ice spike. All I have to do is line it up right at the needle point. Shouldn't be too hard for someone of my skill.
String.Dest: 噢是的，对于一个冰棘来说刚刚好。我所需要做的就是把那些顶点连起来。对我这样的天才来说应该不是什么问题。

String.Source: Size isn't everything. A lesser than lesser ward is good enough.
String.Dest: 大小不能决定一切。越小的结界防御力越强。

String.Source: But honestly, the size of the ward is really only enough to protect one nipple. Which begs the question...left or right?
String.Dest: 但说实话，结节的大小真的仅仅只够保护一个乳头，这就引出一个问题了。是保护左边的……还是右边？

String.Source: Do you think you'll be able to learn other spells this way?
String.Dest: 你认为你能这样学其他的法术？

String.Source: Perhaps. The real question is, do I want to? After what we went through to learn this one, I'd say the answer is a resounding no.
String.Dest: 也许吧。真正的问题是，我是不是想要？为了得到这个答案我们经历了这么多，我想最终的回答是个坚定的不。

String.Source: Do you think you'll be able to learn other spells this way?
String.Dest: 你认为你能这样学其他的法术？

String.Source: Look, I'm grateful for everything you've done. Not many people would've gone this far to help a friend.
String.Dest: 看着。我很感激你做过的任何事情。不是所有人都会千里迢迢来帮助一个朋友的。

String.Source: Do you think you'll be able to learn other spells this way?
String.Dest: 你认为你能这样学其他的法术？

String.Source: So it's not the gift so much as the thought. Keep that in mind when I give you this paltry reward.
String.Dest: 所以说，这与其说是礼物，不如说是思考。在我给你这微不足道的奖励的同时，把它铭记在心。

String.Source: Do you think you'll be able to learn other spells this way?
String.Dest: 你认为你能这样学其他的法术？

String.Source: More importantly, we both learned a lesson. Leave the spellcasting to real mages, and the invisible swords to me.
String.Dest: 更重要的是，这事给我们都上了一课。把魔法留给真正的法师去用，把无形的剑留给我。

String.Source: Do you think you'll be able to learn other spells this way?
String.Dest: 你认为你能这样学其他的法术？

String.Source: Next time I get any bright ideas, just ignore me. But thanks for listening this one time.
String.Dest: 我要感谢你这次能听我的.但是下次我再有主意得话，就请直接无视我。

String.Source: Actually, I haven't met anyone that fits your description.
String.Dest: 事实上，我没见到任何一个符合你描述的人。

String.Source: Really? Here I thought you knew everyone. Or was that Ulundil? I get you two confused sometimes, because I have poor eyesight.
String.Dest: 真的吗?我以为你知道在这儿的每一个人。还是乌伦迪尔 ？有时我分不清你们两个。因为我的视力不好。

String.Source: Actually, I haven't met anyone that fits your description.
String.Dest: 事实上，我没见到任何一个符合你描述的人。

String.Source: All kidding aside, I'm sure that person is out there. We'll find them eventually.
String.Dest: 说真的，我很确定有人在那边。我们最终会找到他们的。

String.Source: Mugnor's a college mage, but she's crazy.
String.Dest: 玛格抐是个学院法师，不过她不怎么正常。

String.Source: Well, at least we won't have to go very far.
String.Dest: 好吧，至少我们不用走太远。

String.Source: Mugnor's a college mage, but she's crazy.
String.Dest: 玛格抐是个学院法师，不过她不怎么正常。

String.Source: Wouldn't have it been better to see her first? Not that I'd ever question you. Well, back to Winterhold then.
String.Dest: 先去看她难道不是更好么？我并不是在质询你。好的，那么返回冬堡吧。

String.Source: Actually, there's one mage who happens to live in a sewer. Dagri'lon.
String.Dest: 实际上，碰巧有位法师住在下水道里。迪格隆.

String.Source: Oh yes, your egomaniacal corpse friend. Somehow I don't think this is going to be entirely painless.
String.Dest: 哦是的，你这极端利己的僵尸小伙伴。我并不认为这将是完全无痛的。

String.Source: Valgus should be able to help you.
String.Dest: 威尔格斯应该能帮你。

String.Source: Of course he can. And if he can't well, it'll be his fault. I like Olivia's way of thinking.
String.Dest: 他当然能。要是他做得不好，那就是他的错。奥莉薇雅这种思路我喜欢。

String.Source: We could just buy you some scrolls.
String.Dest: 我们可以给你买点卷轴。

String.Source: And be a paper mage? Oh Gods no, I still have my pride.
String.Dest: 成为一个学术法师可不是一个好选择，九圣灵啊，我还是有作为战士的骄傲的。

String.Source: We could just buy you some scrolls.
String.Dest: 我们可以给你买点卷轴。

String.Source: We just need to find a mage who's a little more unorthodox than the ones here. Do you know anyone like that?
String.Dest: 我们只需要找一个不那么因循守旧的魔法师。你认识那样的人吗?

String.Source: How about an underground guild full of gutter wizards? Not informal enough?
String.Dest: 一个到处都是低劣的巫师的地下公会怎么样？过于正式了么？

String.Source: Probably not, I mean, they're still a guild. That would make them organized.
String.Dest: 也许不是，我是说，他们仍然是一个公会。这会让他们团结起来。

String.Source: How about an underground guild full of gutter wizards? Not informal enough?
String.Dest: 一个到处都是低劣的巫师的地下公会怎么样？过于正式了么？

String.Source: I'm thinking more along the lines of a mage who had sort of an unorthodox education. Do you know anyone like that?
String.Dest: I'm thinking more along the lines of a mage who had sort of an unorthodox education. Do you know anyone like that?

String.Source: Okay, maybe not mages that actually live in sewers. That would mean we'd have to actually go in one, and I just washed this robe.
String.Dest: 好吧，也许不是那些下水道的法师。但那意味着我们得亲自到那些下水道里找吧，我才把我的长袍洗了。

String.Source: That's just crazy enough to be the stupidest idea ever.
String.Dest: 那曾今是疯狂至极且愚蠢的主意。

String.Source: What I meant is, mages who had sort of an unorthodox education. Do you know anyone like that?
String.Dest: 我所说的是，没有受过一系列非传统教育的法师，你知不知道有谁是这样的？

String.Source: That's just crazy enough to be the stupidest idea ever.
String.Dest: 那曾今是疯狂至极且愚蠢的主意。

String.Source: Wow, that was a frightening experience. The Nords should really consider burning their dead.
String.Dest: 哇哦，那经历太可怕了。诺德人真应该好好考虑一下实行火葬的可行性。

String.Source: Although granted it would make opening urns a lot more harrowing.
String.Dest: 不过我想掀开骨灰罐的感觉确实会更痛苦一些吧。

String.Source: Well, that went about as poorly as one could expect. I need to make a mental note: Orcs are surly.
String.Dest: 唉，勉勉强强就那么回事儿吧。让我们铭记一条真理：兽人无比残暴。

String.Source: This is probably not the best place for me to learn anyway. Winterhold is a traditional institution.
String.Dest: 这里也许不是我进行研习的好选择，冬堡是一个传统而古板的学院。.

String.Source: We need to find a place that's the opposite of that. Like a college built by sewer mages.
String.Dest: 我们需要找到的是一个与此相反的地方。比如被下水道的法师们修建的学院。

String.Source: I think...I think I did it! I mean, it was smaller than a juniper berry but I actually felt the ward coming out of my hand! It worked!
String.Dest: 我想……我想我做到了！我是说，它比杜松果还小但是事实上我觉得结界正在从我的手中产生！成功了！

String.Source: I think it was a lesser ward! Although you can't really call it that. Maybe a lesser than lesser ward. Or the least ward. But still, a ward.
String.Dest: 我觉得这是一个小防护魔法。尽管你不会这么认为。或许比小防护魔法还要小，但是即便是最小的防护魔法，它也仍然是防护魔法。

String.Source: No, but now that you mention it, you did eat one of the sweet rolls I was saving. I wasn't going to say anything, but you brought it up.
String.Dest: 不,说起来, 你把我存起来的甜卷吃了. 我之前没有追究你, 但是你现在又让我回忆起来了.

String.Source: Meals?
String.Dest: 开饭了？

String.Source: Naturally I was terrified. But Otero rose up, looking fat and half drunk, and warned the bandits to leave, or die.
String.Dest: 我当然害怕了。但奥特罗站了起来，看起来酒意半酣又满腹油脂，他警告强盗要么离开这里，要么死在这里。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: The bandits took one look at the sweaty, rotund Nord and roared. "Shut up and empty your coin sack, jester," one of them cried.
String.Dest: 强盗们看一眼就乐弯了腰，圆滚滚的诺德人哈哈笑。“闭嘴吧小丑，破财免灾了，”其中的一个高声叫。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: Last chance, Otero said, "or I cut you all down." Some of the bandits doubled over. Another was reduced to tears. "With what sword?" he jeered.
String.Dest: Last chance, Otero said, "or I cut you all down." Some of the bandits doubled over. Another was reduced to tears. "With what sword?" he jeered.

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: They never saw the blade appear in his hand. I never saw a fat man act so swift. That's when I learned how truly disarming laughter really was.
String.Dest: 他们从未见他手中有剑。而我从未见过有哪个胖子能如此敏捷。正是从那时起我才知道“无敌意”的微笑的意义。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: He knew my favorite book was Withershins, and he would often converse with me in the order of the alphabet, much to our company's chagrin.
String.Dest: 他知道我最喜欢的书是《逆时针》，所以他老是跟我讨论类似的话题。这让我们的同伴十分窝火。

String.Source: How did that relationship develop?
String.Dest: 关系是如何发展起来的？

String.Source: A fine day it is, he'd say, "Better than the last," I'd reply.
String.Dest: A fine day it is, he'd say, "Better than the last," I'd reply.

String.Source: How did that relationship develop?
String.Dest: 关系是如何发展起来的？

String.Source: He often talked of his homeland, how it was the most humorless place in all of Tamriel.
String.Dest: 他经常会提及他的家乡，那儿绝壁上整个泰姆瑞尔大陆最没幽默感的地方。

String.Source: How did that relationship develop?
String.Dest: 关系是如何发展起来的？

String.Source: He talked of how it needed laughter. How laughter was the essence of joy, how it could disarm even the most guarded of men.
String.Dest: 他说大笑的重要性。说大笑是快乐的核心，即使最戒备的守卫也会因大笑而放松警惕。

String.Source: How did that relationship develop?
String.Dest: 关系是如何发展起来的？

String.Source: And if you can make a Nord laugh, he said, "you can make mammoths fly."
String.Dest: And if you can make a Nord laugh, he said, "you can make mammoths fly."

String.Source: How did that relationship develop?
String.Dest: 关系是如何发展起来的？

String.Source: It helps that my parents were troubadours, and we spent every day around traveling artists and performers of all walks of life.
String.Dest: It helps that my parents were troubadours, and we spent every day around traveling artists and performers of all walks of life.

String.Source: You're different than most High Elves I've met.
String.Dest: 你和见过的大部分高精灵很不同。

String.Source: Jesters, actors, magicians, and bards...a wellspring of speechcraft that you couldn't help but drink from.
String.Dest: Jesters, actors, magicians, and bards...a wellspring of speechcraft that you couldn't help but drink from.

String.Source: You're different than most High Elves I've met.
String.Dest: 你和见过的大部分高精灵很不同。

String.Source: It was the jester to whom I gravitated to, a Nord man named Otero.
String.Dest: 那是一个我喜欢的小丑，是个诺德人，叫奥特罗。

String.Source: You're different than most High Elves I've met.
String.Dest: 你和见过的大部分高精灵很不同。

String.Source: The road is a hard place. I learned that the day Otero took me aside to test his new act.
String.Dest: 此路难于登天。我才知道，那天奥特罗把我拉到一边，以测试他的新举动。

String.Source: How did you become an adventurer?
String.Dest: 你是怎么成为一个冒险者的？

String.Source: It was a series of stories, each more uproarious than the last.
String.Dest: 那是一系列笑话，一个比一个好笑。

String.Source: How did you become an adventurer?
String.Dest: 你是怎么成为一个冒险者的？

String.Source: Otero wasn't like other jesters who got cheap laughs from doing somersaults and wearing a hat with bells.
String.Dest: 奥特罗跟其他那些依靠翻筋斗和带铃铛帽子惹人发笑的小丑不一样。

String.Source: How did you become an adventurer?
String.Dest: 你是怎么成为一个冒险者的？

String.Source: Of course, he was far too portly a man to pull that off. So he found another way to make us laugh.
String.Dest: Of course, he was far too portly a man to pull that off. So he found another way to make us laugh.

String.Source: How did you become an adventurer?
String.Dest: 你是怎么成为一个冒险者的？

String.Source: That day, my laughter attracted the wrong kind of audience. A group of bandits.
String.Dest: That day, my laughter attracted the wrong kind of audience. A group of bandits.

String.Source: How did you become an adventurer?
String.Dest: 你是怎么成为一个冒险者的？

String.Source: That makes it sound so sinister, like some place you buy fur coats made from Khajiit pelts.
String.Dest: 这让它听起来很邪恶的样子，好像某个卖虎人毛皮做成皮衣的黑市。

String.Source: Imitation robes? Is it some sort of black market operation?
String.Dest: 冒牌法袍？这是什么黑市的路子吗？

String.Source: No, I'd say it's more like taking a sabrecat pelt, washing it with an oil and salt mixture, then using an enchantment to make the coat Khajiit soft.
String.Dest: 不，要我说更像是取一张剑齿虎皮，用油盐混合剂洗过之后，通过附魔让它柔软得像虎人的皮。

String.Source: Imitation robes? Is it some sort of black market operation?
String.Dest: 冒牌法袍？这是什么黑市的路子吗？

String.Source: I guess what I'm saying is, no mages were hurt in the sewing of this robe. Although maybe the college's reputation gets taken down a notch.
String.Dest: 我想说的是，没有法师会因袍子上的缝纫物而受伤，但或许学院的名誉就因此而蒙上一层阴影了。

String.Source: Imitation robes? Is it some sort of black market operation?
String.Dest: 冒牌法袍？这是什么黑市的路子吗？

String.Source: As to where I bought them, that's a bit of a secret. I used to know a Nord man who was blessed with the gift of forgery.
String.Dest: 我就是在那儿买的，这是个小秘密。我曾经认识一个诺德男人，他有上天赋予的铸造天赋

String.Source: Imitation robes? Is it some sort of black market operation?
String.Dest: 冒牌法袍？这是什么黑市的路子吗？

String.Source: Robes from Winterhold, fake scimitars from Hammerfell, there is nothing this craftsman could not build. Well, except a personality.
String.Dest: 从冬堡的长袍，到打造落锤省的弯刀，这个铁匠没什么不能造的。嗯，除了定制产品的。

String.Source: Imitation robes? Is it some sort of black market operation?
String.Dest: 冒牌法袍？这是什么黑市的路子吗？

String.Source: Not everyone can do both conjuration and alteration. Most can't do either.
String.Dest: 并不是所有人都会召唤和变换。大部分人只会其中一种。

String.Source: Bound armor spells are very 3rd Era. Now mages prefer alteration shields.
String.Dest: 绑定护甲法术已经过时了，如今法师们更喜欢变换系的护盾法术。

String.Source: I mean, tomes tell us how to cast magic, but does anyone really know how it works?
String.Dest: 我是说，法术书能教会我们如何施放法术，但是有人真正知道其中的原理么？

String.Source: Bound armor spells are very 3rd Era. Now mages prefer alteration shields.
String.Dest: 绑定护甲法术已经过时了，如今法师们更喜欢变换系的护盾法术。

String.Source: They say there's a book on conjuration so abstruse that only two scholars can understand it and both disagree on the meaning. Vehemently.
String.Dest: 他们说，有一本召唤书极其深奥，只有两个学者能看懂，而且两人理解出来的意思还不一致......那可是相当地不一致。

String.Source: Bound armor spells are very 3rd Era. Now mages prefer alteration shields.
String.Dest: 绑定护甲法术已经过时了，如今法师们更喜欢变换系的护盾法术。

String.Source: Well, you're getting warmer. I was thinking it was a Dremora horn. That's right Jurgen Windcaller was a dremora. It's just a theory, anyway.
String.Dest: 嗯，你看起来暖和些了. 我认为那是个魔人的号角. 也许唤风者约根是一个魔人. 这仅仅是我的猜想罢了.

String.Source: He wore it as a hat.
String.Dest: 他把它当帽子来戴。

String.Source: Well, I know one person who's willing to suffer this fool. And he's standing right in front of me.
String.Dest: 好吧，我知道谁能忍受这个傻逼了。他就站在我面前。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: Admit it, you love my childish antics. Can you imagine how dreadful life would be if you had to wake up every morning next to a humorless sod?
String.Dest: 承认吧，你喜欢我的风格。你能想象每天早上醒来面对着一个毫无幽默感的世界是多么可怕的人生么？

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: If you're curious, you can ask me, because I know. I'm married to one.
String.Dest: 如果你好奇的话，其实可以问我，因为我对婚姻很了解。我已经结婚了。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: No really, you're wonderful, savior of Skyrim and all that. You might want to stop with the insults though. Not everyone finds them attractive.
String.Dest: 那不是真的，你很棒，你拯救了天际和所有的一切。虽然你可能想要制止他们侮辱。但是要知道你不能要求每个人都欣赏你。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: Well, I know one person who's willing to suffer this fool. And she's standing right in front of me.
String.Dest: 哦，我知道有人乐意和这蠢材打交道。她就站在我面前。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: Admit it, you love my childish antics. Can you imagine how dreadful life would be if you had to wake up every morning next to a humorless sod?
String.Dest: 承认吧，你喜欢我的风格。你能想象每天早上醒来面对着一个毫无幽默感的世界是多么可怕的人生么？

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: If you're curious, you can ask me, because I know. I'm married to one.
String.Dest: 如果你好奇的话，其实可以问我，因为我对婚姻很了解。我已经结婚了。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: No really, you're wonderful, savior of Skyrim and all that. You might want to stop with the insults though. Not everyone finds them attractive.
String.Dest: 那不是真的，你很棒，你拯救了天际和所有的一切。虽然你可能想要制止他们侮辱。但是要知道你不能要求每个人都欣赏你。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: Well, I know one person who's willing to suffer this fool. And she's standing right in front of me.
String.Dest: 哦，我知道有人乐意和这蠢材打交道。她就站在我面前。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: Admit it, you love my childish antics. Can you imagine how dreadful life would be if your adventuring companion was some mindless atronach?
String.Dest: 认了吧，你爱我这幼稚的举动。 你能想象如果和你冒险的同伴只是一些愚蠢的石像，那会是多么可怕的生活吗？

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: If you're curious, you can ask me, because I know. I'm good friends with one.
String.Dest: 如果如果你感到好奇，你可以问我，因为我知道，你是我的好朋友。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: No really, you're wonderful, savior of Skyrim and all that. You might want to stop with the insults though. Not everyone finds them attractive.
String.Dest: 那不是真的，你很棒，你拯救了天际和所有的一切。虽然你可能想要制止他们侮辱。但是要知道你不能要求每个人都欣赏你。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: Anyways, good to have you back. I imagine you'll want to rest for a bit, but I'll be here if you need someone for your adventures.
String.Dest: Anyways, good to have you back. I imagine you'll want to rest for a bit, but I'll be here if you need someone for your adventures.

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: Well, I know one person who's willing to suffer this fool. And he's standing right in front of me.
String.Dest: 好吧，我知道谁能忍受这个傻逼了。他就站在我面前。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: Admit it, you love my childish antics. Can you imagine how dreadful life would be if your adventuring companion was some mindless atronach?
String.Dest: 认了吧，你爱我这幼稚的举动。 你能想象如果和你冒险的同伴只是一些愚蠢的石像，那会是多么可怕的生活吗？

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: If you're curious, you can ask me, because I know. I'm good friends with one.
String.Dest: 如果如果你感到好奇，你可以问我，因为我知道，你是我的好朋友。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: No really, you're wonderful, savior of Skyrim and all that. You might want to stop with the insults though. Not everyone finds them attractive.
String.Dest: 那不是真的，你很棒，你拯救了天际和所有的一切。虽然你可能想要制止他们侮辱。但是要知道你不能要求每个人都欣赏你。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: Anyways, good to have you back. I imagine you'll want to rest for a bit, but I'll be here if you need someone for your adventures.
String.Dest: Anyways, good to have you back. I imagine you'll want to rest for a bit, but I'll be here if you need someone for your adventures.

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: I do. They're tall, punctual, and have good posture.
String.Dest: I do. They're tall, punctual, and have good posture.

String.Source: As a High Elf, you must have an opinion on the Thalmor.
String.Dest: 作为一个高精灵，你必须对梭默有所表态。

String.Source: If I didn't know better I'd think that was an excuse. A lame one at that. Stay here and listen to your husband's bickering!
String.Dest: If I didn't know better I'd think that was an excuse. A lame one at that. Stay here and listen to your husband's bickering!

String.Source: Um...I think I dropped something or other outside. You keep at it.
String.Dest: 嗯……我想我把什么东西落在外面了。你先顶住。

String.Source: Or don't. I really have no opinion one way or the other.
String.Dest: 或者不。不管怎样，我真的没什么意见。

String.Source: Um...I think I dropped something or other outside. You keep at it.
String.Dest: 嗯……我想我把什么东西落在外面了。你先顶住。

String.Source: Well, that's the thing. I don't know for a fact that she saw me cringe. And if I tell her about the bug, there's no way she'll believe me.
String.Dest: 嗯，就是这样。我确实不知道她看到我畏惧了。就算我告诉她那个问题，她也不会相信。

String.Source: You nitwit. You should apologize to her.
String.Dest: 二货！还不快跟她道歉！

String.Source: Bringing it up would just make things awkward. Better to just let the guilt eat at my insides.
String.Dest: 再抖出这件事只会让人尴尬。还是让我一个人受良心的折磨吧。

String.Source: You nitwit. You should apologize to her.
String.Dest: 二货！还不快跟她道歉！

String.Source: It's right there in the word. I summon and bind blades and weapons from Oblivion.
String.Dest: 就在这个词里！我自湮灭召唤并束缚我的武器！

String.Source: What's a bladebinder?
String.Dest: 束刃是什么？

String.Source: I was always good with a sword and a bow, and always too lazy to carry them. Learning how to conjure the weapons I need solved that dilemma.
String.Dest: 我向来擅长弓和剑，只不过太懒了不想带着它们而已。要学习如何召唤武器我需要先从这个围城里走出来。

String.Source: What's a bladebinder?
String.Dest: 束刃是什么？

String.Source: Summoning weapons allows you to travel light. Your blade never rusts, your quiver never runs out of arrows.
String.Dest: 召唤的武器能使你轻装旅行。你的刀片不会生锈，你的箭袋也不会消耗箭矢。

String.Source: What's a bladebinder?
String.Dest: 束刃是什么？

String.Source: And when you find yourself in situations hairier than a troll's backside, traveling light makes it all the more easier to flee.
String.Dest: 当你发现你处于一个比趴在巨魔的背部更让人恐惧的局面时，轻装上阵，会让逃跑变得更容易。

String.Source: What's a bladebinder?
String.Dest: 束刃是什么？

String.Source: Not that I would advocate running from a fight. No, best to back away slowly until your friends intervene.
String.Dest: Not that I would advocate running from a fight. No, best to back away slowly until your friends intervene.

String.Source: What's a bladebinder?
String.Dest: 束刃是什么？

String.Source: Yes, the markets in Sovngarde must be awfully expensive given how desperate they are to take their possessions with them.
String.Dest: 是啊，鉴于松加德的人们是在多么铤而走险的情况下才能把自己的财产带在身边，那里市场的物价一定贵的吓人。

String.Source: If you don't like grave robbers, don't put gold in your coffin.
String.Dest: 如果你不喜欢盗墓贼，那就别在棺材里放金子。

String.Source: Oh, I wouldn't dare do such a thing! You know me, always serious, always respectful.
String.Dest: Oh, I wouldn't dare do such a thing! You know me, always serious, always respectful.

String.Source: I'm not saying the horn isn't real, just that it might not be the kind of horn you think it is.
String.Dest: 我并不是说那支号角不是真的，只是也许它不是你所想的那种号角。

String.Source: My theory is the horn isn't the kind you blow, but you know, the kind a dremora wears on his head. Just some food for thought.
String.Dest: 我的理解是那个号角不是你吹的那种，应该是，你见过的魔人头上顶的那种角吗，像那样的。这是个耐人寻味的事情。

String.Source: Oh really? I hope you mean madly in love with me, because I wasn't being serious earlier. Two out three apothecaries say I'm completely sane.
String.Dest: 哦，是吗？我真希望你的意思是已经无法自拔地爱上了我，因为我先前并不是太认真。现在，我确信自己是清醒的。

String.Source: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: 好消息我的丈夫，我也完全疯掉了。

String.Source: The third? Well, let's not talk about that one. Let's just say he won't be treating any more cases of dementia anytime soon. Because I killed him.
String.Dest: 已经第三个了？呃，咱们不聊那个了。这么说吧，很快他就不能再治愈任何一个痴呆患者了。因为我会杀了他的。

String.Source: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: 好消息我的丈夫，我也完全疯掉了。

String.Source: That was another joke by the way. Just making sure you know that grin on my face was a smile and not a creepy stare.
String.Dest: 顺便一说，那只是另一个玩笑。只是为了让你知道我刚刚裂开嘴是在微笑，而并不是什么惊悚的凝视。

String.Source: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: 好消息我的丈夫，我也完全疯掉了。

String.Source: Did I also mention how much I love you and that I'm glad your home?
String.Dest: 我有提到过我是多么爱你以及我很喜欢你的家吗?

String.Source: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: 好消息我的丈夫，我也完全疯掉了。

String.Source: Oh really? I hope you mean mad about adventuring, because I wasn't being serious earlier. Two out three apothecaries say I'm completely sane.
String.Dest: 哦是吗？我希望你是为冒险而痴狂，因为我一开始并不是认真的。三个药剂师里有两个都说我是完全正常的。

String.Source: Good news! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: 好消息！我也一起疯透了！

String.Source: The third? Well, let's not talk about that one. Let's just say he won't be treating any more cases of dementia anytime soon. Because I killed him.
String.Dest: 已经第三个了？呃，咱们不聊那个了。这么说吧，很快他就不能再治愈任何一个痴呆患者了。因为我会杀了他的。

String.Source: Good news! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: 好消息！我也一起疯透了！

String.Source: That was another joke by the way. Just making sure you know that grin on my face was a smile and not a creepy stare.
String.Dest: 顺便一说，那只是另一个玩笑。只是为了让你知道我刚刚裂开嘴是在微笑，而并不是什么惊悚的凝视。

String.Source: Good news! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: 好消息！我也一起疯透了！

String.Source: Should I introduce you to those apothecaries? Get them to vouch for me? Although that would be difficult, seeing as I made them up.
String.Dest: 要我把你介绍给那些药剂师吗？让他们帮我担保吗？虽然鉴于我对他们的所作所为，这可能有点儿困难。

String.Source: Good news! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: 好消息！我也一起疯透了！

String.Source: Anyways, good to have you back. I imagine you'll want to rest for a bit, but I'll be here if you need someone for your adventures.
String.Dest: Anyways, good to have you back. I imagine you'll want to rest for a bit, but I'll be here if you need someone for your adventures.

String.Source: Good news! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: 好消息！我也一起疯透了！

String.Source: No, those folks are far more adept at magic than I. Unless by illusion you mean hiding a dagger in my sleeve.
String.Dest: 不，那些家伙们对魔法远比我在行得多。除非你把袖子里藏匕首也叫幻术系法术。

String.Source: Would you classify yourself as a witchblade or spellsword then?
String.Dest: 你会把自己归结为一名魔女之刃呢还是个魔剑士呢？

String.Source: Unless by alteration you mean covering my nose in the presence of beggars, or by destruction you mean what time does to love.
String.Dest: 除非你的“变换”的意思是当有乞丐存在的时候捂住我的鼻子，“毁灭”的意思就像是时间对爱情所做的事情。

String.Source: Would you classify yourself as a witchblade or spellsword then?
String.Dest: 你会把自己归结为一名魔女之刃呢还是个魔剑士呢？

String.Source: If not, then I am no more a spellsword than a massage is restoration. I am more of a blacksmith. Oblivion is my forge, and conjuration my hammer.
String.Dest: 如果不是的话，那我就不再是个魔剑士，也不是个按摩恢复师。我更多是作为一名铁匠。湮灭是我的熔炉，并召唤着我的锤子。

String.Source: Would you classify yourself as a witchblade or spellsword then?
String.Dest: 你会把自己归结为一名魔女之刃呢还是个魔剑士呢？

String.Source: Wait, you were just making small talk? I thought we were playing the Withershins game.
String.Dest: 等等，你只是在闲聊天儿吗？我还以为我们在玩儿逆时针游戏呢。

String.Source: Yeah, it's a good day.
String.Dest: 是啊，天气是不错。

String.Source: Oh, right. That certainly does make things easier. I wonder if the same solution would've worked for Ulfric and General Tullius?
String.Dest: Oh, right. That certainly does make things easier. I wonder if the same solution would've worked for Ulfric and General Tullius?

String.Source: Actually, I killed both of them.
String.Dest: 实际上，我把他们两个都杀了。

String.Source: That's why I leave the tough moral quandaries to you. It saves me from all the thinking and absolves me of all the blame.
String.Dest: 所以我把难缠的道德难题留给了你解决，那样我才摆脱了一切思考和责任。

String.Source: Actually, I killed both of them.
String.Dest: 实际上，我把他们两个都杀了。

String.Source: Oh, right. That certainly does make things easier. I wonder if the same solution would've worked for Ulfric and General Tullius?
String.Dest: Oh, right. That certainly does make things easier. I wonder if the same solution would've worked for Ulfric and General Tullius?

String.Source: It doesn't matter. They will both die by my hand eventually.
String.Dest: It doesn't matter. They will both die by my hand eventually.

String.Source: That's why I leave the tough moral quandaries to you. It saves me from all the thinking and absolves me of all the blame.
String.Dest: 所以我把难缠的道德难题留给了你解决，那样我才摆脱了一切思考和责任。

String.Source: It doesn't matter. They will both die by my hand eventually.
String.Dest: It doesn't matter. They will both die by my hand eventually.

String.Source: Well, to be honest, I don't do anything to discourage the fact that I'm not a real mage. Sometimes I even use it to boost my own ego.
String.Dest: 呃，说实话，我并没有因为我不是一个真正的法师而气馁。有时我甚至用这个事实来激励自己。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: When I traveled from town to town, I would tell children stories of my heroics. Then I would show them a few jester's tricks Otero taught me.
String.Dest: When I traveled from town to town, I would tell children stories of my heroics. Then I would show them a few jester's tricks Otero taught me.

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: I'd pull a septim from behind their ear, or a flower from my sleeve.
String.Dest: 我可以从他们的耳朵里掏出一枚金币，或是从我的袖口变出一朵花。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: But one day, one of the children came rushing toward me, crying her eyes out. Her mother had been kidnapped by bandits.
String.Dest: But one day, one of the children came rushing toward me, crying her eyes out. Her mother had been kidnapped by bandits.

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: The other children comforted her, while I stood there dreading what would come next.
String.Dest: 另外一群孩纸在安慰她，而我站在一旁，忧虑着接下来要发生的事情。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: They told her not to worry. Rumarin the mage would come to the rescue. Looking into their eyes, I couldn't say no.
String.Dest: 他们让她别担心。法师罗勒美会把她的母亲给救出来。看着他们那样期盼的眼神，我怎么能忍心拒绝。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: I...I ended up paying the kidnapper's ransom. I've never been so ashamed.
String.Dest: I...I ended up paying the kidnapper's ransom. I've never been so ashamed.

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: I returned to the inn that night, and in a fit of rage, I started throwing away my belongings. They were as useless as I was.
String.Dest: 我那晚回到了旅馆，满腔怒火，我狠劲摔打我的东西。他们现在就如我当时那样无助。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: But toward the bottom of the sack, I found something I never knew was there. A gift from Otero. One last jester's trick.
String.Dest: 但在袋子的最底下，我找到了一件出乎我意料的东西。那是由奥特罗所送的一件礼物。这是那个小丑的最后一个玩笑了。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: It was a spell tome for a bound sword. And, I've relied on it ever since.
String.Dest: 这是约束之剑的魔法书。并且，我从那时起就一直依赖它。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: Well, don't make me feel guilty. You know I'm not the most romantic person in the world.
String.Dest: 好吧，别让我有罪恶感. 你知道我并不是这个世界上最浪漫的人.

String.Source: I love you too, husband.
String.Dest: 我也爱你，亲爱的。

String.Source: Okay, how about this. It would be a shame if you didn't come back. I'm too young to be a widow.
String.Dest: 好，这么说吧。要是你回不来的话就太可惜了。我可不想这么年轻就当寡妇。

String.Source: I love you too, husband.
String.Dest: 我也爱你，亲爱的。

String.Source: I'm tearing up already. Seriously though, please come back, I have no idea where we're supposed to put our trash.
String.Dest: 我早已泪水盈眶。说真的，请一定要回来。如果你不回来了，我要如何处置你带回的那些垃圾呢。

String.Source: I love you too, husband.
String.Dest: 我也爱你，亲爱的。

String.Source: And pay for our food? Oh no, that probably isn't a good idea. In that case, we're better off shopping at Carlotta's for fresh ingredients.
String.Dest: 还得给我们的食物付钱？哦不，在这种情况下这可不是个好主意，我们最好到Carlotta那儿买一些新鲜食材。

String.Source: We could just go to the Bannered Mare.
String.Dest: 我们可以去母马横幅。

String.Source: Did I ever tell you I'm an excellent cook? I think I have, but I have a very selective memory.
String.Dest: Did I ever tell you I'm an excellent cook? I think I have, but I have a very selective memory.

String.Source: We could just go to the Bannered Mare.
String.Dest: 我们可以去母马横幅。

String.Source: The problem is, that would also require more work. It would be easier if we could just get them to prepare better meals.
String.Dest: 问题是，那也要布置更多。如果我们只是让他们准备更好的饭菜，那会事情会变得相当简单。

String.Source: We could just go to the Bannered Mare.
String.Dest: 我们可以去母马横幅。

String.Source: Just throw in a word with the cook if you can. Blame it on the "stupid Elf," and then point at me and I'll wave or something.
String.Dest: 可以的话你去和厨师唠两句。把事情怪罪给“蠢货精灵”，然后指指我，我会挥挥手什么的。

String.Source: We could just go to the Bannered Mare.
String.Dest: 我们可以去母马横幅。

String.Source: Doubtful any day has been as good as this one. Okay, that was fun, but I really don't have the stamina or patience to go all the way to Z.
String.Dest: 恐怕从没有哪天像今天这么愉快了。好啦，真开心，不过我确实没有那个耐力或者耐心坚持到底啦。

String.Source: Can't say I disagree.
String.Dest: 就这样吧。

String.Source: Sure. Just leave me a honey nut treat and a bottle of beer or something to pass the time.
String.Dest: 好嘞。记得给我留串蜜果宴或者留罐啤酒，或者其他打发时间的东西。

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下。

String.Source: Yes. All the way to the ledge, but not over it. Even I have my limits.
String.Dest: 对，一直走到壁架 ，但不要越过去。我的忍耐是有限度的。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: {Departs}
String.Dest: {离开 }

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Now and forever. Just kidding. Marriage joke. I'll be going home now.
String.Dest: 从现在开始，直到永远。只是个玩笑，婚姻的玩笑。我现在得回家了。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Already? We haven't even told each other are deepest darkest fears yet! Mine's centaurs. There. Now we can go our separate ways.
String.Dest: 我们还没有告诉彼此最深的黑暗的恐惧呢！啊，我的半人马在那里。现在我们可以分道扬镳了。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: I'll be home if you need me. But who's to say I'll need you? We shall see, we shall see.
String.Dest: 如果你需要我，我就在家。谁说我会需要你啦？哼哼，我们走着瞧，走着瞧。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 不错，你看看。

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Make your request, and it shall be done. Eventually.
String.Dest: 提出你的要求，你终将会被满足。。

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Somehow I knew this was coming.
String.Dest: 反正我知道这要来。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: This always happens. Dump the goods on the Elf who carries nothing.
String.Dest: 总会发生向什么也没带的精灵倾倒商品这样的事。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: If only we could conjure everything. Keys, food, junk.
String.Dest: 要是我们有变戏法的本事那该多好，变出些钥匙、食物、垃圾什么的。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Alright, let's trade.
String.Dest: 好啊，来嘛。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: What do you need me to take?
String.Dest: 你有什么要我拿的？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Sure, I'll manage. Somehow.
String.Dest: 当然，我会处理的。。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Is that it?
String.Dest: 就是这个？

String.Source: You do realize that's impossible, don't you?
String.Dest: 你明白这是不可能的，对吧？

String.Source: Sorry, can't be done.
String.Dest: 对不起，我做不到。

String.Source: Zzzzz...
String.Dest: Zzzzz……

String.Source: Okay, can somebody explain to me why there are stairs at the end of those pipes? Because only a crazy person would think that's sensible.
String.Dest: Okay, can somebody explain to me why there are stairs at the end of those pipes? Because only a crazy person would think that's sensible.

String.Source: I wonder if the Hagraven magic differs depending on the skull. Does it matter to them if mine is lumpy?
String.Dest: I wonder if the Hagraven magic differs depending on the skull. Does it matter to them if mine is lumpy?

String.Source: So these cultists pray for more suffering, and then we show up to deliver it! Ha! It's funny if you don't think of them as people.
String.Dest: So these cultists pray for more suffering, and then we show up to deliver it! Ha! It's funny if you don't think of them as people.

String.Source: About Peryite...Far be it for me to tell a Daedric Prince how to do his job, but seriously, wouldn't the best person to spread your plague be a cook?
String.Dest: About Peryite...Far be it for me to tell a Daedric Prince how to do his job, but seriously, wouldn't the best person to spread your plague be a cook?

String.Source: So the Red Eagle really did have a flaming sword. I suppose that might sound impressive if you never seen an enchantment.
String.Dest: So the Red Eagle really did have a flaming sword. I suppose that might sound impressive if you never seen an enchantment.

String.Source: And with that, the Red Eagle is finally dead for the second time, unless someone tries to revive him again. We should really burn the corpse.
String.Dest: And with that, the Red Eagle is finally dead for the second time, unless someone tries to revive him again. We should really burn the corpse.

String.Source: Like, say you have an embarrassing social disease you want to hide from the others, and you need a potion. Just send them in the back way.
String.Dest: 比如你得了什么……见不得人的病，要买药就叫他们从这后门进。

String.Source: This cove is a great way to smuggle things in and out of camp.
String.Dest: 这个山凹真是带货出入营地的好路子啊！

String.Source: Wow, Gathrik's tomb, huh. The famous Gathrik from the battle of what's-his-name. You know, that Gathrik. Feel free to fill in the blanks at any time.
String.Dest: 哇，加斯瑞克的坟墓。 哈，加斯瑞克之战中大名鼎鼎的加斯瑞克。你懂得，就是那个加斯瑞克，什么时候都可以拿来当话题的那个。
