String.Source: Well, that escalated rather quickly. But maybe Christer won't mind that we took his one true love and spilled her brains on the floor.
String.Dest: 好吧，升级相当迅速嘛。也许克里斯特不会介意我们拿走他的挚爱并让他脑浆四溅。

String.Source: Look, I realize bandits aren't the sharpest tools in the shed, but if I'm a sentry, the last place I'd be standing is in front of a giant target.
String.Dest: 你瞧，我意识到强盗们在小屋里可不是什么敏捷的家伙，但如果我是个放哨的，我最不想站的地方估计是在一个巨型目标前面。

String.Source: Not to talk ill of the dead, but "The Bear will lead the way?" Agna could've just told you about the pull chain.
String.Dest: 不是我要非议死者，但是“熊会带路？”AGNA就应该告诉你关于链环的事的。

String.Source: Pressure plates are one thing, but I think your relatives are the more pressing concern. Get it, pressing? I'll just shut up now.
String.Dest: Pressure plates are one thing, but I think your relatives are the more pressing concern. Get it, pressing? I'll just shut up now.

String.Source: You know, this arena looks familiar. I think I lost 100 septims betting on one of these bandits. Now I don't feel so bad for killing them.
String.Dest: 知道吗，这个竞技场看起来还挺眼熟的。我想我浪费了100个金币的赌注在这群强盗中的某人身上。现在杀了他们我也不会觉得难受了。

String.Source: It's a good thing Christer didn't follow us. Can you imagine if he walked in right when Fjola gave us the ring? That would've been awkward.
String.Dest: 克里斯没跟着我们真是好事。你能想象当菲欧拉给我们戒指的时候他正好走过来回事什么样子吗？那就糗大了。

String.Source: You know, this Sybil seems awfully mature. Which is probably why I like her. Neither of us want to act our age.
String.Dest: 你知道吗，那个女预言家真的非常成熟。这就是我喜欢她的原因。我们中没有一个人想表现得与自己的年龄相符。

String.Source: Wow, this Nord must really love his wife. She must be a good cook.
String.Dest: Wow, this Nord must really love his wife. She must be a good cook.

String.Source: You know, one of these days I'd like to be able to explore a cave without finding a corpse on a slab.
String.Dest: 你要知道, 这些天我想去探索一个山洞而不是去找一具尸体.

String.Source: Not that I want to question our Khajiit friend who in no way looks like a thief, but how do you make incense out of a flawless ruby?
String.Dest: 我并非想怀疑我们这位怎么看也不是小偷的虎人朋友，不过你是怎么用无瑕的红宝石做出熏香的呢？

String.Source: Ah, the Dainty Sload! I know these pirates! The first mate is an Orc. I say we kill him before he remembers I owe him money.
String.Dest: 啊，小蛞蝓号！我知道这些海盗！他们的大副是个兽人。我得说，我们得在他记起我欠还他钱之前杀死他。

String.Source: I've heard there are some incredibly stupid people who think this place is full of gold. But it's not. It's full of something called "Guld."
String.Dest: 我听说有些蠢到家了的家伙相信这地方到处是金子。但才不是那样呢。这鬼地方是有带金字开头的东西，不过那玩意叫金盏花。

String.Source: So, I have a question. If a pickaxe made of iron can chip off ebony, orichalcum, and other ore, doesn't that make iron the strongest metal?
String.Dest: So, I have a question. If a pickaxe made of iron can chip off ebony, orichalcum, and other ore, doesn't that make iron the strongest metal?

String.Source: Don't get me wrong, I feel bad for this couple having to die, but I'm also very impressed by whoever killed them, hitting a moving target and such.
String.Dest: 别把我想得太糟，我对这对夫妻必须死感到很不好，但是我对杀死他们的人一样印象深刻，竟然能击中移动中的目标。

String.Source: You know, they really should put up a sign outside this camp. On one side it'd say, "Warning: Bandits." On the other it'd say "Beware: Adventurers."
String.Dest: 你瞧，他们真应该在这个营地外立个牌子。一半儿写着“警告：此处有强盗”，另一半儿刻上“冒险者出没注意”。

String.Source: They say broken towers are usually filled with broken people. This tower's lopsided as well. And yet, I feel a strange compulsion to move in...
String.Dest: 他们说破旧的塔楼里一定盘踞着一群乌合之众。这座塔楼也有点斜了。而且，我还感到似乎有一种力量隐隐约约在吸引我进去...

String.Source: I like how the bandit announced his plans to kill us instead of just stabbing us in the back. I wish more of them shared his candor.
String.Dest: 比起背后暗害的强盗们我更喜欢他这种光明正大挑明的和我们正面冲突的方式，我希望更多的强盗能学到他的坦率。

String.Source: The Silver-Bloods are willing to offer gold for this pile of dirt that is the target of constant Forsworn raids...and Ainethach said "No?"
String.Dest: 就算这烂泥坑里装满了弃誓者，银血家族也很乐意为它付上一笔钱买下它……但艾尼塔克那家伙的回答居然是"不"？

String.Source: I mean, let's be serious. If a bunch of smelly savages want your land, how valuable can it be?
String.Dest: 好了，大家认真一点。如果一坨野蛮人要占据你的土地，那土地还能值钱？

String.Source: Huzzah! The Draugr is dead and now the miners can go back to a life of dangerous labor for menial pay! We did it!
String.Dest: 乌拉！尸鬼已经死完了，而矿场又重回正轨。现在危险的日子一去不回！我们做到了！

String.Source: This poor, sweet old hag. All she wants is to get her tower back so she can go back to turning men into monsters. Is that too much to ask?
String.Dest: 这个可怜又可爱的女巫. 她只求要回她的塔楼继续回去进行把人变成怪物的勾当。难道她要求过分么？

String.Source: Wow, I can't believe the Gildergreen's restored. And all it took was sap from the Eldergleam. It's like some kind of strange tree incest.
String.Dest: 哇哦，我简直无法相信翠苒树复活了，所需的只是古藤圣所的树液。像是树之间的通亲之类的奇怪的事情一样。

String.Source: I think Danica has a point. This sapling won't bring nearly as much glory to her pockets...I mean, Kynareth as the old tree.
String.Dest: 我觉得Danica有道理。种子不会带来和她匹敌往日的荣耀。我的意思是，无论是对吉娜莱丝还是那颗老树。

String.Source: We're incredibly far east for a Forsworn camp. Just how much of Skyrim do they think is there's anyway? Not that I blame them for fudging the maps.
String.Dest: 为了找一个弃誓者营地我们已经向东走得太远了吧。我不是在责怪他们捏造地图。但是他们到底认为天际有多少土地需要我们去探寻？

String.Source: I'm not sure who to trust here. Saadia seems rather shady, but so do these Alik'r. I say we help the highest bidder. Gold would never lie.
String.Dest: 我不知道在这里该信任谁了。萨蒂亚似乎相当可疑，但那些阿利克尔人也没好到哪儿去。我得说我们还是去帮出价最高的人吧。金子不会说谎。

String.Source: Are you sure that's Nettlebane? Shouldn't it be, I don't know, an axe or something? Unless the Eldergleam is smaller than I remember.
String.Dest: 你确定那是草木灾星？不觉得应该是把斧头什么的吗？除非古老闪光比我记忆中的要小。

String.Source: So this Meridia speaks to you, but curiously not to your faithful companion. Wouldn't it better to call a meeting so we can coordinate our movements?
String.Dest: 所以美瑞蒂亚跟你说话了，但却莫名其妙的不理会你忠诚的伙伴。如果我们能开一个小会，然后协调我们的行动不是更好吗？

String.Source: Liar's Retreat. Did I ever tell you this tavern was named after me? Well, that's the joke, anyway. It doesn't seem so funny now.
String.Dest: Liar's Retreat。我告诉过你这个酒馆是以我命名的么？好吧，这是个玩笑。虽然现在听起来不怎么好笑。

String.Source: I'm glad Jarl Elisif takes the time to listen to crazy farmers from Gods know where. It's not like there's other things she needs to address.
String.Dest: 我很高兴艾丽西弗领主还有时间去倾听那帮不知道从哪个鬼地方滚出来的脑子坏掉的农民的情愿。看起来似乎她也没别的事情需要去关心了。

String.Source: A bound queen! What an amazing idea. Not Potema, she was crazy, but what about summoning bound rulers to replace the ones we don't like! It's genius.
String.Dest: A bound queen! What an amazing idea. Not Potema, she was crazy, but what about summoning bound rulers to replace the ones we don't like! It's genius.

String.Source: I wonder why some of the bandits sleep on the shipwreck? It must be their version of Cidhna Mine.
String.Dest: 我在想为什么一些土匪喜欢在船骸上睡觉。 他们一定是这样诠释Cidhna Mine的.

String.Source: So the Rueful Axe. I bet it's only half as powerful as the Woebegone Dagger.
String.Dest: So the Rueful Axe. I bet it's only half as powerful as the Woebegone Dagger.

String.Source: Bees, bears, blood, bones, and bandits. All this cave needs now is baubles. I'm sure they're in that chest, I mean, box.
String.Dest: 死蜜蜂，死狗熊，死人血，死人骨，死强盗。现在这洞窟只差死人的财宝了。我很确定在那个箱子里，我是说，死盒子里。

String.Source: Redoran's Retreat. Is that like House Redoran? I didn't know there was a clan in Morrowind completely devoted to banditry.
String.Dest: 瑞多然的休息处。这就像是瑞多然的家？我还真不知道这个晨风省的氏族已经完全致力于强盗事业了。

String.Source: Small caves like this are a great place to catch Bone Break Fever.
String.Dest: 像这样的小洞窟最容易得骨热病了。

String.Source: So now we take the scroll to the "time-wound?" Does that mean someone stabbed it? Will it fester? Suddenly I'm concerned. But not really.
String.Dest: 所以现在我们要用这张卷轴来对付 "时间伤口" 了吗？它会被刺伤吗？伤口会恶化吗? 我突然觉得很担心。这不是真的对吧？

String.Source: You know how I know a cave is weird? The mushrooms. Without them, this place is just peculiar. But add a giant glowing mushroom, and you have weird.
String.Dest: 你知道我是怎么知道一个洞穴很诡异的吗？蘑菇。如果没有蘑菇，这个地方只不过有些奇怪。但当一个巨大的蘑菇长在这儿，就变得诡异了。

String.Source: If I were a Falmer slave, I would give all my masters names and paint them on their chests. How else am I supposed to know who's water I'm fetching?
String.Dest: 如果我是一个雪精灵奴隶的话，我会给我的每一个主人都起名字并且把它写在他们的胸脯上。不这样的话我怎么知道自己是在给谁取水呢？

String.Source: Was that really a crimson nirnroot over there? And is that really a cooking pot? Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
String.Dest: 那边的真的是猩红奈恩根？那玩意确定是煮饭锅？你和我在想一样的事情么？

String.Source: You know, sometimes I think the Dwarves are trying to send us a message from wherever they are. Most days, that message is "I want to kill you."
String.Dest: 你知道的，有时候我觉得矮人试图传递给我们一个消息，无论他们身在何处。大多数情况下，这个消息是“我想杀了你。”

String.Source: Look, this poor sod died trying to reach his ale. He would've gotten to it too, if he wasn't stuck inside a bushel of hay.
String.Dest: 瞧，这个可怜虫多么拼命想够到他的啤酒啊。如果不是被这堆干草困住的话，他肯定就能得手了。

String.Source: Alright I get the part about Septimus needing an Elder Scroll, what I don't understand is everything else he said.
String.Dest: 对于赛普汀默示的话，我除了他想找到上古卷轴那一部分话之外，别的我是一个字儿都听不懂。

String.Source: So this puzzle has pillars, but no clues. It's almost as if they don't want us to solve it.
String.Dest: 所以这个谜题只有本体而几乎无线索. 好像他们不想让我们解决它，所以才设计的无迹可寻.

String.Source: Drinking blood isn't my thing, but if it was, I probably would try and put more of it down my throat instead of on the walls.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢喝血，如果我喜欢的话，我应该会把血更多的吞进喉咙而不是洒在墙上。

String.Source: Remember when we met? There were skeletons there too. This is kind of like that time, only now my toes are frozen.
String.Dest: 还记得我们相遇的时候吗？当时那儿也有些骷髅。现在就跟那时一样，只不过现在我的脚趾头都冻僵了。

String.Source: There were 3 Blades standing behind you in that relief...Delphine, Esbern, and a mystery third person? Lucky for me, that sword isn't conjured.
String.Dest: 有3个强大的力量会在背后为你撑腰当你后援...戴尔菲娜, Esbern, 和神秘的第三个人? 我真幸运，这些高手都不是幻觉.

String.Source: Wow, did you see Arngeir's face curl up when he starting talking about the Blades? You'd think Esbern slept with his sister.
String.Dest: 哇哦，你有没有注意到，每次谈到刀锋的时候，艾恩盖尔的脸都拧巴得苦瓜一样? 你会觉得伊思本真的有和他姐姐私通.

String.Source: Alduin's Wall. I'm not sure what the law says, but doesn't that mean it's technically his property? I mean, it's his wall.
String.Dest: 奥杜因之墙。我不知道法律上该怎么说，但从严格意义上来说，这不是他的财产吗？我的意思是，这是他的墙。

String.Source: You know, if I lived in the Ratways, I'd be predicting dragons would return too. I'd also be wearing my pants on my head.
String.Dest: 你知道, 如果我呆在鼠道里, 也能预感到龙会回归的话. 我也会把裤子穿在脑袋上.

String.Source: The mead bottle Esbern, don't forget the mead bottle. Unless it's Black Briar mead. Then you can forget it.
String.Dest: 还有蜜酒啊，伊斯本，别忘了拿上蜜酒。除非它是黑荆棘蜜酒，那你就可以忘了这件事儿了。

String.Source: So the secret code was renting the attic room? I would've went with a weird menu item like the potage, or the name of a childhood toy or something.
String.Dest: 所以说密码就在顶楼？我应该一张古怪的名单上去吗？例如浓汤料或者童年玩具的名称什么的？.

String.Source: Blast it, Delphine! Don't you ever stop running?
String.Dest: 真要命，戴尔芬！你能别一直跑吗？

String.Source: A Thalmor party? I bet they throw great ones. It's always the people you least expect.
String.Dest: 一个梭默的宴会? 我打赌他们邀请了些重量级人物。那里肯定有你意想不到的人。

String.Source: I'm glad to see you made it out alive. I heard some noises coming from up there, but it was a party, so...it could've been a good thing.
String.Dest: I'm glad to see you made it out alive. I heard some noises coming from up there, but it was a party, so...it could've been a good thing.

String.Source: Ooh! A mystery friend in Riverwood! I love mysteries! Who do you think it is? I bet it's this fifth Greybeard the others were talking about.
String.Dest: 哦！一个神秘的朋友在河木镇！我爱神秘的感觉！你感觉那会是谁呢？我打赌连那五个灰胡子都在谈论这件事。

String.Source: Oh look what's for dinner, a canis root and a boiled chaurus egg. I'm going to have to have a word with the chef.
String.Dest: 噢，看看晚饭都有些什么，一个犬型根和一个水煮查鲁斯卵。我得找主厨谈谈了。

String.Source: Well, we made it. Ivarstead. It looks like a nice enough village. I don't know why anyone would want to live atop a mountain when they can live here.
String.Dest: 恩，我们成功了。紫杉镇。它看起来真是个不错的村庄。我不明白为什么有人在他们可以住在这里的时候却非想住在山上。

String.Source: The Greybeards get free food and water delivered to them? Well, if you call salted meats food. Here's a hint. It isn't.
String.Dest: 有人免费为灰胡子们送去食物和水？好吧，要是你把那种咸肉也称为食物的话。我个人觉得那不算是。

String.Source: I think some of these Greybeards rather enjoyed getting hit with your thu'um. Don't be surprised if you find some whips and chains in the back room.
String.Dest: 我觉着这些灰胡子更喜欢被你的吐目射中的感觉。如果你在后面的房子找到了些鞭子和锁链，可千万别惊讶。

String.Source: Did you hear that? Brynjolf sells an elixir that gives you "god-like" powers! I wonder if he gives discounts for buying in bulk.
String.Dest: 你听到了吗？布林乔夫卖的药能给你神一样的力量！我不知道从他那儿批发有没有折扣。

String.Source: We just stopped a plot to overthrow the Thieves Guild! Sure it was being carried out by two mad beggars, but Brynjolf doesn't have to know that part.
String.Dest: 我们阻止了一个推翻盗贼工会的阴谋！可以肯定的是这是两个疯乞丐搞的鬼，但布林乔夫不需要知道这一部分。

String.Source: Ah, extortion. And then say there are no good careers for childhood bullies.
String.Dest: 啊，勒索。然后就该说这里没什么能欺负孩子的好职业了。

String.Source: If Goldenglow Estate is where they get the honey for Black-Briar mead, where do they get the garbage? Because it tastes like it has both.
String.Dest: If Goldenglow Estate is where they get the honey for Black-Briar mead, where do they get the garbage? Because it tastes like it has both.

String.Source: Wow, Maven Black-Briar. I've never met a famous person before. Do we have to dress up? I don't know any spells for conjuring fine robes.
String.Dest: 哇噢。黑荆棘玛雯。我以前从没见过名人啊。得穿一身正装才行吧？可我不会什么召唤礼服的法术啊。

String.Source: So are you going to make the joke or am I? You know, about the poison being Black-Briar mead.
String.Dest: 所以这个笑话是由你还是由我来讲？就是那个关于毒药和黑荆棘蜜酒的笑话，你知道的。

String.Source: If I wanted to split up Maven and the Thieves Guild, I would've just hired you to do it. But I'm sure this Gulum-Ei is a capable turncoat.
String.Dest: 如果我要把玛雯和盗贼工会分离开，我就不止会雇你一个来干了。但是我相信这个鲁姆·埃是个叛徒坯子。

String.Source: Skeevers? That's weird. You'd think he'd start with an army of trolls. Or mammoths. Even birds could be useful. I wonder if he tried those first.
String.Dest: 雪鼠？真奇怪。你会以为他应该从一群巨魔开始。或者是长毛象。就算是鸟也有点用。不知他有没有先试过那些。

String.Source: Good to see you on your feet. For a second there I thought was going to have to avenge you. But now you can avenge yourself. With my help.
String.Dest: 很高兴看到你还活着. 上一秒我还认为可能需要去为你报仇.但是现在你可以在我的帮助下进行复仇了.

String.Source: Why bother translating Gallus' journal? It won't be in his writing. Wouldn't it make more sense to hire a forger?
String.Dest: Gallus的日记有什么好翻译的？那又不会是他自己写的。还不如找个专业的造假师呢吧？

String.Source: This is what I don't get. Delvin and Brynjolf never noticed things were missing? I think one of them is colluding with Mercer.
String.Dest: 我就是不明白这个。戴尔文和布林乔夫从没注意过丢东西了吗？我觉着他们中的某人是墨瑟的同伙。

String.Source: Did you read that note? "M" is for Mercer. Who do you think "R" stands for? Do we know anyone whose first name starts with the letter "R?"
String.Dest: 你读了那个纸条吗？“M”是指墨瑟。你觉得"R"指的是谁呢？咱们认识哪个人名字开头字母是“R”的吗？

String.Source: Do you mind if maybe, when this all over, if a friend of mine can borrow your Nightingale Armor? You know, to make replicas and sell them for gold.
String.Dest: 如果你不介意的话，等这一切结束了，我的一个朋友可以借你的夜莺铠甲一用吗？你懂的，做做复制版啦。。然后换点小钱什么的。

String.Source: All three of you made it! Wait, how do I know one of you isn't Mercer?
String.Dest: All three of you made it! Wait, how do I know one of you isn't Mercer?

String.Source: So now that you have the skeleton key, we can open a lot of doors. Any door, for that matter. Which door should we open first? I'm drawing a blank.
String.Dest: 既然现在你有万能钥匙了，你就可以打开很多扇门了。事实上，是个门你就能开。你想先开哪扇门？我列张表出来。

String.Source: I was master of a guild once. Only it wasn't so much of a guild as it was people around a campfire, and by master I mean gathered the kindling.
String.Dest: 我曾经一度是公会的头领。尽管那时的公会不过是人们聚在火堆旁烤火，而作为公会头领的任务则是把人们聚在一起并点燃火。

String.Source: The ghosts of the original Companions. To think, if it weren't for them, Skyrim would be full of Elves. Does that make them heroes or murderers?
String.Dest: 那些是战友团前辈的幽灵。想想吧，要不是他们，天际省就全被精灵占了。这样说的话他们到底是英雄呢还是凶手呢？

String.Source: Okay, what just happened? You and Aela were swinging at nothing, and then talking to nothing, and now you're Harbinger? I'm confused.
String.Dest: 好吧，刚才发生了什么事儿？你和艾拉突然晃来晃去，然后对着空气说了半天话，而现在你就成了预言者了？我有点儿糊涂了。

String.Source: I...I can't believe the old wolf is dead.
String.Dest: 我……我不敢相信这只老狼已经死了。

String.Source: Who do you think told Kodlak about what you and Aela were up to? My gold's on Skjor. Sure, he's dead, but wouldn't that make for the perfect alibi?
String.Dest: 你以为是谁告诉了科拉克关于你和艾拉的打算？我赌思科月。当然，他是死了，不过这样就成了更完美的不在场证明，对吧？

String.Source: Here's a question. These witches are half-birds, right? Do you think they lay eggs? Or would it be half an egg for half a bird?
String.Dest: 我有一个疑问。这些女巫是半人半鸟对吗？那你知道他们生蛋吗？或者跟进一步说，她们会生下半人半鸟的幼崽吗？

String.Source: This is an impressive kitchen for an old Nord fort. I wonder if we have time to cook something up. You can kill more bandits with stew than swords.
String.Dest: 这厨房在诺德古堡里面太奇特了。我觉得我们有时间多做点好吃的。你用汤杀死的强盗能比用剑还多。

String.Source: Don't you think Stalleo should have lent us one of his bodyguards? I don't want to say he's a coward, but I'm heavily implying it.
String.Dest: 你不觉得Stalleo保镖太多了以至于应该把他的保镖借个给我们么？我不想说他是个胆小鬼，不过我就是这么个意思。

String.Source: So you're the Harbinger now. You make the decisions. And yet the food here remains the same. Curious.
String.Dest: So you're the Harbinger now. You make the decisions. And yet the food here remains the same. Curious.

String.Source: So...um...what's with the skulls? Creepy.
String.Dest: So...um...what's with the skulls? Creepy.

String.Source: Do we tell Grosta the truth? Because it's so ridiculous, him being lured here and murdered, that it sounds like we're just covering for his whoring.
String.Dest: 我们该告诉格罗斯塔真相吗？因为这……太荒唐了。他被诱骗到这儿，然后就被干掉了。听起来就像是我们在为他的寻花问柳做掩饰。

String.Source: You know, I was a bit intimidated by this lot at first. But the Companions have mercs, green thumbs, and even a drunk! We fit right in!
String.Dest: 你懂的，我先被这一大帮子人吓着了。但仔细一瞅，他们里边有雇佣兵，有花匠，甚至还有个醉鬼！正合我意！

String.Source: Is it me, or are the ceilings here really low? If I bump my head on a support beam and this place collapses, don't blame me. Blame short people.
String.Dest: 到底是因为我太高呢还是这地方的天花板就那么矮？如果我不相信把我的脑袋撞在横梁上导致这地方坍塌的话，那别怪我，去怪那些矮个子吧。

String.Source: These initiation rituals are odd. What if I could slay dragons but made for a poor errand boy? They'd never know, because I failed at fetching.
String.Dest: These initiation rituals are odd. What if I could slay dragons but made for a poor errand boy? They'd never know, because I failed at fetching.

String.Source: Do we have a cure disease potion? I think this Haelga could use one. Or twelve.
String.Dest: 我们还有祛病药剂吗？我觉得哈尔嘉可能会用掉一个。或是一打。

String.Source: Is it too late to take bets? Good, because I was about to put it all on the Elf, and now...well, forget I said anything.
String.Dest: 现在下注太晚了吗？好吧，因为我想把全身家当压在那个精灵身上，现在……呃，忘了我刚说的话吧。

String.Source: Mining for soul gems, huh. Well that's new.
String.Dest: 这是打算挖出灵魂石来么。好吧这可挺新鲜的。

String.Source: Oh look, a hole in the roof. I wonder if people just drop in from time to time.
String.Dest: 哦，看，房顶上有个洞。我在想从那上面是不是经常会掉下个人来。

String.Source: Is it me, or are those coffins a bit on the small side? Maybe these conjurers have a thing for female Bretons.
String.Dest: 是我的问题吗，还是那些棺材的有点短小小？也许这些巫师有适合布莱顿人女人的棺材。

String.Source: Ancano is dead, and yet the Psijics take your boon. In the end, you were their pawn.
String.Dest: Ancano is dead, and yet the Psijics take your boon. In the end, you were their pawn.

String.Source: Alright, no turning back now. I mean, we could turn back and run backwards, but that's just semantics. Anyways, let's go kill Ancano, shall we?
String.Dest: Alright, no turning back now. I mean, we could turn back and run backwards, but that's just semantics. Anyways, let's go kill Ancano, shall we?

String.Source: Step 1: Kill the disembodied voice. Step 2: Retrieve the Staff of Magnus. Step 3: Shove it down Ancano's throat.
String.Dest: 第一步：除掉不切实际的声音。第二步：取回玛格努斯之杖。第三步: 把玛格努斯之杖塞进安卡诺的喉咙。

String.Source: Hey, one of those ghosts looked familiar. I know, don't tell me, it was Tolfdir, right? Oh Gods, does that mean he's dead too?
String.Dest: 嘿，那些鬼魂里有一个很眼熟。我知道了，先别告诉我，那是托夫迪尔，是吧？噢神啊，那是不是意味着他也死了？

String.Source: Do you understand what he's saying? Because I haven't the faintest idea.
String.Dest: 你懂他在说啥吗？我可是听懵了。

String.Source: Oh, that's a little better. Still needs to work on his diction though.
String.Dest: 喔，好点了。不过还是要注意措辞。

String.Source: Wow, is it dead? I mean, I know it's already dead, it's a bone dragon, but is it dead dead?
String.Dest: 哇哦，它死了吗？我是说我知道骨龙本来就是死的，不过现在是不是已经死的不能再死了？

String.Source: Oh...the "Augur" of Dunlain. Now it makes sense. Here I was excited about meeting a magical Ogre, and instead it's some talking ball of light.
String.Dest: 哦……是“预言师”杜兰。这就有些道理了。我本为能见到一些会魔法的食人魔而感到兴奋，现在却因为看见了一个会说话的光球。

String.Source: Ancano should relax. Hasn't he heard of a Psijic Order? You walk into a tavern, order 400 sweet rolls, and when the maid brings them over, you run.
String.Dest: 安卡诺应该休息下。 他没有听说过一个Psijic点菜的故事么？你走进一个酒店，点了400个甜甜圈，等待者把它们端上来的时候，你就跑了。

String.Source: I rather like this room. When you're done shooting things, you can sit down, have a drink, and read a good burned book.
String.Dest: 我挺喜欢这间屋子呢。当你练习完射箭，就可以随便坐下，喝点东西，捧一本烧焦的书来读读。

String.Source: Alright, this is the last straw. Murder, necromancy, torture...that I can abide, but Talos worship? Kill the lawbreakers! Sorry. Thalmor joke.
String.Dest: 好吧，这是底线。谋杀，妖术，酷刑...我都能忍受，但你说塔洛斯信仰？杀了那帮异教徒！哦抱歉，这只是梭默玩笑来着。

String.Source: This vampire finished two plates of humans but didn't touch his apple. I'm going to need to have a word with his mother.
String.Dest: 这个吸血鬼吃掉了两盘人肉但却不去碰他的苹果，看来我得和他的老妈谈谈了。

String.Source: Great! We retrieved the books, and all we had to do was find a stupid Elf and kill a dangerous one. It was a lot of work, is what I'm saying.
String.Dest: 太好了！我们重新取回了书，并且我们现在要做的就是找到那个蠢精灵，然后宰了那个危险的家伙。我说的这些，可有好多活要干呢。

String.Source: Great! We retrieved the books, and nobody had to die. Well, nobody we care about anyway. If only all evil warlocks were this accommodating.
String.Dest: 好极了！我们把书复原了，谁都不用死了。额，反正我们根本不在乎有谁会挂掉。要是所有的邪恶术士这么肯通融该好啊。

String.Source: Vampires and conjurers. Oh, I'm all for letting them kill each other. Yes, I conjure weapons, but I'm not a mage. I trust they know the difference.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼和召唤师。哦，我致力于让他们自相残杀。对，没错，我召唤武器，但是我不是法师。我相信他们能分辨出个中差异。

String.Source: Do you really think it was wise to split up? Does Tolfdir care at all about the welfare of his students? Sure, we can handle ourselves, but still.
String.Dest: 你觉得在这儿分头行动对劲吗？Tolfdir 在乎学生们的人身安全吗？ 当然我们是能自保的，不过还是小心为妙……

String.Source: Finally, a puzzle worthy of someone of my intellect! And by that I mean a puzzle designed for a self-educated peasant.
String.Dest: 终于有个能配得上我的智商的谜题了。 我是说一个为自学成才的精灵设计的谜题。

String.Source: Tolfdir's right. The Arch-Mage must be told of this discovery! A copy of the Lusty Argonian Maid, right here in Saarthal! And the orb too I suppose.
String.Dest: 托夫迪尔是对的。必须向首席法师汇报这一发现！一本《元气满满的亚龙人女仆》，在萨瑟尔城里！我想。。也许还有那个球？

String.Source: What in Oblivion were these things? Damn that Ancano. He gives us Elves a bad name.
String.Dest: 这特么都是些什么玩意儿？该死的安卡诺。他是我们精灵的耻辱。

String.Source: The Synod? Here? In Skyrim? Well, there's a lot of people here in Skyrim I suppose. By the way, what's a Synod?
String.Dest: 希诺人？这里？在天际省？ 好吧，我想在天际省的人略有点多。顺带问一下，什么是希诺人？

String.Source: You know, I'm starting to miss those old Nord puzzles. This Dwarven one doesn't even have pictures.
String.Dest: 你知道，我开始想念那些诺德人的老式谜题了。这些矮人的玩意连图画都没有。

String.Source: Of all the things you can do with horkers, mounting them on a wall would be last on my list. Birna seems nice though for a crazy person.
String.Dest: 在海象的所有用途里面，我最不可能把它当装饰挂在墙上。不过比尔娜弄的还行吧，从疯子的角度而言。

String.Source: I love tours as much as the next Elf, but when do we get to blow stuff up? Notice how I said we? I hope no one notices I'm not a real student.
String.Dest: 我跟之后那个精灵一样喜欢旅行，但什么时候我们才能做完这些事儿？ 注意到了吗我说的是“我们”？希望没人发现我不是真的学生。

String.Source: The Frozen Hearth? That doesn't sound very inviting. Although mages might appreciate the paradox.
String.Dest: 冰封熔炉？那听起来不咋地。虽然法师们也许会欣赏这种悖论。

String.Source: This one reminds me a lot of myself. The drunken lout, not the Elf in college robes.
String.Dest: 这个人让我想起了自己。一个醉鬼，而不是一名学院里的长袍精灵。

String.Source: More levers! But no pictures this time. They're not even trying to keep us out anymore.
String.Dest: More levers! But no pictures this time. They're not even trying to keep us out anymore.

String.Source: There's 3 of us here. What if this was one of those puzzles where we had to pull the levers simultaneously? What do you mean there's no such thing?
String.Dest: There's 3 of us here. What if this was one of those puzzles where we had to pull the levers simultaneously? What do you mean there's no such thing?

String.Source: If I were Bryling, I would name this mine something like "Sunshine and Butterflies." It would cut down on a considerable amount of wallowing.
String.Dest: 如果我是布莱琳，我就会把这个矿场命名为“阳光小蝴蝶”什么的。这能大大减少这里的忧郁气氛。

String.Source: Anska, I don't know if you want to pursue this scroll. The way the Thalmor are taking over, it's better not to be related to Ysgramor.
String.Dest: 安斯卡，我不知道你是否想追寻这个卷轴。梭默已经接管了局势，最好别让伊斯格拉谟再卷进来。

String.Source: So we're not following the crazy dream priest, are we? Well, at least he's taking us to a place where no one will hear us, I mean him, scream.
String.Dest: 那么我们没有在跟随疯神的脚步，是吗？好吧，至少他把我们带到了一个没人能听到我们说话的地方，我指他，那个尖叫的疯子。

String.Source: Oh look, another beautiful grove and another dead alchemist. I'm beginning to think the Spriggans grow all these ingredients to bait them.
String.Dest: 噢看啊，又一片美丽的林地和又一个死去的炼金术师。我开始认为是树精故意种下所有这些草药来引诱他们了。

String.Source: I don't understand what all the debate is about. Quicksilver ore is obviously more valuable than iron.
String.Dest: 我不明白还要吵些什么。水银矿明显比铁矿有价值。

String.Source: Why do they call these men "Spectres?" They don't look like ghosts.
String.Dest: 他们为什么会把这些人称作“幽灵”？他们看起来并不像鬼魂。

String.Source: Funny, I think this fort would've been easier to defend if they actually used all these potions and armor instead of decorating the tables with them.
String.Dest: 真有趣。我想如果他们把那些药剂和护甲投入使用而不是当做装饰品的话，这个要塞会更容易防守。

String.Source: The Temple of the Divines. Wouldn't it be funny if the Gods spoke a different language? Then all our prayers would just sound like nonsense.
String.Dest: 圣灵神庙。如果圣灵们说的是另一种语言会不会很有趣？那样的话，我们所有的祈祷在他们听上去都会像是呓语。

String.Source: Radiant Raiment. I would have gone with "Argent Armor" myself, but that's just splitting hairs.
String.Dest: 是锦衣，如果是‘银色盔甲’我早都带着它跑路了，但是这只是鸡蛋里挑骨头的玩笑罢了。

String.Source: I bet murderers love taverns with an apprentice. You can kill the innkeep and still be confident the mead will flow.
String.Dest: 我觉得杀人犯们一般比较喜欢那种有学徒的酒馆。即使杀了老板，也不影响营业。

String.Source: Ever notice the skulls on these enchanting tables? They have horns yes, but they also have three eyes. Three!
String.Dest: 留意到放在漂亮桌子上的那些骷髅了吗? 他们的确有角, 但它们也有三只眼睛. 三只!

String.Source: Fort Snowhawk. Named after the nocturnal bird that I just made up.
String.Dest: 雪鹰要塞。 是以一种我编造的夜鸟的名字命名的

String.Source: Ugh, you're not thinking of taking this mangy dog with us, are you? Well, I'm not sleeping in the same room.
String.Dest: 啊，你不会真的想带这只肮脏的狗一起走吧，不会吧？好吧，我可不会和他睡在一个房间。

String.Source: This mage didn't kill as many Draugr as I hoped. I guess it would've been asking too much for a leisurely walk to the treasure.
String.Dest: 这法师干掉的尸鬼不如我想象的多。我猜一次轻松的寻宝之旅不会要价太高。

String.Source: Alright...Snake-Fish-Bird, Snake-Fish-Bird, Snake-Fish...wait. What if it's Bird-Fish-Snake? Do you read them right to left, or left to right?
String.Dest: 好吧……蛇-鱼-鸟，蛇-鱼-鸟，蛇-鱼……等等，如果是鸟-鱼-蛇咋整？你是从左往右看的还是从右往左瞅的？

String.Source: The only evidence we have is that Hroggar moved in with Alva the day after his wife died. Well, good enough for me! Let's kill him and call it a day.
String.Dest: 我们所掌握的唯一的证据就是赫鲁加在他妻子死后就和阿尔瓦同居去了。好吧，这已经足够啦！让我们宰了他然后收工吧。

String.Source: This answers two questions for me. Yes, vampires do sleep in coffins. No, they don't sleep standing up. Or upside down. At least, this one doesn't.
String.Dest: 这同时解答了我两个疑问。第一个，吸血鬼是睡在棺材里的。 第二个，但他们不是站着睡或倒吊着睡的。至少这只不是。

String.Source: Looks like the people are out for blood. Does that make them vampires too?
String.Dest: 看起来那些人也是为鲜血而来的。那他们也算是吸血鬼吗？

String.Source: These corpses...they aren't going to rise up and attack us, are they? I'm not entirely clear on how vampires work.
String.Dest: These corpses...they aren't going to rise up and attack us, are they? I'm not entirely clear on how vampires work.

String.Source: How in Cloudrest can 1 person own so many boots? Or maybe he just sniffs them. I knew someone like that. And no, I'm not referring to me this time.
String.Dest: 在云区的人是如何能拥有那么多双鞋的？或者也许他只是根据气味判断的。我认识一个像那样的人。不，这次我说的不是我自己。

String.Source: There's a lot of cheese on this table. More cheese than blood. Are you sure Movarth was a vampire? Maybe he was a really powerful goat herder.
String.Dest: 这桌子上有许多奶酪，甚至比血都多。你确定莫瓦斯是个吸血鬼？也许他只是个非常强大的牧羊人。

String.Source: Whatever killed these men was particularly vicious. Are you sure we want to stick around here?
String.Dest: 不管怎样杀了这些人是极其恶毒的。你确定我们还要呆在这么？

String.Source: So, since we've been in here I've been wondering. What in Lorkhan's breath is a Thaumaturgist?
String.Dest: 所以，从我们到这里开始我就一直觉得奇怪。看在洛克汗的份上奇术到底是什么玩意儿？

String.Source: Fresh food, clean house, and nobody seen coming or going. Maybe there's a a back entrance. Sometimes the simple answer is the most comforting.
String.Dest: 新鲜的食物，干净的房子，没看到任何人进出。也许这儿有个后门。有时候直线思维是最容易找到答案的。

String.Source: This house has some impressive mounts. I think that Elk is bigger than a dragon. At least, the one I saw. Maybe it was a baby dragon.
String.Dest: 这间屋子里有一些令人印象深刻的装饰。我想那头麋鹿应该比龙还大。至少，我看见的那头是这样的。也许是一只小龙。

String.Source: What a lovely spot for a camp! Right under the watchful gaze of a 3 ton war machine. Oh, but it's not operational, not a chance! Wait, is that mead?
String.Dest: What a lovely spot for a camp! Right under the watchful gaze of a 3 ton war machine. Oh, but it's not operational, not a chance! Wait, is that mead?

String.Source: Ah, what a relaxing little courtyard! This must be where the Dwemer architects would sit down and meditate on their latest death machine.
String.Dest: 啊，真是个悠哉的小院子！矮人工匠们肯定愿意坐在这里设计新型的杀人机器。

String.Source: The Gods gave you two hands and you use them both for your weapon. The Gods gave me ten fingers, but I never seem to use more than one.
String.Dest: 众神给了你两只手，你都用来拿武器了。众神给了我十根手指，不过我似乎从没用过一根儿以上的。

String.Source: That bow's nice, but with a bound one, you never run out of arrows and they don't cost a septim. Otherwise I would owe Oblivion a fortune.
String.Dest: 那把弓蛮不错的，可惜一端粘牢了；你不可能逃出弓箭的射程，而且射箭不花钱。否则，我真的欠下这湮灭世界一大笔钱。

String.Source: You know, Nimhe is kind of cute when she isn't trying to bite your head off.
String.Dest: 你知道吗，尼姆赫没试着咬掉你的头还真有点可爱。

String.Source: So does cooling a sword in Daedric blood really make a difference? Because it sounds like it would.
String.Dest: So does cooling a sword in Daedric blood really make a difference? Because it sounds like it would.

String.Source: Working for the Thalmor, hm? Finally come around to the winning side? Oh, I have no opinion either way. Your politics are my politics.
String.Dest: 替梭默工作，哼？终于站在胜利者这方了？噢，我怎么都行。你的政治观点就是我的政治观点。

String.Source: Wow, you managed to escape Cidhna Mine? Well, I guess I owe Yngvar 10 septims then.
String.Dest: 哇哦，你真的成功从希讷矿坑逃出来啦？呃，那我就欠英瓦10金币了。

String.Source: Great, look at this mess. You know the owners are going to blame us, and not the creepy tenant they keep in the basement.
String.Dest: 太好了，看看这烂摊子。你知道主人会责怪我们，而不是去责怪那些在地下室里呆着的令人毛骨悚然的占有者。

String.Source: About Molag Bal's mace...are you supposed to hit people with it, or do they just recoil in horror from looking at it?
String.Dest: About Molag Bal's mace...are you supposed to hit people with it, or do they just recoil in horror from looking at it?

String.Source: Is that a bound weapon? I always knew there was something I liked about you.
String.Dest: 你那是召唤武器吗？我就知道你总能拿出点我喜欢的东西。

String.Source: Are those...Daedric boots you're wearing? Otero once told me people who wear daedric artifacts are very promiscuous, but I assumed he made it up.
String.Dest: 你穿的是。。。魔族的靴子吗? 奥特罗曾告诉过我带上魔族神器的人会变得很反常, 但是我以为他在无中生有。

String.Source: Wow! Did she just disappear? Oh no wait, I see her. I think. Damn invisibility spells, they get me every time.
String.Dest: 哇噢！她刚才消失了吗？噢不等等，我想我看到她了。他妈的隐形咒语，每次都能耍到我。

String.Source: About "Nepos the Nose." You'd think he would've chosen a name that made him sound less like a criminal, like Nepos the Necromancer or something.
String.Dest: 说说“大鼻子内波斯。” 你想想他总得给自己选一个听上去不像是罪犯的名字, 像是亡灵术士内波斯或者别的啥的肯定不行。

String.Source: When Nepos said we weren't leaving his home alive, I got a chill up my spine. Not that I doubted you, but he was rather convincing.
String.Dest: 当尼普斯说我们不能活着走出他家的时候，我的脊梁骨一阵发冷。不是我不相信你，只是他说话真的很有威慑力。

String.Source: Would it be weird if I said the innkeeper here is more attractive than the tavern wench? She's a bit too...forward.
String.Dest: 要是我说这里的店主比女仆更有魅力会不会很奇怪。她有点过于性感了。

String.Source: Agh! Sorry, I thought that Centurion flinched. But it was just me.
String.Dest: 诶呀！真对不起，我还以为是百夫长吓的往后退了呢。但那其实是我在后退。

String.Source: I want to find their Sybil. I'm not looking for any special reward or anything. Really. Those priestesses are diseased.
String.Dest: 我想找到她们的先知。说真的，我可不是为了奖赏或者其他什么东西才去找的。那帮女祭司都不大正常了。

String.Source: Now that we've helped these Dibellan priests, they don't have to commune anymore, right? Someone better tell the local apothecary.
String.Dest: 既然我们都已经帮了这些迪贝拉的祭司了，那她们应该不用再把自个儿锁密室里嘀嘀咕咕了吧？最好找个人跟当地的医生知会一声，就说不用麻烦他们过来治了。

String.Source: The Temple of Dibella. You know, to be honest, I don't care for it. I'm a bit of prude.
String.Dest: The Temple of Dibella. You know, to be honest, I don't care for it. I'm a bit of prude.

String.Source: Murder plots, secret notes, duplicitous strangers. I think I'm going to like this town.
String.Dest: 谋杀的阴谋，秘密的便条，奸诈的陌生人。我想我会喜欢这个城市的。

String.Source: Hag's Cure. Does that mean cures for Hags, or made by them? I suppose either way, they're of little use to me.
String.Dest: 鬼婆药剂…这意思是说给鬼婆治病的药呢还是由鬼婆亲手做的药？我看两种都有吧，反正我用不着。

String.Source: You want things forged? Find an Orc. You need a iron-fisted foreman that will work his miners to death? Find an Orc. Never fails.
String.Dest: 你想要锻造？找兽人。你需要一个铁拳领班把他的矿工们工作到死？找兽人。保准让你满意。

String.Source: You want things forged? Find an Orc. You need a slave-driving foreman? Find an Orc. No offense, but your people are a bit cranky.
String.Dest: 你想要打造东西吗？找个兽人吧。你想要监管奴隶的监工吗？找个兽人吧。无意冒犯，但你们这些人貌似有点儿脾气暴躁。

String.Source: So...the Jarl's Steward and the Stallion's Potion. I don't even have joke here.
String.Dest: 所以…… 领主管家和这种马药剂。我是认真的。

String.Source: So the Forsworn are raiding shipments, but instead of taking weapons or supplies they steal a statue? No wonder they lost Markarth.
String.Dest: 那么，弃誓者抢了货物，不是为了抢武器或者是补给而是为了抢一个雕像？怪不得他们丢了马卡斯城。

String.Source: I'm sure if they told the Jarl, he'll send his men to Kolskeggr any day now. There's really no need for us to get involved. Yes, any day now.
String.Dest: 我敢肯定一旦他们告诉了领主，那领主随时都会派人前往科斯凯格。我们真的没必要卷入这些事情中。是的，随时。

String.Source: If he's dead, why is his tail still moving?
String.Dest: If he's dead, why is his tail still moving?

String.Source: This cabin has holes in the roof. Where does she sleep when it rains?
String.Dest: 这小屋屋顶有洞，下雨时她睡哪？

String.Source: Ooh, a wreath of snowberries. I thought being called a snowberry meant you were a squishy little coward. I wonder if we'll also find milk.
String.Dest: 啊。。雪浆果花丛。我想被称为雪浆果一定是你又蠢又懦弱吧，来，看看我们能不能在你身上发现牛奶。

String.Source: Yeack. Spriggans. And alchemists wonder why we chop down forests. I bet that dead one is re-thinking his stance.
String.Dest: Yeack. 树精. 还有炼金术师都想知道我们为什么要砍伐森林。我敢打赌那个死人会重新考虑他自己的立场。

String.Source: They call this place Bannermist Tower. I see the banner. Where do you think the mist went off too?
String.Dest: 他们把这里叫做旗霭塔。我看到了旗子，你觉得雾霭跑到哪里去了?

String.Source: So the sweet old lady turned out to be a witch. Well, at least she wasn't eating children and raising their corpses like in the stories.
String.Dest: So the sweet old lady turned out to be a witch. Well, at least she wasn't eating children and raising their corpses like in the stories.

String.Source: Dead, dead, and dead. Here's something I don't understand. Why keep them in cages if you're just going to kill them?
String.Dest: 死人，死人，还是死人。我就是有那么点儿不明白。既然要杀他们那干嘛还得把他们关笼子里呢？

String.Source: That waterfall looks clean enough to bathe in! The Draugr agree with me, half of them are already naked.
String.Dest: 这个瀑布看起来干净的足够洗澡了！看来尸鬼们跟我想得一样，他们中的一大半已经赤裸裸的了。

String.Source: If the Dwarves made these puzzles, the heads would speak the answers. They would say "Spider, Sphere, Centurion!" and spit oil if you got it wrong.
String.Dest: 如果那些谜题是由矮人们所制的，那这些脑袋应该会吐出答案来的。它们会说"蜘蛛，矮人球，百夫长！"，而一旦你弄错了的话它们就会喷出油来。

String.Source: Did you see all those dead skeevers back there? I just hope that's all of them. I don't want another case of the ataxia.
String.Dest: 你想回去看看那些被干掉的雪鼠么？我希望那就是全部了。我可不愿意再被麻痹了。

String.Source: By the Eight that was exhilarating! A dragon, and we killed it! I'm going to tell everyone at the Bannered Mare tonight that I know you.
String.Dest: 八圣灵在上，这真爽翻了！龙，我们干翻了一头龙！跟你说吧，我今晚得把这事儿告诉母马横幅的每一个人。

String.Source: What in Oblivion was that? I thought it was an earthquake, but it sounded like it came from above us.
String.Dest: 湮灭在上，这他喵的是个啥？我还以为是地震,但它听起来像来自我们上方。

String.Source: Thane of Whiterun. Better than being, uh, White of Thanerun. Really, I'm still in shock from the dragon, I'll come up with a better joke next time.
String.Dest: 雪漫城的男爵。嗯，比男漫城的雪爵好点儿。说真的，我还没从对龙的震惊中恢复过来，下次我会想出个更好的笑话的。

String.Source: So many bodies. So much death. And to think, it could have all been avoided if they didn't insist on learning ice magic.
String.Dest: 这么多的死尸，这么多的死人。仔细想想的话，如果他们不坚持学习冰系魔法，所有这一切也许可以避免。

String.Source: Oh good, a killing circle made of mushrooms and a random skull. There's something you see every day.
String.Dest: 哦，真好，一个由蘑菇和随便一个头骨组成的杀戮之环。这都是你每天都能看见的东西啊。

String.Source: I-I don't know how to react at funerals. People always say the dead are off to a better place, but then why is everyone so sad?
String.Dest: 我。。。我在葬礼上有点儿不知所措。人们总说死了的人正在去往一个更好的地方，但如果是那样，为何每个人都这么伤心呢？

String.Source: Do you think Skjor will let me inside? I mean, I'm already here. Might as well show me your secret. Not that I'd tell. Really. Please don't kill me.
String.Dest: 你觉得斯科月会让我进去吗？我是说，我已经在这儿了。也许我会瞧见你的秘密。我不会说出去的。真的。请不要杀我。

String.Source: How did they get that man in the cage? And do they drop him for the wolves? Wouldn't he die from the fall? I'm all sorts of confused.
String.Dest: 他们是怎样把他们抓进笼里的？他们把他扔下去喂狼了吗？他有没有摔死？我充满疑惑。

String.Source: Maybe if we chop wood for them, the Hunter's will give us some of their venison. You know how to chop wood, right? Because I don't.
String.Dest: 也许如果我们帮他们砍木头，猎人会愿意给我们一些他们的鹿肉。你知道如何砍柴，对不对？但我不知道。

String.Source: Does this Nimriel ever talk to you? She doesn't talk to me. And I have cabbages to sell.
String.Dest: 那这位尼姆瑞尔以前跟你聊过么？她倒是没跟我说过话。 并且我还得接着卖我的洋白菜。

String.Source: So we're helping a maniac, repair an evil dagger, from the Daedric Prince who caused the Oblivion Crisis. Okay! I just follow whatever you do anyway.
String.Dest: 所以我们在帮助一名法师，去修复一把从引发湮灭危机的魔族君主那儿得来的邪恶的匕首。好吧！无论你干什么我都跟着。

String.Source: So how did this bandit become chief anyway? I hope it wasn't for brains, because I don't think standing in a pool of oil is a smart idea.
String.Dest: 总之这个强盗是怎么改行小偷的？我看不是因为变聪明了，因为站在一汪油里面可不是明智之举。

String.Source: Quiet, serene and full of rich orichalcum. Who wouldn't want to live and work in "Bilegulch" mine.
String.Dest: 安静，祥和，蕴藏着丰富的黑铜。谁不想在拜尔矿坑生活工作？

String.Source: Do you think the water here's safe to drink? It's looks so clean, but we're in a mine.
String.Dest: 你觉得这里的水能喝吗？它看起来是很干净，但我们可是在矿坑里啊。

String.Source: These bedrolls are bunched awfully close together. I guess even Orcs get lonely.
String.Dest: 这些铺盖卷也摆得太近了吧。我猜大概是因为兽人也会寂寞吧。

String.Source: Is it time to play match the pictures? I love playing match the pictures. So good to turn off the mind every once and awhile.
String.Dest: 是到了玩儿匹配图片的时间了吗？我爱玩儿匹配图片。每隔一段时间就放松一阵大脑的感觉真爽。

String.Source: Oh, just in time for dinner! What's on the menu? Ugh, people again? Alright, but I'm not eating anything from below the waist.
String.Dest: 噢，晚饭时间到！菜谱上都有什么？啊呸，又是人类？好吧，但人下水什么的我可不吃。

String.Source: They call this place Mazin...Mmm-zoon...Blast, is it me or do Dwarves have something against vowels?
String.Dest: 他们管这里叫 Mazin...Mmm-zoon...Blast, 是我还是矮人发元音有问题?

String.Source: Wouldn't it be nifty if the inn was shaped like a sleeping giant? The mouth could be the front door, and the back door, well it's not a perfect idea.
String.Dest: Wouldn't it be nifty if the inn was shaped like a sleeping giant? The mouth could be the front door, and the back door, well it's not a perfect idea.

String.Source: Are those mammoth tusks? What are mammoths doing in a place like this?
String.Dest: 这是长毛象的牙齿? 长毛象在这里做什么?

String.Source: You know what I expected to find in a place called Embershard mine? Miners. And Minstrels. I'm funny that way.
String.Dest: 你知道我想找个叫煤块矿场的地方吗？矿工，和吟游诗人。我就喜欢这个调调。

String.Source: Ever try sleeping tree sap? I have a friend, yes, a friend who swears by the stuff. Makes time stand still. His words, not mine.
String.Dest: 尝试过安眠树脂么? 我有一个朋友，呃，我那朋友指着安眠树脂发誓来着，说是它能让时间静止。这是他说的，可不是我啊。

String.Source: So is there where we meet Halldir? Should we have brought wine? We are guests in his home, after all.
String.Dest: 那我们在哪儿跟霍迪尔见面？我们该带瓶酒当见面礼吗？毕竟，在他家的话我们都是客人。

String.Source: Never thought I'd see a dragon in my lifetime...all that's left now is a dancing bear and a humble Jarl and my life will be complete.
String.Dest: 我从没想到我这辈子能看见龙...等我有朝一日再看到一头会跳舞的熊或者一个低声下气的领主的时候那我的人生就圆满啦。

String.Source: Snow? In Skyrim? Surprising, that.
String.Dest: 雪？在天际省？恩，真让人惊讶。

String.Source: Ever heard of the Arena? If they ever made a competition out of eating Elsweyr Fondue, I'd be Grand Champion. And a skooma addict.
String.Dest: 听说过竞技场么？他们要是办一场吃艾斯维尔乳酪大赛,我肯定是冠军。然后我就会用奖金去做个斯库玛瘾君子。.

String.Source: Fair warning. Friendly fire is not uncommon with me. It's not that I forgot how to aim. It's just that I never really knew how.
String.Dest: 这警告对我来说很合理。误伤对我来说并不少见。不是说我忘了怎么瞄准，而是我真的不知道该如何去瞄。

String.Source: I've heard people say that wolves can smell fear. I wonder what it smells like? Probably cheese.
String.Dest: 我听别人说狼能够嗅出恐惧，我在想那闻起来是什麽味道？或许会跟乳酪很像。

String.Source: I haven't conjured a dagger in ages. I hope they haven't changed the spell.
String.Dest: 我好久没召唤过匕首了。希望他们还没改过咒语。

String.Source: They say Polydor and Eloisa were doomed because of the cruel nature of the world. Maybe Eloisa just got fat.
String.Dest: 他们说佩拉吉奥和埃洛伊萨注定失败是因为世界的残酷。也许埃洛伊萨只是太胖了。

String.Source: I often tell people I'm suffering from brain rot. That way they think I'm twice as smart as I actually am.
String.Dest: I often tell people I'm suffering from brain rot. That way they think I'm twice as smart as I actually am.

String.Source: It must be tough being married to an illusionist. It'd just be so hard to have a real conversation.
String.Dest: 跟一个幻术师结婚肯定很蛋疼。每一次对话都讲得人云里雾里。

String.Source: Isn't it strange to have a day when you haven't killed a bear?
String.Dest: 要是哪天你没干掉一头熊，你不会觉得不爽吗？

String.Source: If I did carry a sword, I wouldn't learn how to use it. I'd just get an Akaviri one and call it a day.
String.Dest: 就算我有一把剑，我也不会去学着使用它。哪怕我拿到手的是阿卡维尔剑，我也会把它束之高阁的。

String.Source: Question. If we both die, who gets to keep our stuff?
String.Dest: 有个问题。如果我们都死了，我们的遗嘱该怎么写？

String.Source: I hope you're aware there's a clause in my adventurer contract that says I should be treated to at least one meal a day plus dessert.
String.Dest: 我希望你知道，我的冒险家契约的一项条款上明明白白的写着，我应该每天至少有一顿饭后加甜点。

String.Source: As an adventurer, I've experienced some of the most intense wounds you can imagine, but nothing comes close to biting the inside of your lip.
String.Dest: 作为一个冒险者，我经受过你所能想象到的最严重的伤的折磨，但这些都比不上你嘴里冒出来的那些所给我带来的痛苦。

String.Source: There's nothing quite like a good adventure, but I'd say relieving oneself comes awfully close.
String.Dest: 没有什么比得过一场冒险了，但我想说这和自我抚慰的感觉非常接近。

String.Source: What should we do next? I think I'll let Falk Firebeard or General Tullius decide. And that was my impersonation of Jarl Elisif.
String.Dest: What should we do next? I think I'll let Falk Firebeard or General Tullius decide. And that was my impersonation of Jarl Elisif.

String.Source: At the risk of sounding a bit whiny, my feet are tired. I know we're in a dangerous Nord ruin and can't stop, but I just wanted to put it out there.
String.Dest: 也许你会觉得我爱发牢骚，但我的脚实在是累了。我知道我们身处一座危机四伏的诺德遗迹中，不容许片刻停留。但我就是想休息一下。

String.Source: I bet oakflesh was invented so we wouldn't have to wear clothes, and by the world's foremost pervert.
String.Dest: 我敢打赌，树皮术一定是被一个世界顶尖的绅士发明出来的，目的是让我们不用穿衣服了。

String.Source: Did I ever tell you I was allergic to animals? That's right, all of them.
String.Dest: 我有没有告诉过你，我对动物过敏？是的，对所有动物都过敏。

String.Source: What if trolls weren't trying to slap you, but shake your hand? Beasts are so misunderstood.
String.Dest: 如果那帮巨人不是想杀你，而只是想跟你握个手呢？野兽的想法经常会被误解的。

String.Source: You know, if you really wanted to give Nurelion a quick death, you should've just told him his apprentice and I were in love.
String.Dest: 你知道的，如果你真的想给Nurelion一个痛快，你就应该直接告诉他，他的徒弟和我正在谈恋爱。

String.Source: A vampire lair. Well, people have always said I think the sun shine's out of my bottom. So we know they won't come up from behind us.
String.Dest: 有个吸血鬼巢穴。对了，人们总说什么太阳晒屁股了。那他们怕太阳就应该不会出现在我们屁股后面吧。

String.Source: So we raid a simple Nord ruin and it's crawling with Draugr. Total coincidence, I'm sure.
String.Dest: 所以我们洗劫了一个简陋的诺德遗迹，里面爬满了尸鬼。完完全全的巧合，我确定。

String.Source: If this is a Hagraven nest, I think you should take the lead. A bigger lead than usual. No, I insist.
String.Dest: 如果这就是乌鸦鬼婆的巢穴的话,我想应该由你来做指挥官。比通常权利更大的指挥官。不对，我是确信应该如此。

String.Source: You know, I am so tired of being mistaken for Ulfric Stormcloak.
String.Dest: 你知道，我已经对被误认为是乌佛瑞克·暴风斗篷感到厌烦了。

String.Source: How do they live on this rock with so little fertile land? I suppose they trade cabbages for ore. But you can never run out of cabbages.
String.Dest: 他们是在这片有着如此贫瘠的石头地上是怎么生活的？我猜他们用卷心菜换矿石。卷心菜是永远不会枯竭的。

String.Source: Markarth is one of the prettier cities in all of Skyrim. Coincidentally, the Nords had nothing to do with it. Just an observation.
String.Dest: 马卡斯城是天际省最漂亮的城市之一。巧合的是，马斯卡城正好不是诺德人的作品。这只是一个外来人的看法。

String.Source: Does the college pay taxes to the Jarl of Winterhold? I'm struggling to see what the economy here is based on.
String.Dest: 这学院给冬堡的领主交税了吗？我特别想看看这里的经济基础是什么。

String.Source: I wonder if any of the mages here would even recognize my robes weren't genuine. No one pays any attention to the novices.
String.Dest: 我甚至怀疑这里的法师根本不会认出我的法袍是假冒的。完全没有人关注新人。

String.Source: So Morthal hasn't turned into a bubbling cesspool. Yet.
String.Dest: 所以墨索尔城没有变为一个冒着热气的粪池。至少现在还没。

String.Source: At what moment does someone point out that Dawnstar itself is a living nightmare? I would, but I don't want to be that guy.
String.Dest: 在什么时候，才会有人指出晨星城本身就是一个活生生的梦魇？我是这么想的，但我才不愿成为那个人呢。

String.Source: I've never been to an Orc Stronghold. But I've never tried to swallow a live rodent either. Some things just never cross your mind, until they do.
String.Dest: 我从未去过兽人要塞，也从未尝试过生吞一只活鼠。这些想法头一次穿过我的脑壳。

String.Source: It's always fun to go traipsing through caves. Or is it more accurate to say we caper? Gambol? Skip? Frolic? Help me out here.
String.Dest: 在整个洞穴游荡总是很有趣。或者更确切的说我们是在？嬉戏？跳跃？ 嬉闹？我又在发疯了，赶紧唤醒我。

String.Source: Whiterun is a city after my own heart. Too lazy to pick a side.
String.Dest: 白漫城正合我意。我懒得挑了。

String.Source: Some say I'm one part of Elves Ear and two parts nightshade. What does that make me? A terrible alchemist.
String.Dest: 有人说我的成分就是三分之一的精灵耳加三分之二的夜茄。而我究竟从何而来呢？一个可怕的炼金术士创造了我。

String.Source: Otero once told me, "You can grab a Khajiit by the tail but not by the whiskers. Unless he's a warlock, at which point run like hell."
String.Dest: 奥特罗曾经告诉我，"你可以随便抓虎人的尾巴，但千万别薅他们的须子，除非他是个术士，他会尖叫着逃跑的。"

String.Source: If I were a cave I would fill myself with flowers and benches and liquor. Why couldn't this cave be more like me? Stupid cave.
String.Dest: 如果我是个洞穴我就把自己装满鲜花长椅和酒水。为什么这些洞穴不学学我？傻瓜洞穴。

String.Source: Funny. When they said their king wore rags, I assumed the Forsworn were an army of beggars.
String.Dest: 真有趣。当他们说到他们自己的褴褛国王的时候，我还以为弃誓者是一支乞丐组成的军队呢。

String.Source: I once knew a conjurer who kept scamps as pets. Falmer look like scamps, so it's hard for me to take them seriously.
String.Dest: 我记得有个召唤师把当雪精灵当宠物养。雪精灵看起来挺萌的，哎呀！看来我很难认真对待它们。

String.Source: Bandits. Maybe if we ask them nicely they'll leave us alone.
String.Dest: 强盗. 如果跟他们好好说下，说不定他们会放过我们.

String.Source: What if these ruins were built not to keep adventurers out, but to keep Draugr in? No, that's just the skooma talking.
String.Dest: 假使这些废墟不是为了阻止冒险者进来，而是为了阻止什么危险的东西出来会怎么样呢？。得了吧，这话说得就像刚嗑完斯库玛之后一样。

String.Source: You know what's the hardest word to say in the entire Tamrielic language? Orrery. Of course, the Dwarves are the ones who make them.
String.Dest: 你知道在泰姆瑞尔大陆语言中最难说的那个单词是什么吗？星象仪。当然，矮人是他们的制造者。

String.Source: I wonder if the Dwarves made airships. We could use it to fly over the Jerall Mountains, then come back when we realized we were in Cyrodiil.
String.Dest: 我好奇矮人是否做出了飞船。当我们真的到了赛瑞迪尔，我们可以通过它飞越杰洛山脉然后返回。

String.Source: You think with all this technology the Dwemer would have a mechanical carriage or something so we wouldn't have to walk through this infernal ruin.
String.Dest: 你认为以锻莫所掌握的技术而言，可以造一个机械马车或是别的东西，让我们可以不用徒步通这地狱般的遗迹吗。

String.Source: I'm in the mood for some red meat. And a flagon of something so strong it makes the goats look like wenches.
String.Dest: 我现在特别要一个娘们儿. 刚那壶酒好烈，究竟什么东西，我现在看着羊长得都娘们一样。

String.Source: Does this inn have a bard? I'm feeling nostalgic, and my ears are thirsty for song.
String.Dest: 这旅馆里有没有吟游诗人？我有点想家了，而且我很想听歌。

String.Source: This inn looks tidy enough. Maybe only half the beds are infested with fleas.
String.Dest: 这家客栈是人住的地方吗？也许床上有一半儿的地方都被跳蚤霸占了啊。

String.Source: I used to know this Dunmer mage. Very heroic. Every now and then though, he'd wear a thief's costume. I wonder what your vice is.
String.Dest: 我曾知道这个暗精灵。很英勇。不过常常穿盗贼的衣服。我在想你的癖好是啥。

String.Source: I love small towns. None of that cooked garbage smell you get in the cities. Although I guess that's more of a Cyrodiil problem.
String.Dest: 我喜欢小镇。那里没有你在城市里闻到的黑暗料理的味道。虽然我猜这更多的是赛瑞迪尔的问题。

String.Source: I want to ask people who only drink wine, do you enjoy being an arrogant sod?
String.Dest: 我想问问那些只喝葡萄酒的家伙，你愿不愿意变成一个傲慢的大草包？

String.Source: A wise alchemist once told me the two ingredients a person should never, ever mix together are nirnroot and...I forget the rest.
String.Dest: 一个很有才的炼金术士曾经告诉过我，一个人永远永远也不能把那两种材料混在一起，这两种材料分别是奈恩根和……额，后面那个我给忘了。

String.Source: Ever dress like a priest so people would trust you with their darkest secrets? Um...me neither.
String.Dest: 穿的像个女祭司人们就会向你倾吐最黑暗的秘密么？唔……反正我不会。

String.Source: I can't wait to see who Ahtar will execute next. It's really the only entertainment this city has.
String.Dest: 真等不及要看看下一个被 阿塔处决的是谁。这真是这城里唯一的乐趣所在了。

String.Source: I have an idea, what if we dressed every beggar in a mage robe! That would make the poorer districts look so much more distinguished.
String.Dest: I have an idea, what if we dressed every beggar in a mage robe! That would make the poorer districts look so much more distinguished.

String.Source: Draugr always make me think of pirates with scurvy. I wonder why that is.
String.Dest: 尸鬼总让我想起得了坏血病的海盗。不知道为什么。

String.Source: You know, I discovered the other day that shopkeepers will still buy your goods even if you treat them poorly. Good to know.
String.Dest: 我发现即使有你对待那些小店主很糟糕，他们仍然会买你的货物。可是条好消息。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: You can't win this!
String.Dest: 就你这两下子还想获胜?！

String.Source: Do your worst!
String.Dest: 你这样还不够看！

String.Source: Damn you!
String.Dest: 去你妈的！

String.Source: Agh! Was it something I said?
String.Dest: Agh! Was it something I said?

String.Source: By the Gods that hurt!
String.Dest: 卧槽好疼！

String.Source: Agh! Bastard!
String.Dest: 啊！混蛋！

String.Source: That the best you can do?
String.Dest: 这就是你的极限了吗？

String.Source: Ugh, you fiend!
String.Dest: 呃啊，你这恶魔！

String.Source: Like the bite of a flea!
String.Dest: 就被跳蚤咬了一口！

String.Source: Agh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Ist that it? Is that your best?
String.Dest: 什么？这就是你的极限吗？

String.Source: Agh! Enough! This ends now!
String.Dest: 噢！够了！一切都完了

String.Source: Damn you bandit! Can't you seem I'm poor?!?!
String.Dest: Damn you bandit! Can't you seem I'm poor?!?!

String.Source: Aaaaayyargh!
String.Dest: 啊~~~咿呀！

String.Source: Hyargh!
String.Dest: 嘿呀！

String.Source: You picked the wrong dinner, animal!
String.Dest: 你选错了晚餐，畜生！

String.Source: Just...stand still!
String.Dest: 站住…别动！

String.Source: Die, damn you!
String.Dest: 去死吧，混蛋！

String.Source: You're nothing!
String.Dest: 你这无名的蝼蚁之辈！

String.Source: I'll kill you, beastman!
String.Dest: 我非杀你不可，畜生！

String.Source: The Reach is no place for you, Forsworn!
String.Dest: The Reach is no place for you, Forsworn!

String.Source: Go back to where you came from, dragon!
String.Dest: 巨龙，滚回你来的地方。

String.Source: It's bedtime for you, Draugr!
String.Dest: It's bedtime for you, Draugr!

String.Source: Some legend you are!
String.Dest: 你只不过会夸夸其谈而已！

String.Source: I've had enough of you!
String.Dest: 我受够你了！

String.Source: Arrrrgh!
String.Dest: Arrrrgh!

String.Source: Is this what you want?
String.Dest: 想尝尝这招吗？

String.Source: Take that, you fiend!
String.Dest: 接招吧，你这恶魔！

String.Source: I'll have your head!
String.Dest: 我要取你的首级！

String.Source: I'll skin you alive, wolf!
String.Dest: I'll skin you alive, wolf!

String.Source: Killing people is no way to make a living!
String.Dest: Killing people is no way to make a living!

String.Source: Your parents must be very disappointed in you!
String.Dest: Your parents must be very disappointed in you!

String.Source: Take that you big hairy beast!
String.Dest: Take that you big hairy beast!

String.Source: Fall to me, Giant!
String.Dest: Fall to me, Giant!

String.Source: I'll cut you down to size!
String.Dest: I'll cut you down to size!

String.Source: Spare me! I'm too pretty to die!
String.Dest: 饶了我吧！我很漂亮，我还不想死！

String.Source: Wait, don't kill me! I-I have gold, I swear!
String.Dest: 等等，别杀我！我，我有钱，我发誓！

String.Source: Victory is yours! I yield! See me yielding?
String.Dest: 胜利是属于你的！我投降了！嘿！我在向你投降你看到了吗？

String.Source: You need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 你需要做得更好！

String.Source: Agh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: You want Esbern? I'll teach you to pick on old men!
String.Dest: 你要伊斯本？我要教教你找老人的茬的代价！

String.Source: I can take you!
String.Dest: 你完了！

String.Source: Say hello to Ysmir for me, Nord!
String.Dest: 帮我向伊斯米尔问个好，诺德佬！

String.Source: You're going to look good mounted on my wall!
String.Dest: 你的脑袋会成为我的收藏品！

String.Source: I'll cut right through your scales, monster!
String.Dest: 我能连你的鳞片都一刀切了，怪物！

String.Source: I've had enough of you!
String.Dest: 我受够你了！

String.Source: Give up or I'll call this a draw!
String.Dest: Give up or I'll call this a draw!

String.Source: Now comes the end of your life!
String.Dest: Now comes the end of your life!

String.Source: Yield or die!
String.Dest: 投降或着去死吧！

String.Source: Ever seen a bound blade, Orc?
String.Dest: Ever seen a bound blade, Orc?

String.Source: Your pelt looks soft, cat!
String.Dest: Your pelt looks soft, cat!

String.Source: Why don't you stay dead this time!
String.Dest: 这个时候你应该在死人堆里！

String.Source: Drink someone else's blood, vampire!
String.Dest: 离我远点，吸血鬼！

String.Source: Why won't you die already?
String.Dest: 你怎么还不去死？

String.Source: You're outmatched!
String.Dest: 你输了！

String.Source: You won't get away!
String.Dest: 你跑不了！

String.Source: You don't stand a chance!
String.Dest: 你一点机会也没！

String.Source: Come on, is that all you've got!
String.Dest: 得了吧，你就这点本事？！

String.Source: I'll tear you to pieces!
String.Dest: 我要把你撕碎！

String.Source: Now you'll pay!
String.Dest: 付出代价吧！

String.Source: I'm no ordinary mage!
String.Dest: I'm no ordinary mage!

String.Source: I won't die today, not against you!
String.Dest: 我今天是不会死的，至少是不会死在你的面前的！

String.Source: Come on, I can take you!
String.Dest: 来吧，我可以对付你！

String.Source: Damn rebels!
String.Dest: 该死的叛军。

String.Source: The bigger they are, the harder they fall!
String.Dest: The bigger they are, the harder they fall!

String.Source: You're bleeding oil, machine!
String.Dest: You're bleeding oil, machine!

String.Source: Die you metal monster!
String.Dest: Die you metal monster!

String.Source: Damn these crawlies!
String.Dest: Damn these crawlies!

String.Source: I'll turn you into scrap metal!
String.Dest: I'll turn you into scrap metal!

String.Source: Somehow I don't think we'll be hearing the bards sing about this battle.
String.Dest: Somehow I don't think we'll be hearing the bards sing about this battle.

String.Source: And we survived! Didn't expect that.
String.Dest: And we survived! Didn't expect that.

String.Source: That's what I call good teamwork.
String.Dest: That's what I call good teamwork.

String.Source: We survived. Just barely. I'm going to blame whatever it was we ate this morning.
String.Dest: We survived. Just barely. I'm going to blame whatever it was we ate this morning.

String.Source: All over now. Good riddance, I say.
String.Dest: All over now. Good riddance, I say.

String.Source: All right. That's one less thing to worry about.
String.Dest: All right. That's one less thing to worry about.

String.Source: We should get a medal for winning that fight. A bound one, that we can conjure up for parties.
String.Dest: We should get a medal for winning that fight. A bound one, that we can conjure up for parties.

String.Source: Aaaaand they're dead.
String.Dest: Aaaaand they're dead.

String.Source: Always good to come out on the winning side.
String.Dest: Always good to come out on the winning side.

String.Source: Win another battle, live another day. Well, live to fight another battle, I presume. It's a vicious cycle.
String.Dest: Win another battle, live another day. Well, live to fight another battle, I presume. It's a vicious cycle.

String.Source: So, we survived, but did we get through unscathed? Without a scratch? I feel like using one of those idioms, but I'm not sure either applies.
String.Dest: So, we survived, but did we get through unscathed? Without a scratch? I feel like using one of those idioms, but I'm not sure either applies.

String.Source: Phew! That was a tough fight. Relatively speaking.
String.Dest: Phew! That was a tough fight. Relatively speaking.

String.Source: That takes care of them. So, what's next? Please say something other than fighting.
String.Dest: That takes care of them. So, what's next? Please say something other than fighting.

String.Source: Ooh, I think I hurt my finger. Not from that fight, mind you, but earlier, from pulling a hangnail.
String.Dest: Ooh, I think I hurt my finger. Not from that fight, mind you, but earlier, from pulling a hangnail.

String.Source: Guess that's the last of them.
String.Dest: Guess that's the last of them.

String.Source: That takes care of that.
String.Dest: That takes care of that.

String.Source: I get that he's a necromancer, but what do you mean you never saw eye to eye?
String.Dest: 我知道他是个亡灵术士啊，不过你说你们的观点从来没有一样过是什么意思？

String.Source: So, fought any good Giants lately? Or deranged princesses?
String.Dest: 所以，最近和那个巨人搏斗了？ 或是看上了哪一个无知的少女？

String.Source: That was a bottle of imitation skooma. I carry it around sometimes because it makes me look more dangerous.
String.Dest: 这是一瓶仿制的斯库玛。我有时候带着它到处转，因为这让我看起来更不好惹。

String.Source: That's ridiculous. I don't even like skooma.
String.Dest: 真是荒谬。 我根本就不喜欢skooma.

String.Source: What do you think of this idea, Karras? An entire regiment using bound weapons.
String.Dest: 让全团的人都使用统一的武器。你觉得这个主意怎么样， 卡拉斯？

String.Source: I don't know, it sounds to me like the only difference is I have to pay you money.
String.Dest: 我不知道，似乎唯一的区别就是我不得不向你掏钱了。

String.Source: That's an odd question, coming from blacksmith of Kvatch. Don't your weapons practically come from Oblivion?
String.Dest: 这是个奇怪的问题，科瓦奇来的铁匠铸造的武器。你的武器难道不是从从湮灭弄来的？

String.Source: With three beers down, the Orc did frown and bid the Elf goodbye, for none could know twas not for show, and someone had to die!
String.Dest: 三杯啤酒穿肠走，兽人跟精灵要分手。这不是一次表演秀，而是有某人要死咯。

String.Source: That would probably be a bad idea. We want someone who can handle themselves in a fight.
String.Dest: 那可能是个坏主意。我们想要个能够在战斗自保的人。

String.Source: As for the bard, do you want to go to the College in Solitude?
String.Dest: 至于诗人，你想去独孤城的学院吗？

String.Source: As for the bard, do you want to go to the College in Solitude?
String.Dest: 至于诗人，你想去独孤城的学院吗？

String.Source: If I had a conscience, and I'm beginning to suspect I might, it would weigh heavily on it if I got some poor lutist killed.
String.Dest: 如果我还心存良知，我可能会开始怀疑自己。如果我杀了一些可怜的琵琶弹奏者，这会有很大影响吧。

String.Source: As for the bard, do you want to go to the College in Solitude?
String.Dest: 至于诗人，你想去独孤城的学院吗？

String.Source: If this bard were a warrior, well then I wouldn't mind so much if their bodies ended up halfway up the ceiling. Hazards of the job and all that.
String.Dest: If this bard were a warrior, well then I wouldn't mind so much if their bodies ended up halfway up the ceiling. Hazards of the job and all that.

String.Source: As for the bard, do you want to go to the College in Solitude?
String.Dest: 至于诗人，你想去独孤城的学院吗？

String.Source: I wonder if any of the Companions know how to sing? We should stop by Jorrvaskr find out before we go asking a bard if he can swing a mace.
String.Dest: 战友团里有人会唱歌吗？我们应该在前往月瓦斯卡寻找那个可能会唱歌的人之前，随便去问哪个吟游诗人是否能挥舞得起狼牙棒。

String.Source: The joke's on us. There's no treasure save this ring. Still, I had fun.
String.Dest: 这是个玩笑。这个指环不会带来任何宝藏，不过，我还是挺开心的。

String.Source: A ring? Hold on, is that what I think it is? A sapphire ring that lets you...(gulp)...breathe underwater? Oh no..we've made a horrible mistake!
String.Dest: 一个戒指？等一下，是不是我想的那样？一个蓝宝石戒指能让你……（喘气）……在水下呼吸？哦不……我犯了一个大错误！

String.Source: I'm soaking wet and tired, and all for a ring and some dead Elf.
String.Dest: 我泡在水里，全身湿透，筋疲力竭。还全是为了那枚戒指和一些死去的精灵。

String.Source: Hopefully you're not talking about me being the dead Elf. Wait, what do you mean by a ring? It doesn't let you breathe underwater, does it?
String.Dest: 但愿你不是在说让我成为那个死的精灵。等等，你说的是什么意思，一个戒指？不会是能让你在水下呼吸的那个吧？

String.Source: I'm soaking wet and tired, and all for a ring and some dead Elf.
String.Dest: 我泡在水里，全身湿透，筋疲力竭。还全是为了那枚戒指和一些死去的精灵。

String.Source: Oh Gods, that halfwit...he was right! We've made a horrible mistake!
String.Dest: Oh Gods, that halfwit...he was right! We've made a horrible mistake!

String.Source: Just filthy. This treasure of yours lets you breathe underwater, but that's it.
String.Dest: 这真是个腌臜玩意儿。你的这个宝物可以让你在水下呼吸，但也仅此而已。

String.Source: Underwater? Wait, that ring wasn't attached to some beautiful princess, was it? Don't tell me that halfwit was telling the truth!
String.Dest: 在水底下？等等，这个戒指该不会是属于某个漂亮的公主的吧？别告诉我那个蠢货说的是真的！

String.Source: There was a body down there, and a ring.
String.Dest: 那里有一具戴着指环的尸体。

String.Source: Wait, did that body belong to a princess? Don't tell me that halfwit was right! Which means that ring...
String.Dest: 等会，那是公主？别告诉我那个蠢蛋是对的！这意味着那戒指…

String.Source: I still prefer to kill the Giant rather than put him to sleep.
String.Dest: 我依旧愿意杀掉巨人胜过哄他睡觉。

String.Source: Yes, and I prefer to remain the height I am now as opposed to being clubbed so hard I wake up a Wood Elf.
String.Dest: 是的，并且相对于被木棒狠狠地砸扁，我更乐意保持现在的身高，所以我叫醒了一个木精灵。

String.Source: I still prefer to kill the Giant rather than put him to sleep.
String.Dest: 我依旧愿意杀掉巨人胜过哄他睡觉。

String.Source: Although granted, I rather be a short Elf than a dead one. We're far more likely to end the day six feet under as opposed to five feet tall.
String.Dest: 尽管你做了保证，我还是宁愿去当一个矮精灵而不是死精灵。我觉得我当一个5英尺的矮精灵活下来的概率比一个6英尺的死精灵高多了。

String.Source: I still prefer to kill the Giant rather than put him to sleep.
String.Dest: 我依旧愿意杀掉巨人胜过哄他睡觉。

String.Source: I'm hoping bringing the others will help us avoid that scenario, or at least give us ample time to run away.
String.Dest: 我希望带来的其他人能帮助我们避免这种情况，或者至少留给我们留足时间逃跑。

String.Source: I don't like the idea of putting Fjona in danger.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢这个让费欧娜去冒险的主意。

String.Source: Oh trust me, if this Giant really does wake up, we'll be able to see it from the other side of the cavern.
String.Dest: 相信我,如果这个巨人被唤醒了, 我们就会在洞穴的另一边见到它。

String.Source: I don't like the idea of putting Fjona in danger.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢这个让费欧娜去冒险的主意。

String.Source: And, seeing how well sound travels in a cave, that Giant will be able to hear her play from there as well.
String.Dest: 并且，以声音在洞穴中传播的效果来看，那个巨人从那边也能听见她的演奏。

String.Source: I don't like the idea of putting Fjona in danger.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢这个让费欧娜去冒险的主意。

String.Source: On the other hand, I'm half a halfwit. Who's to say anything I say is logical?
String.Dest: 另一方面，我是半个笨蛋。谁说我说得都是符合逻辑的呢？

String.Source: Are you saying this Giant sleeps underwater?
String.Dest: 你的意思是那个巨人沉睡在水下？

String.Source: So they say. Problem is, half the hunters who go into that cave end up dead, and the other half see nothing at all.
String.Dest: 他们是这样讲的。问题是，一半进这个洞穴的猎人死了，另一半却什么都没看见。

String.Source: Are you saying this Giant sleeps underwater?
String.Dest: 你的意思是那个巨人沉睡在水下？

String.Source: Of course, the dead ones are proof enough. Also the footprints those bodies are lying in.
String.Dest: 当然,死人还不足以为证。还有这些留下的脚印。

String.Source: Are you saying this Giant sleeps underwater?
String.Dest: 你的意思是那个巨人沉睡在水下？

String.Source: I'm hoping bringing the others will help us avoid that scenario, or at least give us ample time to run away.
String.Dest: 我希望带来的其他人能帮助我们避免这种情况，或者至少留给我们留足时间逃跑。

String.Source: Century old Giant Broth would make for a great soup.
String.Dest: 百年巨人肉汤一定会成为一道美味的汤。

String.Source: I think you said "soup" when you meant to say "poison." It was an honest mistake, I'm sure.
String.Dest: 我认为你说“汤”的时候你其实是在说“毒药”。这是真诚的错误，我敢肯定。

String.Source: Century old Giant Broth would make for a great soup.
String.Dest: 百年巨人肉汤一定会成为一道美味的汤。

String.Source: By the way, in all seriousness, you should never leave soup stock out overnight. Sure, you can boil away the toxins, but it'll also lose flavor.
String.Dest: 顺带说一句，永远都不要把汤放过夜。当然你可以将其再次煮沸消毒，但是这样也会失去原有的鲜美。

String.Source: Okay, we have our bard and our Giant slayer. All that's left to do now is find our Giant.
String.Dest: 好的，吟游诗人和巨人杀手都已经具备了，只欠巨人了。

String.Source: Apparently, a lot of hunters like to frequent this cave, and there's even a small lake toward the rear, but no one ever drinks from it.
String.Dest: 很明显，许多猎人喜欢频繁光顾这个洞穴，后面往前走一段甚至还有个小湖，但是没人从那里喝过水。

String.Source: Probably because it tastes like century old Giant broth.
String.Dest: 可能是因为它的味道像是搁了有些年头儿的巨人肉汤。

String.Source: Did you find anything? Are we filthy rich, or just filthy?
String.Dest: 你找到什么了吗？我们能走狗屎运吗，还是只有狗屎？

String.Source: I really like the looks of this Jonas fellow. But the wench doesn't seem too impressed, and I trust my wenches. I guess it's off to the marsh then.
String.Dest: 我确实喜欢乔纳斯这小子的模样。不过我家女招待看不上，而且我相信姑娘们的眼光。我猜之后是去了沼泽地。

String.Source: Not everything in life has a point, Fjona. Like this adventure. It just is. That's what I'm taking away from all this.
String.Dest: 生活中不是每件事都有明确方向的，费欧娜。就如同这场冒险一样。正因如此，我才要远离这一切。

String.Source: I don't know, gold, diamond encrusted chalices. I mean, the boy in Riverwood told me it was a princess, and the whole bit about the forced betrothal.
String.Dest: I don't know, gold, diamond encrusted chalices. I mean, the boy in Riverwood told me it was a princess, and the whole bit about the forced betrothal.

String.Source: But I just assumed he was being a romantic.
String.Dest: 但我只是以为他在幻想。

String.Source: In any case, I think we better get going. I hear someone calling me somewhere over there. Away from the crazy person.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我认为我们最好离开这儿。我听见那里的某个地方有人在喊我。我们得离疯子远点儿。

String.Source: It was her! She did it! You marry her!
String.Dest: 那是她！她做到了！你娶了她！

String.Source: It was him! He did it! You marry him!
String.Dest: 是了！他做到了！你终于嫁给了他！

String.Source: It was her! She did it! You marry her!
String.Dest: 那是她！她做到了！你娶了她！

String.Source: Oh no, here it comes...
String.Dest: 哦不，又来了……

String.Source: And risk that Giant waking up and biting my head off? Besides, that water looks cold.
String.Dest: 这风险可略大啊。要是巨人醒来咬掉我的头怎么办？而且，这水看上去好冷。

String.Source: Is it dead, or just sleeping?
String.Dest: 它死了吗？还是只是在睡觉？

String.Source: Okay, then let's go. If that's okay with you, being the leader and everything.
String.Dest: 好的, 我们上路吧. 如果你准备好了, 所有东西都由你说了算.

String.Source: Well, I would do it myself, but I use bound weapons, and I'm not a hundred percent sure it would work.
String.Dest: 好吧，我自己干好了，不过我要用的是武器缠绕召唤术，我不能百分百地保证法术能生效。

String.Source: And before you ask, don't worry, I'm not a total idiot. The first thing I did was secure a bottle from one of the local traders.
String.Dest: 你不用问，别担心，我没那么白痴。我当时做的第一件事就是从一个当地小贩那里保住了一个瓶子。

String.Source: Just don't ask from who. Although if you want a hint, it rhymes with "Ybolda."
String.Dest: 别问是谁。要是你想要个提示，发音是“伊博尔达”的韵脚。

String.Source: Actually, I forgot to mention one other part. The song will put him to sleep, but he won't stay that way.
String.Dest: 实际上，我忘记提另一点了。这首歌会让他入睡，不过他不会一直那样的。

String.Source: Not unless we add a little something extra to his blood. Like say, via a sword coated in sleeping tree sap?
String.Dest: 除非我们在他的血里添点儿额外的料。比如说，把剑涂上一层沉睡之树的液汁如何？

String.Source: Nonsense! Why would...oh Gods...
String.Dest: 废话！为什么会……哦上帝啊……

String.Source: I don't know. He looks sort of sleepy, but it's hard to tell. Maybe I ought to get a closer look.
String.Dest: I don't know. He looks sort of sleepy, but it's hard to tell. Maybe I ought to get a closer look.

String.Source: Well, hold on. Fjona has to coax it to sleep first. I know when I get out of bed the first thing I want to do is hop back in.
String.Dest: 呃，坚持住。费欧娜得先哄它睡觉。我就知道我起床后第一件想干的事儿就是希望再蹦回被子里。

String.Source: Alright, we're here. If the legend is true, then this Giant should be waking up as soon as I began this sentence five seconds ago.
String.Dest: 得，我们已经到这儿了。如果传言不虚，那大块头在我五秒钟前开始念咒的时候就该醒了。

String.Source: You called me a mage. I don't know whether to be flattered or disgusted.
String.Dest: 你说我是……一个法师？我真是不知该笑还是该哭了。

String.Source: For instance, Fjona, think of how much time and energy you can save by not having to loot corpses for stray arrows.
String.Dest: 举个例子，费欧娜，要是不必再从尸体上寻回箭矢，想想你能节省多少时间。

String.Source: And Anum-La, a bound sword never dulls. Of course, I don't want to brag, but you do need a bit of magical talent to wield both.
String.Dest: 而且，安努姆菈,好剑永远不会钝.我也不想吹牛，但是掌握召唤武器和正确的吹嘘都需要天赋的.

String.Source: Wow. That's amazing. I taught myself how to shuffle a deck of cards once. It's even less impressive when you consider I was a grown Elf.
String.Dest: 哇。太不可思议。我曾经自学过怎么洗扑克牌。作为一个成年精灵，我这方面太逊色了。

String.Source: I don't see how it could hurt. Maybe I should sing as well.
String.Dest: 我觉得没什么不好的。或许我也该唱两嗓子。

String.Source: Alright, that's one down, and one to go.
String.Dest: 好吧，那就是一个走了一个死了

String.Source: Not a clue.
String.Dest: 毫无头绪。

String.Source: As I matter of fact, I've met a Giant before. Well, a puny one, but a Giant nonetheless.
String.Dest: 事实上，我以前遇到过巨人。好吧，一只小巨人，尽管如此那仍然是个巨人。

String.Source: He seemed to fall asleep whenever Karita stopped singing and played those soft instrumentals. You know, the same one all you bards play.
String.Dest: 貌似只要Karita 不唱歌只弹那些乐器他就会睡着. 你懂的，就是中你们吟游诗人都用的那些乐器.

String.Source: Although it could've been all the mead he was drinking.
String.Dest: 虽然这有可能是他所喝下的所有蜂蜜酒。

String.Source: Alright, maybe I should explain. You see, this Giant isn't a normal Giant. Well, it used to be, but then an old Hagraven cast a spell on it.
String.Dest: 好吧，也许我应该解释一下。你看，这不是一个正常的巨人。嗯，它曾经是，但那个老乌鸦鬼婆曾对它施了个法术。

String.Source: Supposedly it's been asleep for centuries at the bottom of a lake, cradling an old treasure left by the witch.
String.Dest: 据说它已经在湖底沉睡了几百年，怀中抱着一个女巫留下的陈旧宝藏。

String.Source: The spell is such that the Giant only wakes up when it senses someone is after the witch's boon. In this case, that would be us.
String.Dest: The spell is such that the Giant only wakes up when it senses someone is after the witch's boon. In this case, that would be us.

String.Source: Of course, there's a catch. Legend has it that the spell is activated not with magic, but with a song.
String.Dest: 当然，是有个窍门。传说那个法术不是用魔力来施展，而是用一首歌。

String.Source: Okay, maybe he is a milk-drinker. But what if he's not? All I'm saying is, we just put him in front of a Giant, and see what happens.
String.Dest: 好吧，也许他是一个懦夫。但如果他不是呢？我想说的是，我们就把他放在一个巨人面前，看看会发生什么。

String.Source: I mean seriously, those muscles were bigger than her entire head! All three of our heads put together!
String.Dest: 我说真的，那些肌肉比她整个脑袋还大！比我们三个脑袋加在一起还大！

String.Source: Wait, so I need a saddle and...oh...you're being sarcastic! You know, I don't like it so much when other people do it to me.
String.Dest: 等下, 那么我需要一副鞍具和...噢...你这是在指桑骂槐！你懂的，我不喜欢别人这么对干。

String.Source: Wait, I heard there was a legendary knight living in this town.
String.Dest: 等等，我听说这座小镇里住着个传奇骑士。

String.Source: Alright, that's one down, and one to go.
String.Dest: 好吧，那就是一个走了一个死了

String.Source: That's comforting to know.
String.Dest: 得知这些我很欣慰。

String.Source: Wait, so you're the Argonian who braves the marsh? I was expecting some...burlier.
String.Dest: 等等，这么说你就是那些勇敢面对沼泽的亚龙人？我还以为会……更强壮些。

String.Source: So is it true what they say, that you ride an armored chaurus? Please tell me it's true.
String.Dest: 那么他们说你骑了一头披甲的查鲁斯是真的喽?？请告诉我那是真的。

String.Source: So Fjona, is it true that you're self-taught?
String.Dest: 所以费欧娜，你真的是自学成才的？

String.Source: Are you sure you don't have some buyer's remorse? I mean Anum-La is great, but did you see the size of that Jonas fellow?
String.Dest: 你确定你真的一点不后悔？我是说，安努姆菈确实很棒，但你看到那个乔纳斯的体格没有？

String.Source: Now I don't want to sound like a Bound Weapon peddler, if such a thing even exists, but you two really ought to consider using them.
String.Dest: 我不想像个小贩似的给你们推销召唤武器，要是有人卖这个的话，不过你们真的应该用用看。

String.Source: Well, that should tie everything up in a neat little bow. You got your forgery, I got my debt erased, and Sunken-Roots got his life back.
String.Dest: 好了，这样我们就皆大欢喜了。你得到了你的伪造物，我清除了我的债务，而且桑肯‧树根也救了他的命。

String.Source: It's your classical happy ending. Unless you're a bandit, then it went about as badly as one could expect.
String.Dest: 你将会获得一个典型的美好结局。除非你是个强盗，真是那样的话，你的下场将会惨得出人意料的。

String.Source: Sure, that works for me.
String.Dest: 没问题，这对我来说蛮有用。

String.Source: You did say she plays primarily in Old Hroldan, right? And this journal is from a bard in Markarth. Sounds like a cheap, neighborly bard to me.
String.Dest: 你确定你说过她一般在老霍尔丹表演，是吗？这次旅途是由一个在马卡斯的诗人发起的。听起来还真是个俭吝友善的诗人，对我来说。

String.Source: Thank you. I'd hate to think I was slipping.
String.Dest: 谢谢你。我讨厌迷路。

String.Source: Well, it isn't a secret now, is it? Mental note: Check for secret compartments.
String.Dest: Well, it isn't a secret now, is it? Mental note: Check for secret compartments.

String.Source: Fine, if you're going to be such a sod about it, we'll just let you rot in here.
String.Dest: 好吧。如果你对这这么依赖，我们就让你腐烂在这里算了。.

String.Source: Oh right. I still haven't paid you for that, have I.
String.Dest: 哦对了。我还没有把它付给你，对吗。

String.Source: What does it look like? Saving your scaley tail.
String.Dest: 它看起来像什么?除了你的鳞片尾巴。

String.Source: Oh come on, Sunken-Roots, you would break the moment they threatened to pluck a feather.
String.Dest: 噢得了，桑肯-树根，你会毁了他们威胁着要拔毛的这一刻的。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: No, you already have someone. I don't want to be a third wheel.
String.Dest: 你已经有人陪着你了，我可不想当电灯泡。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Has this Dibellan amulet been properly washed? I'm just saying, we have no idea where it's been.
String.Dest: 这件迪贝拉挂件有被清洗过吗?我只是问问，现在我们找不到它究竟被放在了哪里。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: May your road lead to other followers you wouldn't possibly consider replacing me with. Also, warm sands. I've always wanted to say that.
String.Dest: 愿在你的前方尽是一些你不是想到取代我的追随者等着你。当然，还有温暖的沙地。我一直想这么说啦。

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: I'm right behind you.
String.Dest: 我紧随在后。

String.Source: You lead, and I'll do whatever you say.
String.Dest: You lead, and I'll do whatever you say.

String.Source: If I die, I want you to bury me in a coffin. Made of pie.
String.Dest: 要是我挂了，希望给我订制个棺材——用馅饼做的。

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: That guard saw a dragon? I'll believe it when I see it. I'll stop believing when I wake up, but for that moment I'll believe.
String.Dest: 那个守卫看见了一条龙？我亲眼看见就会相信。不过我一醒来就又不信了，但就在那一刻我会相信的。

String.Source: Well, that was fast. I didn't even finish counting down half of the 99 barrels of Elves off the wall.
String.Dest: 哇，这可真快。 我还没把99数到一半呢，一圈精灵就从墙上下来了。

String.Source: For Kodlak! I just want to feel included.
String.Dest: 为了克拉科！我只是也想出把力。

String.Source: I...I can't believe the old wolf is dead.
String.Dest: 我……我不敢相信这只老狼已经死了。

String.Source: My mother always said, "Never Thu'um with your mouth full."
String.Dest: 我妈妈总说，“不要张口闭口就吐目的。”

String.Source: Some say Rumarin is a feminine name. But I'm not a girl, I just fight like one.
String.Dest: 有些人说罗米勒是个女性的名字。但人家才不是女生，人家只是在打架的时候像。

String.Source: Don't worry about me, I'm in the best shape of Sload's life.
String.Dest: 别为我担心,我在蛤蟆人当中算混得不错的了。

String.Source: We heading out? Let me just conjure up the energy.
String.Dest: 出发么？补充点能量吧。

String.Source: Did I ever tell you what my name means in the old Aldmeri? That's because I have no idea.
String.Dest: 我有没有告诉过你我的名字在古语的意义？ 这是因为我也不知道。

String.Source: Is that an Amulet of Dibella you're wearing? I thought someone like you had standards.
String.Dest: Is that an Amulet of Dibella you're wearing? I thought someone like you had standards.

String.Source: Married to adventure and each other. I've always wanted multiple spouses.
String.Dest: 要是能和冒险结婚的话。我估计就忍不住得犯重婚罪了。

String.Source: My invisible, magic sword is yours.
String.Dest: 我将我那无形之魔法剑授予你。

String.Source: Ready to get moving?
String.Dest: 准备好出发了吗？

String.Source: You lead, I'll follow.
String.Dest: 你带路，我跟着你。

String.Source: Should we get moving?
String.Dest: 我们该动身了吗？

String.Source: So, what's the plan?
String.Dest: 计划是什么？

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Ah! You hit me! I can't believe it! The pain! So much pain! And...wait a minute...I felt something else as well....in my hand...
String.Dest: 啊！你打我！我不相信！好疼啊！真的好疼啊！而且……等等……我觉得其他东西……在我的手里……

String.Source: Hey, be careful!
String.Dest: 嘿，小心点！

String.Source: Whose side are you on?
String.Dest: 你站在哪一边？

String.Source: What's the matter with you!
String.Dest: 你有毛病啊！

String.Source: You know, they say brutes are incredibly daft, but Skjarn's not as dumb as his contemporaries.
String.Dest: You know, they say brutes are incredibly daft, but Skjarn's not as dumb as his contemporaries.

String.Source: Of course. I'm not big on debauchery and wild parties. These sort of simple gatherings between friends is precisely where I excel.
String.Dest: 当然。我可不热衷于花天酒地和狂野派对。这样朋友间的简单聚会才是我想去的。

String.Source: I take it you're enjoying the festivities.
String.Dest: 我知道你喜欢这个节日。

String.Source: If I have one bone to pick with Zora, it's the location. If she wanted to have the party here, she could have at least asked me to cook.
String.Dest: 硬要我在佐拉那儿鸡蛋里挑骨头，我觉得是选址。如果她想在这里开场聚会，她至少应该让我为聚会掌勺。

String.Source: I take it you're enjoying the festivities.
